138b2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes g.yon pa khu tshur ban+d+has te mthe bong brkyang nas sa la btsugs pa ni pur bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas rim 'dis mchod par bya ste/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he swAhA/ dril// e puSh+pem 
138b3(rgyud 'grel): le dz+luM swA hA/ me tog gi'o// oM tI Sha Na dI pe hU~M swA hA/ mar me'o// oM d+hU pe shwa ri hUM swA hA/ bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa phyed brkyang ba ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// 
138b4(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong dang mdzub mo ma sbyar ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// khu tshur bcings la mthe bong bsgreng ba ni mar me'i'o// de nyid la gung mo bsgreng ba 'dug pa'i 'o// de nas bgegs bskrad par bya'o// 
138b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i mdun du 'bar ba'i snod kyi me bzhag la// bdud rtsi zab sbyor gyi sngags khro bo dang bcas pas bzlas par bya'o// g.yas pas sdigs mdzub byas g.yon pas tsha 
138b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mar khu byugs pa'i yungs kar sngas lag pa g.yas pa sdig mdzub bcas g.yon pas sbyin pa sreg bya'o// oM gyis dbyung zhing bskrad par bya'o// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pas 
138b7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i chus bsang gtor bya'o// sngon bzhin du rdo rje ra ba la sogs pa yang byas la// de'i rjes la khrus brtsams pa ni lha'i lus la dri zhim po'i bye brag gis 
138b8(rgyud 'grel): khrus kyi cho ga bzhin du dri zhim po dbul bar bya'o// oM hU~M suM k+ShaM yuM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pas lan bdun du ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas reg par bya'o// dung dang rnga'i sgra dang bkra shis kyis 
139a1(rgyud 'grel): klu sna tshogs pa'i dbyangs blang zhing dril bu bsil bar bya'o// bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad brjod cing chu'i rgyun sgreng bar bya'o// dri zhim po'i mar khu dang dri ma med pa'i chu 
139a2(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim po// sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma dang me tog gi chus rim pas khrus bya'o// khrus byas nas khrus rab bsal la las dang rjes su mthun pa'i ras zung zhig dbul bar bya'o// rdo rje khur tshur gnyis 
139a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings te/ bzung ba ni chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o// sngags ni oM hUM swA hA/ gos nye bar dbul ba dang / rgyan la sogs pa dang / mchod pa'i tshogs dang sgra yang rnam par dbul lo// 
139a4(rgyud 'grel): denas oM ha na ha na kro d+ha hUM phaT/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste sa la rig nas brdabs pas/ sa sbyar bar bya'o// thab khung gi byung dang shar du rtse mo bstan te bud shing brtsig par bya'o// 
139a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra satwa aHzhes pas lan bdun du ku sha'i chun po la bzlas pa zab khung nas rtse mo la rtsa ba sbyar tI ku sha dgram par bya'o// de nas gtsub shing la sogs pa'i me sbar la ku sha'i chus 
139a6(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum bsang btor dang mtshon pa byas te/ thabs khung du gzugs par bya'o// oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM zhes pas lan bdun bzlas pa'i mar gyis sbyar bar bya'o// lhag ma ku sha'i chun pos 
139a7(rgyud 'grel): dgab par bya'o// de nas hUM gis zab khung bskyed la// oM gyis pad+ma de'i steng du raM gyis rnam pa las me'i lha bsgom pa ni pad+ma la gnas pa mdog ser skya// ral pa dang bcas pa phyag 
139a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis nas bzang phreng dang gun+thi bsdams pa 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de nas me'i mtshams nas de bzhin du ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom 
139b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// oM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha Ag+ne dzaHhUM swA hA/ zhes pas so// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dang dbu ma bsgreng la dbu ma'i tshigs su sdigs mdzub gnyis 
139b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis sor mos spyan drang bar bya'o// dam tshig sems dpa' la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya'o// oM dzu hu dzu hu swA hA/ zhes pas dbu ma'i rtse mor 'brel bar byas/ pad+ma phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi 
139b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o// oM pra bar sat+kA ra sAhA/ oM zhes pas zhabs bsil dang zhal ba sil phul bas/ 'dod pa'i dngos po mtha' dag gis la sogs pas yang dag par mchod du/ dril bu 
139b4(rgyud 'grel): dkrol zhing bskyod par bya'o// de nas oM in+d+rA ya swAhA/ oM ya mA ye swA hA/ oM ba ru NA ya swA hA/ oM ag+na ye sA hA/ oM nr-i te ye swA hA/ oM bA ya be swA hA/ oM I sha nA/ 
139b5(rgyud 'grel): ya sA hA/ oM rtsan+na a ti tA b+h+yaHswA hA/ oM suM b+ha ni su b+ha b+h+yAM swA hA/ zhes pa sa lha shos la sogs pa'i mchod pa rab 'byam gyis 'jig rten skyong ba mchod par bya'o// me la zhal bsil 
139b6(rgyud 'grel): phul le me lha'i lce dang / dgang bzer gyi khar hUM rnam par bsams la/ rang gi rdo rje dang dril bu blangs te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du chu byin la oM dzu hu dzu hu sa swA hA// zhes pa'i rim pa 'dis 
139b7(rgyud 'grel): bsreg par byas te/ yams shing gis ni rgyab rten gyi tshul du'o// mar ni zhal du'o// 'bru ni phyag tu'o// 'bras ni zhal du'o// zho zhal du'o// dur ba dang / me tog gi spyi bor ro// 
139b8(rgyud 'grel): zhabs bsil phul te mchod pa la sogs pa bar bar du byas te/ lan gsum du gsum du bsreg par bya'o// dgang blugs kyang 'bul lo// de nas ku sha'i chus lan gsum bsang gtor
140a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ 'bar bar thim par bya'o// oM hU~M Ta Ti Ta ta zhes pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i chus rdo rje'i lag pa dang bcas pas me'i thab khung kun nas bsam par bya'o// 
140a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas gong du gsungs pa'i mdun du bsgoms la// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma me'i dbus su bsgom par bya'o// ston mo bya ste/ sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang mngon par mchod de/ zhal bsil ba
140a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / zhabs sil phul te/ oM hUM swA hA/ zhes pa gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas sbyin sreg bya'o// gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas sbyin sreg tu dbul lo// dgang bzar mar gyis bkang ste/ 
140a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags shing rdo rje dril bu'i lag par blugs gzar la hU~M bsams la/ mngon par 'dod pa'i don sems par bya ste/ dgang blugs dbul
140a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// sngon du zhal bsil phul nas/ ku sha'i chus mel bsang gtor bya'o// ye shes kyi lha mo bris phul sogs pas zhugs pas bya ste/ slang yang me'i lha gong du bsungs 
140a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pas bsams la/ mchod pa sna tshogs pas mngon par mchod nas// mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnam par rig par byas la/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad// 
140a7(rgyud 'grel): ci lta'i rjes su dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs par mdzod// slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// oM gats+tsha gats+tsha ag+ne swA hA// zhes spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub 
140a8(rgyud 'grel): mo rgyab tu sbyar ba ni// gshegs su gsol ba'o// de nas sngon du gsungs pa'i gtor ma'i tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bya ste/ ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya mtha' dag gis 
140b1(rgyud 'grel): gtor mas dbul bar bya'o// oM ku ru ku ru ma hA bat+tA li hU~M swA hA/ zhes pas lag pa gnyis brkyang ste sor mo dbu ma gnyis sbyar ba ni sbyin sreg gi dus su gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// 
140b2(rgyud 'grel): me'i bdag nyid sbyin sreg gi dus su me brtags la gal te mtshan ma ngan pa mthong na de nas oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM swA hA/ zhes pa gang du mtshan ma ngan pa mthong ba'i phyogs der mar brgya rtsa brgyad du 
140b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg dbul lo// bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i chus lan gsum du bsang gtor byas la// sngon bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o// rtsa ba'i sbyin sreg gis mchod nas/ gong du gsungs pa'i 
140b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pas rang gi dbugs kyi bkugs te/ rang gi lus la bzhag par bya'o// phyi'i lha gshegs su gsol la langs par bya'o// sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// de nas mchod sbyin gyi cho ga brjod par 
140b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// bla re bre ba dang / na bza' sna tshogs 'phyang ba dang / dri dkar la zhim pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas/ dkar pos bum pa dang dbus kyi snod byug par bya'o// 'o ma dang dri bzang
140b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i chus dbang bar byas la shing lo la sogs pas brgyan par bya'o// gos dkar pos dkris la 'dab ma la mig gi gzugs// sen rtsi dang ku sha la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// suM truM 
140b7(rgyud 'grel): yuM hUM/ k+Sh+mAMn+d+haM y+m+R+YuMSh+TaM/ zhes pas dang por oM dang mthar swA hA/ re re la yang brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te/ gnas ji lta bar bum pa brgyad bzhag par bya'o// dbus su yang 
140b8(rgyud 'grel): snod chen chetso po bzhag par bya'o// gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas bdag nyid rnal 'byor mtha' dag rdzogs par bya ste/ bdag nyid mchog la de nas sbyin sreg brnam par 
141a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// oM ka ma la gar+b+he swA hA/ zhes pas pad ma'i rnam pa la lag pa'i thal mo dbye bas byas la de nas snod kyi dbus su pad+ma dgod par bya'o// de nas 
141a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gdugs dkar pos g.yogs la// de nas hU~M las rdo rje hU~M gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de nas ye shes mkha' 'gro ma bsgom par bya'o// sku mdog dkar
141a3(rgyud 'grel): po phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa// rdo rje dang dbyig pa de g.yon pa dang g.yas par bsam par bya'o// de'i shar du rdo rje ma/ byang du drag mo// nub du
141a4(rgyud 'grel): ro la ngas ma/ lhor gtum mo// dbang ldan du seng ge ma/ mer stag mo/ bden bral du ce spyang ma/ rlung du 'ug pa ma/ gong du gsungs pa'i mtshan ma dang rgyan dang ldan pa'i sku mdog

141a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ji ltar 'dod par chu dbul bar byas nas/ du zarba 'am ku sha dang sbyar zhing kun da la sogs pa'i me tog dang / sgom pa dang ldan pas

141b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gi sngags gong du ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brengs nas/ gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// zhi ba bya ba la ni dkar po'i mchod pa dang / kha shar phyogs su mngon par bltas/ 
141b2(rgyud 'grel): pos mchod par bya'o// tshegs bcad kyi bar du ming sbyar zhing bskul bar bya'o// phreng ba'i grangs brgya phrag gcig gi mdzub mos bgrang zhing zhi ba'i yid kyis zhi bar bya'o// rgyas pa 
141b3(rgyud 'grel): la yang mchod rdzas thams cad ser po dang kha byang du blta bar bya'o// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgugs pa'o// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lhag pa'i phreng ba dbus nas bgrang zhing 
141b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i nga rgyal gyis rgyas pa'o// dbang lnga ni mchod rdzas thams cad dmar po dang nub du bltas pas bya'o// dbang gi yid phyogs nas 'gugs pa la sogs pas bskul 
141b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// bgrang phreng nyi shu rtsa lnga pas srin lag la gnag par byas la dbang gi yid kyi dbang bya'o// mngon spyod la mchod rdzas thams cad nag po rdzas kha lhor bltas pas 
141b6(rgyud 'grel): bzod cig ces bskul zhing bzang phreng drug cu'i grangs kyis mthe'u chung la gnas pa'i khro bo'i cha bud kyi pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i mngon par spyod par bya'o// 
141b7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dang sbyin sreg dang mchod sbyin mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga'o// dpal rdo rje gdan bzhi pa'i man ngagA mdor bsdus pa/ dpal ye shes dbang phyug ma'i

142a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga snying po mdor bsags pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// yi ge 
142a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa sngon 'gro ba'i// klu sgrub la ni thog mar 'dud// shin tu gab cing gsang ba yi// sangs rgyas gsung la bdag phyag 'tshal// gsang ba'i phyogs ni 'di dag las// spang 
142a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsi gnas 'gyur pad+ma las// reg pa'i ye shes de kho na// dang po'i chos la bdag 'dud do// A li'i ye shes 'dam skyes su// rdo rje sems kyis gdams pa las// sbrang rtsi 
142a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i ro myong ba// gsung gnyis pa la bdag phyag 'tshal// khro dang nga rgyal la sogs med// kun tu ye shes kyis bskul ba// gsung gsum pa la bdag 'dud do// gang yang 
142a6(rgyud 'grel): theg pa gsum mchog bcos// sems can mchi med nyid smon pa// sangs rgyas gsung la bdag phyag 'tshal// 'bum phrag dag ni bcu dang brgyad// gcig nas gcig brgyud mthong ba 
142a7(rgyud 'grel): las// rnal 'byor bstan bcos dam pa ste// phyi rol bstan bcos sun 'byin yin// sdeb sbyor dang ni chad ma med// sgra yi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// ye shes can gyi rnal

142b1(rgyud 'grel): bcos ci zhig bya// snying po snying po zhes bya'i chos// dag pa'i lam ni nges par spyad// dag pa'i chos ni dmigs pa las// dag pa'i lus 'gyur the tshom med// gnyis med shing ltar 
142b2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nas ni// thig le'i go chas go bgos nas// de nyid mtha' yis bsnun na ni// 'khor ba'i yul ni 'joms par 'gyur// don la brten pa'i bstan bcos ni// gcig nas gcig 
142b3(rgyud 'grel): tu bslabs pa ste// shin tu gab cing gsang ba'i don// brda yi skad kyi bshad pa yin// gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud// stong phrag bcu gnyis rab rgyas las// de nyid sbyor ba rnyed nas ni// 
142b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor cho ga bstan pa yin// bcu dang brgyad du phye ba yis// las can 'khor bar rnam rol te// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ bskrad pa dang ni bcings sogs kyi// sngags grub 
142b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang sbyin sreg sogs// dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid mtshon par bya// slob ma bzang la slob dpon ni// rnal 'byor gsang la rab tu gus// dul bas legs par bstags la ni// dkyil 
142b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de nyid bri bar bya// slob ma brtag pa la 'jug pa'i cho ga ste/ dang po'o// // dang por re zhi slob dpon gyis// sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya// yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs su// / 
142b7(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i bstan la 'dug nas ni// lag g.yas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// dbus su dbyangs yig dang po bsam// g.yon du zla ba'i dbus gnas par// bdud rtsi'i yi ges mdzes par bya// 
142b8(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dud pa dung dang ni// pad ma g.yas kyi sor mo la'o// gi waM dri gsum 'jigs pa dang // sa yi gdugs ni g.yon la dgod// ye shes rnam shes mthe bong gnyis// lag sogs 
143a1(rgyud 'grel): las ni byed pa mo// dkar pos bsdigs shing rengs par byed// dud pas bskyod cing 'byed pa ste// dung gis thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur// pad+ma sa spyod cing 
143a2(rgyud 'grel): sred par byed// gi wang sdang ba 'joms pa ste// dri ma gsum gyis ltung bar 'gyur// 'jigs pas bsod par rab tu bshad// sa gdugs las kun byed pa yin// A li zhes bya'i phyag rgya 
143a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // sa bon brgyad kyi bskul bya ste// rdo rje mchog tu 'bar ba'i 'od// me yi sa bon steng sgor dgod// sa ni mig la bsam par bya// nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la// bdud rtsi chu yi 
143a4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon ni// dkar po lce la kun tu bsam// sde tshan brgyad pa'i gsum pa yis// rtsa ba yis ni steng du brtsir// ra ni gsum pa nyid yin te// 'og du rlung sbyar bzhi pa'o// 
143a5(rgyud 'grel): sgra dang bzhon nu thig le can// yi ge bzhi pa'i ming can te// chu ste gti mug mgrin par ro// nyon mongs pa ni nam tshong dgod// snying gar rlung gis bskyod par bya// lte bar me ste de
143a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin phyugs// yi ge'i dgod pas dkod nas ni// sa bon las ni lha'i tshul// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya// pad+ma'i gdan
143a7(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs pa ste// gangs dang kun da lta bu'i 'od// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can// rdo rje snying gar gzung nas ni// g.yon gyi dril bu 
143a8(rgyud 'grel): dgu ru bstan// sku la rgyan rnams thams cad dang // shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' klubs// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba can// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces mdzad// rang gi ye shes 
143b1(rgyud 'grel): sa bon ni// sgra dang thig ler yang dag bcas// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' can te// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas sngar bsnyen bya// rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad po dag/ khri phrag 
143b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhir ni bsnyen par bya// sbom mo khro gnyer la sogs pa// nyi shu stong phrag lnga ru bzlas// phyi rol gnas kyi 'jig rten pa// rgyal dbang dngos grub shin tu drag/ stong phrag 
143b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum du bzlas nas ni// kun nas kun tu 'grub par 'gyur// sngon du bsnyen pas 'grub 'gyur te// ma bsnyen pa ni dkyil 'khor min// sngags dang rnal 'byor de dag gis// rim 
143b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis byin gyis brlob par 'gyur// sngon du bsnyen pas lha mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga ste gnyis pa'o// de nas bstan dang g.yo las sogs// sngags bsnyen pa la 'bad pa yi// 
143b5(rgyud 'grel): de ma thag tu 'bebs gyur pa// sngags ni yang dag bstan pa ste// oM badz+ra a be sha dzaHgal te sangs rgyas sogs 'dod na// 'bum phrag gcig tu gsum gyis bsgrub par bya// 
143b6(rgyud 'grel): oM hi li hi li hU~M dzaH'bum phrag gsum gyis 'grub 'gyur bas// skyes pa la sogs mthong bas 'bebs// oM ma ta li hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum gyi sa 'grub 'gyur te/ 
143b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni thos pa sa 'bebs par bya'o// oM ma ta li tsi ti nI li te hUM hUM/ 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas na ni// sgrub pos skyes sogs rings nas 'bebs// oM bat+tA li bat+tA li hUM phaT/ 
143b8(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'bum phrag gsum du ni// sngags pas bsnyen pa byas nas ni// ming nas brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // gsang sngags lha kun 'bebs par 'gyur// oM bat+tA laM bat+tA laM hUM phaT/ 
144a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas 'bum phrag gcig tu ni// sngon du bsnyen pa byas 'gyur na// chu dang bsreg mardo dang ni// shing rnams kyang ni 'bebs par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor 
144a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi slob dpon gyis// sngon du bsnyen pa la 'bad nas// de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// shin du dul bas brtag par bya// lha ni mnyes par ma byas na// bdag nyid rnam par 
144a3(rgyud 'grel): sun 'byin yin// lag tu rdo rje dril thog pa'o// rdo rje sems sogs rnal 'byor gyis// sna tshogs rtse mor bskor ba yi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// snying gar rlung dang 
144a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung sbyar te// rlung gi sa bon gyis bstod bya// rdo rje rtse mor ye shes kyis// sa bon bsams te sing gar bskul// seng ge mo yi gzugs bsams la// drag pa hUM gis 'phang 
144a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// sngon gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// chu dang bcas pa'i me tog rdeb// mchog dang bar ma tha ma yi// skyes bu'i bye brag dag gis so// oM ra ma ra ma ho ho ho a a a phaT// 
144a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor stegs dang dbang bskur la// gal te 'bebs pa gdon za na// sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// de ma thag tu 'beb 'gyur te// de nyid 'di yis phab pa dag/ skyes bu dam 
144a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig can zhes bya// sgrub po skal ba med pa yis// skal ba dman pa'i mi rnams ni// mtshan nyid brtag par bya ba la// de nas sman ni bshad par bya// sngon du sdig pa mang spyad la// 
144a8(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams dgongs par mi 'gyur na'ang // gsang sngags 'di dang bdug pa yis// de yi mod la 'bebs par 'gyur// da ni rog po'i yan lag lnga// rnal 'byor pa yi bzung nas ni// 
144b1(rgyud 'grel): chu dang me dang rlung gi ni// ji bzhin gnas su bzlas nas kyang // snying gar ye shes sa bon ni// bdun pa'i bdun par sbyar byas la// gu gul che dang mar nag che// cha ni mnyam 
144b2(rgyud 'grel): por byas nas kyang // sman bdun dang ni ldan pa yi// bdud rtsi'i chu ni gu gul bcas// rdo rje'i sa bon bzlas nas su// mchod pa'i dus su bdug par bya// 'di yi dri ni bsnams 
144b3(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis// de yi mod la 'bebs par 'gyur// khro ti ka dang dze ti lnga// lcags kyu lnga dang sbyar bar bya// skyo byed la sogs rnam pa lnga// cha ni mnyam por sbyar bar bya// mar nag 
144b4(rgyud 'grel): chen pos bsgos nas su// bdud rtsi'i chu dang bsres pa dag/ lce yi dbang pos myangs na no// de yi mod la 'bebs 'gyur zhing // dman dang mchog gi sems can la// rab tu 
144b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas chos ston 'gyur// shin tu brtag pa'i slob ma la// slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song zhing // lus sogs rang bzhin dag par ldan// 
144b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang // snying rje la sogs phan sems ldan// nyan dang thos sogs lhags par dang // sbyin sogs dge ba'i las la dgar// theg pa che la mngon par brtson//

144b8(rgyud 'grel): denas dngos grub kun 'grub pa'o// dkyil khor cho ga bshad par bya// snying rje pham pa'i sems kyis ni// dang po sa gzhi yongs su bzung // yid ni dga' ba'i sa phyogs te/

145a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // lha bshos gtor mar bcas pa yis// der ni mchod pas mnyes par bya// sa ni gzung ba'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// nu ma'i steng du bzung nas su//

145b3(rgyud 'grel): du gsal// rdzas rnams thams cad ldan pa yis// kun du rgya cher mchod par bya// khu tshur gnyis ni bcings nas su// dkar po gi wang bsgreng par bya// gnyis kyi rtse mo cung zad dgug/

150a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par klubs// glang po'i pags pa'i sham thabs can// mi yi pags pa'i na bza' mnapas// thig le sgra las byung ba ru// gtum mo lce yi phyogs su 
150a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ni// rol pa yi ni 'dug stangs kyis// seng ge yi ni gdan la bzhugs// sku mdog gser zhing dkar ba ste// phyag gnyis khro bo'i hUM mdzad la/ 
150a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer me ltar gsal zhing 'bar// na bza' dmar pos shin tu mdzes// sbrul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par klubs// rol gri gyen du 'phyang ba dang // g.yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams// 
150a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rnams thams cad bsreg pa ru// sa bon las ni bsgom par bya// me mtshams lha mo stag mo ni// zlum po yi ni stang stabs kyis// rdo rje phag dong stan la bzhugs// sku 
150a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar zhing sngo ba ste// phyag gnyis shin tu khro dang bcas// na bza' dpar po mnabs pas mdzes// lcags kyu zhabs pa sdigs mdzub bsdams// sdang ba thams cad 
150a6(rgyud 'grel): gdan gcod par// me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od can du// sa bon ston 'gro bsgom par bya// bden bral lha mo lce spyang mo// kyil krung phyed pa'i stangs kyis ni// ma he'i gdan la bzhugs
150a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ sku mdog dmar zhing sde ba la// phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par mdzes// dgra sta zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang // na bza' dmang po banangs pas klubs// me yi dkyil 'khor 
150a8(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba can// ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung // sa bon las byung bsgom par bya// rlung mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo// tseg pu yi ni bsdug stangs kyis// ces spyang gi ni gdan 
150b1(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs// sku mdog dmar zhing ser ba ste// dbyug pa sdigs 'dzub zhags pa bsnams// skul na bza' dmar po gsol// sa bon las byung bsgom par bya// snying po'i dkyil
150b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor re'u mig dgu// sgor ni mkha' 'gro ma bzhi ste// shar gyi sgor ni mkha' 'gro ma// mi ro yi ni stan la bzhugs// sku mdog dkar mo shin tu 'bar// skra grol bas ni rnam par 
150b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// lag gnyis kha ru bcug nas ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// gos dmar bla gos zag par gzar// phreM zhes bya bas bskyed de bsgom// byang sgor lha mo mar 
150b4(rgyud 'grel): me ma// stan ni de dang 'dra ba ste// kha dog ser mo 'jigs chen mo// thal sbyang spyi bor gzhag pa dang // na bza' dmar pos rab mdzes par// pheM las byung ba bsgoms par bya// 
150b5(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi sgor ni 'jib byed ma// yi dgas stan la bzhugs pa ste// sku mdog dmar mo cher 'bar ma// snyim pas khrag ni mthung bar byed// sa bon po las byung ba ste// nub kyi 
150b6(rgyud 'grel): sgo na bsrung bar mdzad// 'phrog byed ma ni lho sgor ste// sngar bstan stan la bzhugs pa yis// sku mdog sngon mo cher 'bar ma// sku la na bza' dmar po bsnams// ge wang gtun
150b7(rgyud 'grel): shin bsdams pa ru// sa bon phreM las byung bar bsgom// bcu bzhi gnas kyi phyi rol tu// rnal 'byor ma ni nyi shu ste// rdo rje phreng bas mngon bskor te// rta babs dang ni dpral ba la//

151a1(rgyud 'grel): sha gsol ma// lcags kyu lnga yis bkang ba yis// pad+ma'i snod ni bsgoms nas su// gcig gis steng nas 'gebs par mdzad// rub tu ku ru/ drag 
151a2(rgyud 'grel): shul 'bar ma mi sdug ma// phyag na 'dam skyes gtor mas bkang // lhor ni ba t+tA li hUM/ zos pa ma dang rdo rje ma// bum can bza' btung bsnams shing 'gebs// hUM dbang ldan 
151a3(rgyud 'grel): sgeg mo sgeg dang bcas// g.yon du 'gying dang bcas par bsgom// hUM sr-i dung chen min dga' mo ste// dri yi phyag rgyas byug par mdzad// hUM ho me yi mtshams su pi wang ma// rdo rje'i 
151a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas rdung bar byed// srim me tog ma ste thal sbyar nas// bsdus te gyen du 'thor bar byed// hUM hUM bden bral du ni glu mkhan ma// dkar po bskyod cing gla len byed// oM bdug

151b2(rgyud 'grel): sngon mo 'bar chen mo// gos ser dag la rab tu dga'// g.yon na thod pa khrag dang bcas// g.yas pa mi yi mgo bo gsol// byang sgor tshangs pa oM las byung // 'od zer dmar

155b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig phyag rgya sngags dang ni// las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa yin// 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi cho ga ste bcu gnyis pa'o// gzhan dag chung mar bcas pa 
155b6(rgyud 'grel): yi// sngags dang phyag rgya bstan par bya// nyi ma'i khu tshur dam bcings nas// byin du rnam par dkrol bar bya// oM khe sha swA hA// seng ge'i'o// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni// rang gi snying 
155b7(rgyud 'grel): gar bskyod par bya// tshangs pa yi ni dam tshig tu// bde bar gshegs kyis mdor bsdus gsungs// oM oM swAt+ma/ tshangs pa'i'o// nyi ma'i khu tshur bcings nas ni// ba dan gsum pa 
155b8(rgyud 'grel): gyen du bsgreng // 'di ni mdung can phyag rgya ste// dam tshig 'dzeg pa'i dam pa'o// oM hU~M swAhA/ ru tra yi'o// zla bo'i khu tshur bcings nas ni// gi wang dag ni bsgreng bar bya// nyi ma'i sor mo 
156a1(rgyud 'grel): / kun brkyang nas// de yi steng du dgab par bya// oM maM suM hUM swAt+ma// brgya byin gyi'o// nyi ma'i khu tshur brtan bcings la// dkar po dud pa bsgreng bar bya// dpral bar 
156a2(rgyud 'grel): steng gi zod sor drug/ dbang po yi ni dam tshig 'dod// oM muM muM hUM swA hA/ dbang po'i'o// rdo rje bcings pa bsdam byas nas// dkar po dang ni gi wang bsgreng // rin chen lta bur sbyar nas ni//

156a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bshad pa yin// oM khA ta ni hU~M phaT/ 'byung po'i bdag po yi'o// khu tshur de nyid bzhag nas su// dkar po dang ni du ba brkyang // phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal ba yis// gdengs ka'i

157a3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma kha sbyar nas// pad+ma 'i tshul du dbye bar bya// shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i'o// rnam shes kyis ni sa gdugs mnan// lhag ma bsgreng ba rdo rje'i rtse// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi'o// ye shes

160a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab sdug la rnam par gnas// thugs kyi phyag rgya snyoms zhugs pa// de nyid sems dpa' che bas che// rdo rje khro bo khro chen po// 'jigs pa'i me ni 'dul bar mdzad/ 
160a2(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa mchog ni 'dul ba che// drag po'i drag mchog 'jigs byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che// chos kyi las tshan 'dzin pa po// dam chos las ni bzang po'i lam// byang chub 
160a3(rgyud 'grel): sems ni sbyor bar mdzad// thams cad dag du pad ma che// shes rab thabs kyis nor che ba// 'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug che// nam mkha' mtha'

160a8(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub grol ba'i don gyis phyir// gsang ba nges par 'chir mdzad pa// rol cig rol cig rdo rje khyod// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa mdzad// nyen hU~M/ te na ta te hUM/ rin zang med pa'i 
160b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi yis// sems can rnams ni khyod kyis dkrus// bdag ni 'khor ba las grol ba// khyod ni gus dang bcas pas 'dud// te na hUM/ ten te te hUM/ glang chen mchog gi steng bzhugs shing // sku ni dung 
160b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar dkar bas mdzes// mtha' yas dug gis brgyan pa'i sku// shar gtso rdo rje ma la 'dud// gser gyi mchog ltar mdzes pa'i sku// shin tu drag po'i sbrul gyis brgyan// mdzes pa'i bza' bkang thod pa can// 
160b3(rgyud 'grel): byang gi lha mo rgyal gyur cig/ pad+ma dmar ltar mdzes pa'i sku// hUM gi nga ros 'jigs par mdzad// drag po'i dbyug pa thod pa bsnams// nub kyi lha mo'i gtsol 'dud// 'od zer dra ba sngon pos mdzes// seng ge 
160b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog byed tshangs dbang gtso// bdud 'dul phyir na khro gzugs 'dzin// hUM mdzad lho yi lha mor 'dug/ hUM hUM hUM/ sangs rgyas lnga yi mkha' 'gro ma// lnga lnga rnam par dag pa yis// rnal 'byor ma kun de nyid sprul// 
160b5(rgyud 'grel): sto dang stong min 'khor ba'i dngos// dngos dang dngos min grol ba nyid// de 'dra sku ni dbus bzhugs nas// rnal 'byor ma yi tshigs kyi bskor// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma yi sku// dkyil 'khor bya ba de yi mnyes/ 
160b6(rgyud 'grel): klu sogs chags pa'i rang bzhin nyid// bza' dang bza' min sngon nas spangs// stong pa yi ni rdo rje yis// pad+ma la ni bskyod pa mdzad// bdud rtsi lnga yis bdag la bkrus// lcags kyu gsol ba'i sbyor ba 
160b7(rgyud 'grel): bsten// bzhengs shig kha sbyor sbyor ba mdzad// dam chos snying po rgyas mdzad ma// dam chos thar pa'i gtso bo'i gtso// yang dag rgyal ba 'khor ba spangs// dkyil 'khor spros pas 'gro ba sgrol// bdud gsol 
160b8(rgyud 'grel): seng ge ma yi sku// stag mos shin tu skrag par mdzad// 'ug pa'i sgra yi kun skrag cing // pheM pheM sgrogs pas sdang lus gzigs dpa' bo rdo rje khyod la 'dud// 'khor ba sgrol ba khyod la 'dud// gsang ba'i 
161a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi gsol la 'dud// gus dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal lo// de nyid sbyor bas glu blang ba// lnga ldan dbyangs dang sbyor ba sngags// rdo rje dril bu slar bcas pas// 'bad de sna tshogs 
161a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya// dpal ldan de nyid rgyal po dam pa'i dbang phyug rol pa'i cod pan mdzes// dpal ldan gsang ba'i gdan la sku mchog 'od zer 'bar ldan pa// dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu bskyod sgra rnal 'byor de nyid 
161a3(rgyud 'grel): can// dpal ldan ye shes rnyed pa dam pa'i dbang phyug longs spyod rnams la spyod// ces bya ba'i sna tshogs pa'i glu dang bstod pas mnyes par byas la// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas ni// snying ga ru ni gzung byas 
161a4(rgyud 'grel): la// oM shud+d+ha d+harmAHhUM hUM a a sA hA// zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi mchod par bya'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i de kho na nyid kyi glus mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas blo dang ldan pa yis// 
161a5(rgyud 'grel): gal te 'byor na gzhan dang bcas// tshan chen gyis ni gos dag gam// dar sogs sar pa gos nas ni// rdo rje dril bu de bzhin du// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes par bya// brgya byin gdugs ni thogs pa dang // 
161a6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa bsil yab g.yo ba dang bcas// seng ge mdun gnas gsol ka ba// 'phrog byed yon tan sgrogs par byed// rol pa'i gdan la gnas pa yi// hU~M zhes brjod cing shar du blta// nyi mas rdo rje 
161a7(rgyud 'grel): gsor nas ni// zla bas dril bu bsil bas kyang // dri dkar maN+Dal gru bzhir bya// me tog dkar po gcal du bkram// dri dang me tog sogs ldan pa'i// sa lu'i 'bras zan rgya che ba// zho dang bu ram mar 'o// 
161a8(rgyud 'grel): thugs// shar gyi sgor ni sbyin par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab du sbyar bar bya// pad+mas gdugs spel gnas su// dkar po dang ni gi wang bsgreng // dkar po cung zad dgug 
161b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// lha dang lha min grub pa dgug/ oM bat+ta li ma hA bat+tA li hUM hUM dzaHswA hA/ shar gyi sgor dgug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla bas snod la reg nas ni// nyi mas rdo rje khu tshur bcings// dkar po bskyed 
161b2(rgyud 'grel): ste rol pa yis// stabs la gnas nas brjod par bya// oM rku ba dang ni tshar chum// yi dgas rgyu ba nyi ma zla// dngos grub 'dod dang rgyal ba dang // na'i rgyal dang zla ba'i rgyal// lha mo u ma ga gA dang // gzugs 
161b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes skar ma 'dus pa dang // bza' rnams kun dang tshogs kyi gtso// karti ka dang dpal ldan ma// lha mo ri bong 'dzin pa nyid// lhag pa dang ni lhag pa che// lha yi rgyal po lha min rgyal// puk+ka sI dang sbas chen/ 
161b4(rgyud 'grel): mo// hUM ho ho A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sa ma yA ti baM hUM phaT dzaHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las// dkar po gi wang dkri bar bya/ oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha sa ma yA d+hi pa te hUM hUM phaT/ 
161b5(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ zhes bya bas mnyes par byas la sngags dang phyag rgyas btang bar bya'o// de nas byang phyogs sgo ru ni// mnyam pa'i stobs su gnas nas kyang // nyi mas rdo rje gsor ba dang // zla bas dril bu 
161b6(rgyud 'grel): dkrol ldan pas// man+tal dkar pos byug pa la// 'o ma'i snod la sogs pa bzhag/ me tog dkar dang gdug pa dang // 'o mar bcas pa'i lha bshos dbul// sngar gyi phyag rgyas dgug pa dang // sngags 
161b7(rgyud 'grel): dang de ni sbyar bar bya// zla ba bu tshur brtan bcings la// rnam shes dang ni sa gdugs brkyang // nyi ma'i lag pa legs brkyang ste/ gdengs ka'i tshul du steng du sbyor// phyag rgyas snod la reg nas ni// phyi rol 
161b8(rgyud 'grel): byang bu dgugs par bya// oM mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas bu// 'jog po dang ni stobs kyi rgyu// pad+ma pad+ma chen po dang // dung skyong dang rigs ldan rnams// lha mo lha mo chen po dang // zla ba'i spyi gtsug spyi 
162a1(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tsha// be tshon 'dzin dang be tshon che// snying po med dang gu li ta// dga' ba dang ni nye dga' dang // rgya mtsho dang ni rgya mtsho che// gdung ba dang ni dung chen mo// dpal gyi 'od dang 'od po che// rin 
162a2(rgyud 'grel): chen 'od dang gzugs bzang dang // gzugs chen sbrul bzangs lto 'phye che// smig rgya dang ni smig rgyu che// oM A gats+tsha a gats+tsha ma hA nA gA d+hi ba ta sarba b+hur b+hu ba phruM phaT swA hA// byang phyogs su klu la gtor ma byin 
162a3(rgyud 'grel): nas se gol gsum gyis gtang bar bya'o// zlum po'i sbubs gnas sbyor ba'i bdag/ nub kyi phyogs kyi cha ru ni// maN+Dal dmar pos byugs nas su// me tog dmar po gcal du bkram// gnod sbyin gyi ni 
162a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang po rnams// sngar gyi phyag rgyas dgug par bya// me tog dril sogs ldan pa'i// gtor ma bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas// sngon gyi rkang stabs bskyod nas ni// nub du gnod sbyin dbang po mchod// oM nor bu 
162a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang dang gang ba bzang // rgyal ba bzang po dga' byed phur// oM phur bu che dang pad+ma'i gtsug/ dung gi gtsug phud dkar dang ni// gar chen 'bigs par byed pa dang // gcod par byed dang gang bar byed// 
162a6(rgyud 'grel): nor dang nor min shin du nor// gzugs bzang rol pha rol chen po// rgod dang rtse dang rnam par bskyod// dpal bzang dang ni gzugs mdzes rnams// bde ba chen po'i bka' 'di yis// gnod sbyin gnod sbyin/ 
162a7(rgyud 'grel): mo 'dir shog/ hUM A ba dar A ba dang // oM bat+tA li bat+tA li b+ha kA pra ya// yo gi ni ma d+he hUM hU~M hUM swA hA// khu tshur gnyis ni sbyar nas su// snying kha'i phyogs su bcing bar bya// oM dA na a d+hi pa ta ye 
162a8(rgyud 'grel): pat+tA li phuM sAhA// nub skar gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma byin la// sa gal lan gsum gtag par bya'o// gsum gyi gsum pa dbu ma la// rdo rje rkang pas mnan nas su// khrag gam dmar po'i rdzas kyis ni/ 
162b1(rgyud 'grel): mnal gru gsum brug par bya// me tog dmar po bdug pa sogs// nyi ma'i longs spyod gtong mar ldan// sha skam dang ni nya la sogs// cong dang khrag gis gang ba'i snod// sran chan dang ni til khur bcas// 
162b2(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas par bya// bza' bca' rnam pa sna tshogs pa// lho yi sgor ni sbyin par bya// sngar gyi sngags dang phyag rgya yis// lho yi logs su gnas te dgug/ rnga chen la sogs gsum brdung 
162b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing // sgra chen po ni dkrol bar bya// oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri bo dang ni ri sul phug/ grong dang bzhi mdo'i zhing dang ni// khyad par du ni khang stong dang // sems can snod dang thang dang ni/ 
162b4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par du ni chu la gnas// nag po drag po drag chen mo// lhas byin mnyam du bsten pa dang // nag po gtsigs dang 'jig byed dang // dga' dang 'das dang log 'dren rnams// rgan byad ma dang drag mo dang /

163a1(rgyud 'grel): g+ha ta ya a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru phaT dzaHswA hA// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab du sbyar bar bya// pad+ma dang ni sa gdugs sbrel// dkar po gi wang sgrog du bya/ oM tiSh+Tha 
163a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM b+haSha b+hak+Sha dzaHphaT swAtwA/ zhes bya bas lho phyogs su gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin// phyogs ni rnam par brgyad po yi// so sa yi ni sa mtshams su// rnga chen la sogs

163a4(rgyud 'grel): dag ni bris nas su// sna tshogs gos kyang snang bar bya// seng ge'i gdan sogs khril ni// rgyan dang mchod pa la sogs bya// 'byor na dpa' bo gzhan yang rung // med na bdag nyid gcig pu yis// rgyan 
163a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun gyis klubs nas ni// rdo rje sems sogs rnal 'byor bya// snying gar thal mo sbyor ba yis// slob ma mdun du bzhag nas ni// cho ga rdzogs par mched nas ni// so shing bca' ba la sogs sbyin// 
163a6(rgyud 'grel): oM a dzi hA saM baR+Sha ni hUM phaT/ so shing gi sngags te/ lan bdun du ni bzlas nas su// slob ma kun la byin te bstan// chu yi sngags kyis bzlas nas su// kun gyi kha ni bkru bar bya// rnam snang mdzad dang 
163a7(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa// rin chen mchog dang 'jig rten dbang // don yod grub pa la sogs pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems chen rnams// kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni// 
163a8(rgyud 'grel): dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su// byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po yis// 
163b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu ni nges byas te// tshul khrims rnam gsum bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims te// so sor bdag nyid brtan por bzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 
163b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dun dang // bla med dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog/ sdom pa sangs rgyas sbyor skyes pa// dang por re zhig gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang // so sor de bzhin nyid du gzung // rdo rje chen po'i rig mchog/ 
163b3(rgyud 'grel): la// slob dpon nyid du gzung bar bgyi// dam tshig nyid du dag pa yi// rin chen 'byung ba'i rigs mchog la// nyin re dus drug byas nas su// sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bya// byang chub chen po 'byung ba yi// 
163b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag la// phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam tshig so sor gzung bar bgyi// sdom pa thams cad dang ldan pa// ji ltar nus pa mchod pa'i las// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ 
163b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid du so sor gzung // bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// mchog tu bskyed par byas nas su// sems can thams cad don byed phyir// sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi// ma brgal ba rnams bdag gis 
163b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgral// ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung ste// mya ngan 'das la sems can dgod// ces bya ba ni slob mas zhus pa'i tshig go/ slob dpon gyis lan btab pa/ 
163b7(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen po 'bras dbyung ba'i// dpal ldan mchog gi lam 'di yin// gang gi khyed rnams grol 'gyur ba// de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin// lhag par gnas bya mchod nas ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i 
163b8(rgyud 'grel): chos bshad bya// thams cad sems ni tshim byas nas// de 'og dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// de nas slob dpon rang gnas su// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ldan// rdo rje dril bu sgrar bcas pas/ 
164a1(rgyud 'grel): slang yang glu ni blang bar bya// 'phrog byed cod pan nor bu'i 'od kyis zhabs gnyis brgyan// yid 'ong lha mos thugs ka dam por bcir ba'i sku// zhabs gnyis bskyod pas gsang ba phye zhing

164a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// dkyil 'khor gyis ni shar phyogs sam// byad dang nub kyi phyogs char ni// zhi dang rgyas pa'i rim pa bzhin// 'bad pas stegs bu brtsam par bya// rgyar ni sor mo bcu bzhi pa// phyi rol gru bzhi pa 
164a4(rgyud 'grel): ru bya// de ni cha gsum bgos pa la// zabs su cha gnyis brko bar bya// kha khyer de yi bzhi cha ru// kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ni// kha khyer gyi ni phyed du bya// phyi rol gyi ni 
164a5(rgyud 'grel): rab dag/ sor gcig pas ni kun nas bkor// thab khung dbus su rdo rje ni// pad+ma'i steng du bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas lnga yis mtshan pa ni// ji bzhin phyogs su dgod bya ste// kha khyer gyi ni phyogs bzhi// 
164a6(rgyud 'grel): ru// sangs rgyas mtshan mas mtshan par bya// dbang po'i rdo rje mdzes pa yis// grwa dang grwa ru brgyan par bya// stan gyi gnas dang nye ba ru// ti se gangs kyis gzugs dge ba// dpangs dang rgyar ni khru phyed//

164a8(rgyud 'grel): me dag gam// gtsubs las byung bar brtag par bya// de yi dbus su pad+ma ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan bsgom// yi ge raM gyi lcags kyu yis// me yi dbus su sems kyi dgug/ mchod yon 
164b1(rgyud 'grel): zhabs sil la sogs pa// las kyi cho ga ji bzhin dbul// yam shing zho can lnga yi shing // 'o ma la sogs lnga po bsreg/ zho dang sbrang rtsi bu ram dang // 'o ma sA lu'i zan du bcas// 'bras kyi so ba la sogs

164b3(rgyud 'grel): yi dbus bkod nas// de dbus rdo rje l+h+wa ma ni// lha mo kun gyi 'byung gnas te// dbus kyi lha mo dgug par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// gzugs mdzes yongs su rdzogs par bsam/ 
164b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag tu kun dwag pas// sngon bzhin thams cad mchod par bya// rnal 'byer pa yi dbus su ni// de nyid kun gyis mchod nas kyang // bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas kun gyis// mA rnams thams

164b8(rgyud 'grel): cad tshim par bya// de 'og mar dang 'o mar bcas// nam gyi nang du bsreg par bya// slar yang de nyid sbyar nas su// las kyi dbye bas bsreg par bya// mar dang bdud rtsi lngar bcas pa'i// gang ba'i 
165a1(rgyud 'grel): sreg blugs brtag par bya// de nas rdo rje dril dkrol te// rdo rje gla yis bstod par bya// hAM hU~M hU~M/ yang dag spro dang sdud pa po// bdag med rnal 'byor ston mdzad pa// thun mongs 
165a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bdag nyid de// rnam par sna mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// hU~M hU~M hUM/ stong pa 'di nyid la sogs pa'o// de nyid las ni gzugs su bstan// gang dag 'dod bzhin gyur pa'i dngos// ye shes 
165a3(rgyud 'grel): lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// thams cad glo dang gar la sogs// phyi dang nang gas mchod nas kyang // snying po bsdus shing bsags pa yis// slar yang de bzhin bsreg par bya// rdzas kyi cho ga yongs 
165a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs nas// bsgrub pas bdag nyid sbyor bar bya// dpal gyi 'bras bu lo 'bri' 'bras// zho dang sbrang rtse mar gyis bsgos// byang chub sems kyi yam shing la// brgya phrag lnga ni bsreg par bya// de yi 
165a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su dbang bskur nas// smon lam btab ste mnyam par bzhag/ rgyal srid nyams pa'ang sa gsum pa'i// rgyal srid mdzes pa'ang myur du 'thob// 'o ma sbrang rtsis spags pa yi// lo ma yi ni yam 
165a6(rgyud 'grel): shing dag/ brgya phrag lnga ru bsregs na ni// myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// las ni gang dang gang bsam pa// de dang de ni des 'byung 'gyur// de nas sngon gyi rnal 'byor gyis// rang rang gnas su lha mo brtag/ 
165a7(rgyud 'grel): me tog bdug pa sna tshogs kyis// mkhas pas sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod// rnal 'byor can gyis bstan par bya// mchod pa nyi shus mchod nas ni// rdo rje dril bus rol par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis 
165a8(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// sa gsum pad mar sbrel nas ni// dkar po gi wang bsgrengs nas su// phyag rgya 'di yis bskyod par bya// oM badz+ra gar+b+he hUM ho// oM badz+ra gaN+De ra ni ta sarba 
165b1(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha pra tsa yi te pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA da swa b+hA be badz+ra d+ha ra ni hr-i da yA a ba saM to Sha ni hUM hU~M ho ho AHswA hA// // zhes bya bas bskyod par bya ste/ rdo rje dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// me zab kyi mtshan nyid dang // 
165b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gi cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas lcags kyu lnga la sogs// rnal 'byor ma la dbul bar bya// lcags kyu gzhan ni thams cad kyang // lcags kyu lnga yis de nyid bya// thams cad rig 
165b3(rgyud 'grel): pas phyi nang gi/ rnal 'byor ma kun dbul bar bya// khu tshur gnyis ni bcings nas su// ye shes rnam shes dkri bar bya/ oM AHhU~M hU~M guM suM swA hA// lcags kyu lnga'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// thams cad ro ni 
165b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig gyur pa// lho nub kyi ni mtshams su bzhag/ gnas ni gzhan dang gzhan dag tu// nye bar spyod pa'i snod kyis mchod// slob dpon shin tu rtags pa yis// bdud rtsi lnga ni dbul bar bya// nya phyis chen 
165b5(rgyud 'grel): po la sogs sngon// snod ni mdzes pa dgang bar bya// zla ba'i lag pa brkyang nas su// rnam shes dang ni 'jigs par sbyar// ba dan gsum pa brkyang byas nas// nya phyis la sogs mdun du bzhag/ sngon// 
165b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi sngags sogs de nyid kyis// bdud rtsi lnga ni sbyang bar bya// de yi dbus su zla ba la// bdud rtsi'i yi ge blta bar bya// oM ha ho hriHg+h+ri hU~M A swA hA/ zhes bya ba ste/ bdud rtsi lnga sbyang ba'i sngags so// rnam 
165b7(rgyud 'grel): shes dang ni 'jigs par sbyar// bsrung ba rnam pa gsum du 'dod// rnal 'byor ma kun sngags rig pas// thig pa'i zor ma dang por dbul// nye phyis la sogs snod bkang ste// so so'i char ni dbul bar 
165b8(rgyud 'grel): bya// sbyin pa min pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pa thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i sgra yis ni// slar yang glu ni blang bar bya// hUM hUM hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsam pas rol// thar pa la dgyes 
166a1(rgyud 'grel): blta na yang // shin tu dbyer med brtan pa ste// sha dang sbrang rtsi bsrubs mthu yis// rdo rje ma gcig ngal ba 'joms// drag mo ro langs gtum mo yis// bya ba sna tshogs byed 'gyur gtso// yongs su 
166a2(rgyud 'grel): grol ba'i mchog nyid de// thar dang 'gal dang snying rjes khros// snying po yi ni snying por gnas// bzhi pas bkab cing khro ba 'joms// dran pa lnga bral srid las grol// chags dang rmongs dang de nyid mkhyen// de nyid sbyor 
166a3(rgyud 'grel): bas gzigs pa'i gtso// zhabs mchog lha yis phyag bgyis pa// pad ma'i gdan bzhugs gtso bo ni// yongs su nyes shing tshim bya'i phyir// brgya byin gyis ni gdugs kyang thegs// gdong bzhi pa yi rnga yab 
166a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba// seng ge dag ni gsol kas gnas// 'phrog byed rje bo'i mtshan mas sgrogs// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal gyur cig/ lcags kyu lnga la sogs pa yi// mchod pa thams cad 
166a5(rgyud 'grel): nges par dbul ba'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor mar bcas pa'i// dpa' bo'i sems ni mchod par bya// phyogs brgyad kun nas bskor ba ru// kun la gdan ni phul nas kyang // rnal 'byor rnal 
166a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma gnas su// cig cang lhan cig stan la bzhugs// de nyid rnal 'byor ma kun gyis// gnyis sprod nu ma 'dzin pa dang // sgeg cing bzhad dang bcas pa yis// rdo rje dril bus rol par bya// kun la dri ni rim bzhin 
166a7(rgyud 'grel): dbul// kun la me tog sogs pas mchod// thams cad dri yis gdugs nas ni// thams cad la ni mar me dbul// thams cad mdun du gtor ma ni// thams cad phud las dbul bar bgyi// lcags kyu'i rdzas ni sna 
166a8(rgyud 'grel): tshogs te// khyad par du ni rnam pa lnga// gnyis med de nyid de yid kyi// rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes par bya// rnal 'byor nam mkha'i rang bzhin du// slob dpon lus ni nges par bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi dung chos las// 
166b1(rgyud 'grel): nan tan du ni zla bas dbul// sngar bstan pa ni de nyid kyi// sgrub pa pos ni gsang sngags brjod// gnas gsum du ni gtor nas su// rnal 'byor pa yis kun nas dbul// dam tshig spyod pa thams cad la// 
166b2(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bcad 'dis ni sbyin par bya// ltos shig mdzes pa yi ni chos// 'di la the tshom bya mi rung // khyi dang bram ze gdol pa gsum// rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza'// pad ma bskor ba sngon 'gro bas// 
166b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi de bzhin gzung nas su// rnam shes dang ni 'jigs par sbar// lhag ma rtse mo lta bur sbyar// nyi mar zla ba bzhag nas ni// tshigs bcad 'di ni rjes su bzla// rin thang med pa'i dam pa'i chos// 'dod 
166b4(rgyud 'grel): chags dri bral legs 'ongs shing // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// de nyid gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas thams cad rnal 'byor pa// thams cad dag pa'i rim pa yis// thams cad 'dod bzhin byin gyis 
166b5(rgyud 'grel): brlab// bkra shis glu ni len pa dang // dpa' bo rnam par dag pa'o// A li kA li bzlas nas su// rdo rje dril bu'i sgrar ldan pas// de nyid glu ni glang bar bya// thar pa'i bde ba dam pa'i mchog/ snying rjes brgyan 
166b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bde la rol// chags pa'i dga' bas brgyan pa yi// drag pos 'gal ba 'joms par mdzad// stong pa nyid du gzigs pa yi// bza' dang bza' min rnam par spangs// 'gro ba yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir// 
166b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rnam par rol// bkra shis kun gyis mched gnas su// rdo rje glu yis nye bar bsrung // rdo rje dril bu sgrar bcas pas// dpa' bos lhag ma'i gtor mas dgang // rang bzhin med pa'i 
166b8(rgyud 'grel): sems gcig gis// kha ni yongs su dgang bar bya// las gang 'dod pa bsams nas su// gtor ma'i gnod du gdab par bya// oM ku ru ku ru/ rje dang rje chen dngos grub gdong // dur khrod gnas ma yi dgas 
167a1(rgyud 'grel): gdong // gtsigs byed gtum mo khrag dgyes ma// dam tshig srung zhing rnal 'byor 'dzin// ki li ki li sgra chen ma// pha mes nags gnas gdon gyi ni// tshogs bcas dbus su bzhugs
167a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// gtsigs byed gtum mo dud sol ma// bzhes shig gsol cig dam tshig la// bzhag nas dbang du mdzad du gsol// oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sarba duSh+Ta naM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ho pr-i phruM pre phreM pheM phaT swA hA/ rdo rje khu 
167a3(rgyud 'grel): tshur gnyis bcings nas// dkar po dang ni gi wang bsgreng // rtse mo cung zad bkug nas su// kha yi grwa ru bzhag par bya// lhag ma'i gtor ma la dud po'i sol ba me zhes bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// 
167a4(rgyud 'grel): pa mes nags kyi mchog dang ni// brag dang shing gcig chu chen 'gram// nye bar spyod pa lnga ldan pa'i// gtor sbyin se gol gsum gtog bya// lhag ma'i gtor ma'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// 
167a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdzas ni lnga po dag/ dri zhim bcas shing 'o mar bsre// dung gi snod ni yongs bkang ste// dam tshig chu yis gtor bar bya// oM AHhU~M a swA hA/ lan bdun bar du bzlas nas// dam tshig chu ru brtag par bya/ 
167a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma re re nas// sdom pa dag ni byin nas gzhug/ mig ni gos kyis bkab nas su// thal mo sbyar nas gzhug par bya// slob dpon gyi ni mdun gnas te// thal mo me tog gis bkang nas// di ring 
167a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba las bsgral nas// byang chub sems su smon par bya// de nas slob mas rang bzhin ni// dag pa la sogs bsgom par bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA sA b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA/ 
167a8(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra shud+d+ho haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho haM/ dag pa rnam gsum byas nas ni// slob ma la ni 'di skad brjod// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // gzhan gyi neng 
167b1(rgyud 'grel): la reg bya min// 'jigs pa kun gyi 'jigs mi bya// sems can byams dang snying rje sogs// sdom pa dang ni tshul khrims bsrung // oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pu dze pas+tha nA ya At+ma naM nir+ya ta ya mi// oM A tsar+ya pu dze pas+tha 
167b2(rgyud 'grel): nA ya At+ma naM nair+yA ta ya ni// oM sa ga la satwa pa ri ta nA ya/ at+ma na~M nir+ya tA ya mi/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma yA hau// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs// u ni 'dod pa sgrub byed 
167b3(rgyud 'grel): pa// sku yi rdo rje byin gyis brlab// hUM ni nyon mongs bsreg pa ste// thugs kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlab// oM d+hi li d+hi li ma na phur// Ni da badz+ra a tsa le yuM yuM hUM swA hA// de ring ye shes can ye shes// bdud rtsi 
167b4(rgyud 'grel): dag ni myang bar gyis// oM dud+hA ti A pA tA rA ya swA hA/ bdud rtsi yi ni dung chos nas// sngags kyi Sha ru blud par bya// ji bzhin bka' ni bsgos nas kyang // dam tshig byas te dbab par bya// slob ma lha yi 
167b5(rgyud 'grel): skur bskyed la// snying ga rlung gis bskur ba yi// rlung gi sa bon gzhag par bya// rkang par rlung dang rlung gis ni// snying ga'i drung gis sba bar bya// ye shes mkha' 'gro ba dag byas te// hUM gi ye shes drag tu bzla/ 
167b6(rgyud 'grel): oM AHkha khi la le hUM a// rdo rje dril bur sbar bcas pas// rnal 'byor pa yis nga rgyal bskyed// rdo rje glu yin glu len cing // rdo rje gar gyis drag tu bskyod// rang 'dod gar gyis gar byed cing // bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed// 
167b7(rgyud 'grel): oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa twa sa ma ya prA ti pa la ka hUM hU~M hU~M ho ho ho swA hA// gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// de nas me tog gtor nas ni// gnas lnga yi ni lha mo yi// rigs kyi bye brag shes byas la// sngags dang 
167b8(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya la sogs sbyin// oM dz+nyA na tsak+Shu hU~M oMHswA hA// de mig phye nas phyag byas te// lha yi de nyid bstan par bya// sum cu pa ye 'byung ba'i gnas// lha rnams kun gyi bdag po ste// ye shes mkha' 'gro 
168a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dngos kyis// shes rab pha rol phyin mas 'khyud// rnal 'byor nam mkha' zhes bya ba// rnam dag ye shes kyis sprul ltos// me long ye shes las sprul pa// sdang ba thams cad 'joms mdzad cing // 
168a2(rgyud 'grel): glang po'i steng na yang dag bzhugs// shar gyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro ltos// mnyam nyid ye shes las byung ba// sbrul dga' yi ni stan la bzhugs// bdud rnams thams cad bsreg byed pa// byang gi mkha' 'gro drag mo ltos// 
168a3(rgyud 'grel): mi dge bcu yi las la sogs// rnam par dpyod las nges sprul bya// bya khyung gi ni stan la bzhugs// nub phyogs ro langs ma la ltos// bya ba kun byed las byung ba// seng ge 'phrog byed 'dul mdzad ma// nyon mongs 
168a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sreg pa yis// lho phyogs lha mo la yang ltos// stag seng 'ug pa ce sbyang ste// snying po'i gru bzhi dag na gnas// seng ge phag dang ma he dang // ce spyang gi ni stan la bzhugs// sems can don bya'i rgyu ru ni// 
168a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs chen sna tshogs gzugs kyi bzhugs// mkha' 'gro me 'bar 'jigs byed ma// 'phrog byed ma ste sgo rnams skyong // lha rnams thams cad 'gugs pa dang // 'dzud cing 'ching dang mnyes byed yin// sbos mo 'ju byed 
168a6(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo ste// bdud rtsi'i snod ni phyag na bsnams// drag mo khrag gsog sha gsol ma// lcags kyu lnga yis bkang ba yis// pad ma'i snod ni bsnams nas su// gcig pa'i steng nas 'gebs par mdzad// drag shul 
168a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ma mi sdug pa// phyag na 'dam skyes gtor mas bkang// thod pa ma dang rdo rje ma// bum can bza' btung bsnams shing 'gebs// sgeg mo dri dang pi bang dang // me tog glu dang bdug par bcas// gar dang mar me

168b1(rgyud 'grel): sag ra yan ma ga da ga ga ga sa yangal 
168b2(rgyud 'grel): sngang brtas pa// phyir bas pa ni gar gnas// dbang po na lnga 'byung ba'i bdag/ tshwa 'i rgyal po marnams bzhir// rang gi drung ma sdeng bcas pa// sna sa mchod pa thogs dganas// bar sdang gnas pa'i grong khyer ni/

168b7(rgyud 'grel): shes skor bar bya// lha yi bdag nyid tshul gyis ni// gnas brgyad dag ni bsrung bar bya// kA re spyi bor bsam bya ste// hUM ni mig gnyis dag tu dgod// ya ni rnga ba sna dag pa// lce la su ma yig 'bar ba bsam// mthir 
168b8(rgyud 'grel): par stan brtsegs pa ste// nam tongs dag pa slebs pa// snying gi'i phyogs su wAM/ lte bar bla dgod par bya// sa bon brgyad ni dgod par dang // phyag rgya rim bzhin yan lag dkang // saM sa ma yo ho ta/ mi ma/ 
168b9(rgyud 'grel): ma ti a/ oM dran na/ mi 'i hUM bar d+ha cano gago/ a ud+b+ha ba A a baM AHa we hU~M phaT// de ning so sor bzung ba yis// ye shes snyun bdag ces brjod// gsang ba'i sdom pa byin nas su// de la dbang ni 
169a1(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bya// rnal 'byor ma brgyad kyi go cha dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga bkra// / de nas dbang ni bskur ba'i phyir// lho dang nub dang byang du ni// shar phyogs kyi ni bum pa rnams/ 
169a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyis ni bsnyen pa bya// seng ge'i gdan sogs lnga la ni// mgo bor gdugs dang bcas te bzhag/ bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas nas ni// me tog bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar// byang chub sems kyi sa bon 
169a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis// sems can bla med smon par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i sgrar ldan pas// bkra shis glu yi dgang bar bya// slob ma shar du bltas nas ni// slob dpon nub du blta bar bya// rdo rje sems sogs sbyor ba yi// nyi zla'i

169a6(rgyud 'grel): dril bu sbyin par bya// mgo bor sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// dkar po dang ni gi we bsgreng // rtse mo cung zad bkug ste sprad// du ba dang ni dri 
169a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum brkyang // oM aHhUM swA hA// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan gyis// dbang bskur sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bdag gis thams cad byin nas su// ming brtags rdo rje lag tu sbyin// brtul bzhugs gar la sogs 
169a8(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams// ji ltar zlos pa'i rim bzhin sbyin// der ni sngags dang phyag rgya bcings// sangs rgyas kun gyi nges pa yin// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor nam mkha' yi// dbang gis de ring dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas
169b1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rab grub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis zung // oM shrI yo ga aM ba ri traM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ pa ri sa ma ya s+t+waM/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun gyi
169b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso// rdo rje'i'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// khyod kyis kyang ni nag tu bcad// byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// srid pa'i rang 
169b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dag pa'i phyir// rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis// dngos po mchog tu byed par 'gyur// dril bu'o// rdo rje dril bu 'khyud nas ni// g.yon snyems pa dang sgros gnon
169b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chang // gnyis med gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// phyag rgya chen po'i byin gyis brlabs// sangs rgyas kun bdag rnal 'byor ldan// bdag po'i dbang ni bskur nas su// A li kA li'i sa bon gyis/ sngags kyi 
169b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur sbyin par bya// he shrI yo ga oM ba ri traM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi nA ma a b+hi She ka ta zhes bya ba dpal gyi sgra dang bcas pas ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// gsang ba rdo rje'i 
169b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcas// rnal 'byor nam mkha'i btul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha tAM d+hA ra ya mi hU~M hUM ha ha ha ho// rdo rje brtul zhugs so// de nas 
169b7(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' sogs la// shes rab thabs kyi snyems chen gyis// gar mchod bde ba'i dga' ston gyis// gar ro// sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'phang // sangs
169b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun sogs rnal 'byor ma// des ni 'bral bar mi 'gyur te// phreng ba de yi rgyan yin no// phreng ba'o// lus can kun la dam tshig gi/ khyod kyi glu ni blang bar bya// des na rnal 'byor ma de dang / myur du bde ba myong 
170a1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// glu'o// khyod kyi rgyal la dri phul la// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang // rnal 'byor ye shes mthong ba yi// byang chub lus can rnams la bsgos/ dri'o// rdzogs
170a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la spos phul la// brtul zhugs bzang po sa legs tshim gyis// lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su// ye shes kyi ni tshim par 'gyur// spos so// chos kyi me ni legs sbar ba// pad ma 
170a3(rgyud 'grel): gar dbang rang nyid de// sems can ma rig ljongs byas pa// ye shes sgron mas snang bar gyis// mar me'o// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyi ni mi
170a4(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'i// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis gsal// oM badz+ra nai tra A pa ha ra pa Ta laM hrI/ thur ma'o// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la brnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// 
170a5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo med cing gnas med pa// rgyu dang las las kun nas 'byung // de ltar chos 'di shes gyis la// sems can don 'di mnyam med kyis// 'on kyang rnal 'byor ma sras skye// me long ngo // sems can kun la 
170a6(rgyud 'grel): phan pa'i phyir// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// bya ba spyod tshul gsang ba yi// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis// 'khor lo'o// khyod kyis the tshom dogs med par// yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis ni// 
170a7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dung ni bla med pa// dri med kun tu gang bar gyis// dung ngo // g.yon pa'i chos gos phrag par gzar// g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya dang // ye shes mkha' 'gro ba dag byas te// 'khor lo kun la rnam 
170a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs te// rnal 'byor nam mkha' lung ston bzhin// mgrin gcig bzhin du lung bstan bya// 'di ni khyed la nges lus bstan// rnal 'byor nam mkha' de bzhin gshegs// ngan 'gro srid las bton nas su// 
170b1(rgyud 'grel): srid mchog gtan du dag bar gyis// he shI yo gAM pa ri nA ma ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi ma ma ya s+t+waM b+hA ra b+hA ba swA hA// lung bstan pa'o// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// kun tu 'khyud de me tog rol// sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos sa 
170b2(rgyud 'grel): bon// me tog nang du rtog tu rol// sde tshan gsum gyis rnam rol pa// dir ni rnam par dgod par bya// dpa' bo sdig gi gnyen po ste// dpal dang ldan zhing lhun che ba// dpa' bos de nyid goms par bya// sangs 
170b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun bdag sbyor ba yis// mdun du yi ges dbang bskur la// sangs rgyas lnga ni bstan par bya// sngags kyi dbang bskur bstan par bya// yi ge brgyad po bsgom du gzhug/ slob dpon gyi ni dbang bskur nas// 
170b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rnam shes bstan par bya// sbyor ba yi ni dbang bskur nas// gsang ba thams cad mngon par brjod// gsang chen de dag thams cad kyis// dbang bskur ba ni go 'phang mchog/ bzod pa'i chos ni sngon 
170b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas// sems can rnams ni gzir mi bya// tshig rtsub khyal pas sma min zhing // sems can rnams ni sun mi dbyung // tshul khrims sdom pa bsrung bya zhing // skye bo rnams la gce mi bya// bdag nyid shi bar 
170b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur kyang bla// sems can srog gcod de lta min// rab tu 'bar mer mtshungs pas na// gzhan gyi nor la re mi bya// rnal 'byor pa yi brdzun bsrung zhing // phan tshun dbye ba'i las mi bya// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnal 
170b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa// de la brdzun ni yod ma yin// spyod pa bag yod bcas pa dang // bza' dang longs spyod bag yod bya// dga' bar rol pa bag yod cing // gtor sogs cho ga bag yod la// rnal 'byor pa ni grub 'dod 
170b8(rgyud 'grel): pas// sems can brten na 'grub par 'gyur// thams cad shes pa'i slob ma gang // sems can dga' ba'i las rnams bya// mnyam nyid ye shes las bskyed nas// thams cad mnyam nyid blta bar bya// 
171a1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu mnyam pa'i spyod pa can// rtag tu rnal 'byor bsam gtan gus// bslab pa blangs pas sngon 'gro bas// dkyil 'khor gtor ma la sogs pa// sems can don bya'i tshul khrims rnams// 
171a2(rgyud 'grel): bu yi srog bzhin brkyang bar bya// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal// slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pas// sems can thams cad rim bzhin du// gnyis med cho ga 
171a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mchod nas// lha la phyag ni 'tshal du gzhug/ slob ma dag ni thams cad dang // sems can kun la de nyid bstan// dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / bslab pa'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// 
171a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma blo ldan pas// bla ma'i yon ni dbul bar bya// bu dang chung ma sdug pa dang // gnyen dang bran po bran mor bcas// yul dang zhing dang khyim dang ni// mu tig gos dang gser dang ni// dngul dang 
171a5(rgyud 'grel): zangs sogs nor rnams dang // 'bru ni rnam pa sna tshogs dbul// mal stan dag ni thams cad dang // mnyes pa'i longs spyod kun phul nas// mthar ni bdag gis lus nyid kyang // slob dpon yon du brtag 
171a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// slob mar gus pa med pa yis// dngos grub ring bar the tshom med// yon dang dad pa sngon 'gro bas// dngos po kun gyi mnyes par bya// dri dang me tog bdug pa sogs// phyag rgya thams cad mchod 
171a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i sgra ldan pas// bkra shis glu yis dgang bar bya// hUM hU~M mgon khyod yongs su thar pa'ang khyod// chos ston pa yang khyod yin te// snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba'i gzugs// kye gzugs bzang // 
171a8(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin pa yang khyod// kye de nyid srid pa las grol khyod// rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// kye thar pa'i rdo rje khyod nyid do// lnga pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa yis// bkra shis bstod sgra nye bar bsdu// oM ra ma 
171b1(rgyud 'grel): ra ma ho hi hi hU~M ho AHoM ra ma ra ma ho hUM hUM hUM ho he A/ oM ra ma ra ma phruM phruM phruM phreM hUM hU~M phru~M pheM a// oM ra ma ra ma ho g+hu g+hu g+ho a swA hA// rnal 'byor ma brgyad phreng sngags kyi// mnyes par byas nas nyi ma dang // 
171b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba dag ni kun tu sbyar// me tog gis ni snyim par dgang // sems can kun la sems chen pos// smon lam dag ni gdab par bya// ma brgal ba rnams bdag gis bsgral// rnal 'byor bstan 
171b3(rgyud 'grel): bcos go 'phang gnas// bya ba dag ni 'bras bu brtag/ rgyal dbang shis pa brjod pa dag/ thams cad sngon du byin la brtag/ yon bdag la sogs sems can rnams// thal mo sbyar te gnas par 
171b4(rgyud 'grel): bya// me tog bcas pas dung chos chus// shis pa brjod pa 'bar bar bya// di ring khyod ni 'khor ba yi// rgya mtsho las ni rang brgal zhing // rdo rje las byung rdo rje dngos// sangs rgyas go 'phang dbang/ 
171b5(rgyud 'grel): bskur zhing // myur du sems can thams cad kyi// don byed nus pa'i sems dang ldan// shis pa dag ni brjod nas su// gshegs su gsol ba'i sbyor ba bya// bla ma'i yon dang slob ma'i bzod par 
171b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje dam bcings nas// sems can kun la rjes brtsebs// oM na maHte hUM/ na maHmi hUM/ na mo na maHhUM 
171b7(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'o// sngags gsum rig pas phyag bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// zla ba snying gar btsir nas su// nyi ma sa la brkyang nas ni// brtan par sngags ni bzla bar bya// 
171b8(rgyud 'grel): oM gats+tsha gar+b+ha swa b+hA ba naM hUM swA hA/ 'jig rten las 'das pa gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM gats+tsha pu rA nA ga ma na ya hUM phaT swA hA// se gol gsum ni gtog par bya// 'jig rten pa 
172a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gshegs su gsol// oM g+hi la~M g+ha li na d+haM hUM swA hA// tshon rtsi bsdu ba'i sngags so// tshon rtsi dag ni bsdus nas ni// chu bo chen por bskyal bar bya// lhag ma'i cha yi gtor ma 
172a2(rgyud 'grel): yang // lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am chu 'gram bskyal// oM hi li hi li pu li ma hA pu li pheM pa~M paM swA hA/ lhag ma'i gtor ma la bzlas pa'i sngags so// btung dang bza' ba la sogs lnga// de nas slar ni mchod 
172a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// dkyil 'khor gnas ni de nyid du// tshon rtsi ser po la sogs pas// pad+ma 'dab brgyad ge sar bcas// lte bar ldan pa bris nas su// gnyis med gtor ma byin gyis brlab// sngar gyi sngags 
172a4(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya dang // mchod pa rgya chen thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i 'khor lo mchod par bya// slob mar bcas pas sngags dang ni// bza shis klu thang gar yang bya// rnal 'byor nam mkha' gang yin pa/ 
172a5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rnam par snang mdzad gtso// rdo rje mkha' 'gro gang yin pa// de nyid 'phags ma mA ma kI/ mkha' 'gro drag ma gang yin pa// de nyid na bza' dkar mo yin// mkha' 'gro ro langs ma gang yin// de ni 
172a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma ste/ mkha' 'gro gtum mo gang yin pa// de nyid sangs rgyas spyan ma yin// grub pa'i pho nya rnam pa bzhi// thams cad rig pa'i lus su byed// sangs rgyas zhing sogs zhing rnams 
172a7(rgyud 'grel): la// khyad par du ni sbyin la spyad// dmangs rigs stong phrag gnyis dag ni// bram ze gtsang ma gcig dang 'dra// bram ze stong phrag gnyis dag ni// dge slong gcig la rab tu sbyar// dge slong stong phrag 
172a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dag ni// rdul med pa ni gcig dang mnyam// rdul med stong phrag brgyad dag ni// ye shes ldan pa gcig dang sbyar// ye shes ldan pa stong phrag gnyis// slob dpon gcig dang mnyam par 
172b1(rgyud 'grel): brta// de ltar sbyin pa'i zhing byas nas// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyin// rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i chos las ni// zhing bzang po la sa bon gdab// mtshams med pa dang sdig can yang // tshon rtsi mthong 
172b2(rgyud 'grel): bas grol bar 'gyur// sngags kyi de nyid phab pa yis// gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// sbyin bdag bzang po'i rnal 'byor pa// rim gyis myur du byang chub 'gyur// srid pa gsum por 
172b3(rgyud 'grel): sku ni rjes chags dul bar ldan// 'od zer sngon po stong ldan nyi ma brgya stong ldan// rnam mang sku dang cha lugs rjes chags sems dpar ldan// rnal 'byor nam mkha' mchog gi dbang gi dbang phyug 
172b4(rgyud 'grel): gar byed rol// hUM zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni// rnal 'byor ma kun chags par bya// bkra shis sgra ni sbran pa yis// shin du mnyam par bzhag ste blang // rdo rje gdan bzhi rgyas pa las// stong phrag 
172b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis mdor bsdus pa// de la dngos po tsam bsdus pa// snying po mdor bsags zhes bya ste// sdeb sbyor dang ni tshad ma med// rnal 'byor sbas par gyur pa yi// brda yi skad kyis bshad
172b6(rgyud 'grel): pa las// don la rton pa'i de nyid bsdus// rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po gdan bzhi pa las// rnal 'byor thams cad dang gar dang / glu'i rab tu byed pa dang / mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dkyil
172b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi sgrub thabs te/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// // slob dpon chen po Ar+ya de bas mdzad pa'i/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi che ga snying po mdor 
172b8(rgyud 'grel): bsags pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dgos khug pa lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / 
173a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' gdan bzhi'i ba ba don 'phem pa bzhugs// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gtso mo lha mo thams cad bde// de nyid thams cad rab rtsod mdzad// gru gsum pad ma'i dbus gnas 
173a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// zla ba nyi ma me'i brgyan// pad ma chen po nyer gnas te// yi dgas chen pos gdan byas par// gdan skyes rnal 'byor ma bsgoms na// myur du dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// gdan bzhi pa 
173a3(rgyud 'grel): yi rgyud kyi ni// lung gi don gyi rjes 'brengs te// shing gcig la sogs dka' 'grel ni// rnal 'byor grub phyir bshad par bya// dam tshig ma dang sgrub pa pos// rnal 'byor pho mo'i dkyil 'khor la/ 
173a4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i las ni khyad par du// nges pa nyid ni sbyar bar bya// zla ba mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dang // bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi la// rang khyim rnal 'byor ma mchod nas// phyi nas gtor ma brtsam par bya// rang 
173a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin de bzhin phyi rol dang // lus la gnas pa'i lha rnams mchod// shing gcig la sogs gnas rnams su// gtor dang btung bas yongs su mchod// de ltar gyur pa'i sngags kyis ni// rnal 'byor ma 
173a6(rgyud 'grel): kun mchod par bya// de ltar sngags kun ma shes par// sngags pas phyi rol spyod byed na// bskal pa bye ba brgya bsgrubs kyang // lha rnams mnyes par mi 'gyur ro// de phyir rgyud rnams thams cad du// 
173a7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis rtag sbas pa// rnal 'byor rgyud 'di thams cad la// dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu ru ni// 'di ni rgyas par byas pa la// nyon cig bzang po bdag gis bshad// oM zhes pas ni 
173a8(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i ngag/ shing gcig la sogs bdun du ni// rgyang grags gcig gi nang rol nas// shing gzhan dag ni rnam spangs la// shing gcig pa ni thams cad kyis// bshad pas shes rab mi 'gyur phyir// 
173b1(rgyud 'grel): lus ni shing zhes bya bar bshad// lag pa yal ga la sogs bya// rigs byed mtha' yas gsungs pa dang // rgyud gzhan dag las de skad gsungs// steng gi rtsa ba ya la ga'o// a shrad zhes gsungs mi
173b2(rgyud 'grel): zad pa// me tog 'bras bus yongs su brgyan// shing zhes bya bar bshad pa yin// lus kyi dbus na a gnas pa'i// gsang ba'i phyir ni mi shes phyir// lte ba nas ni sor bzhin// de la lus brten 
173b3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas// 'di las steng 'byung ya la ga gsum// shing gi bu gur yongs su ldan// lte snying smin ma'i dbus gnas par// thig le gsum ni gsungs pa dag/ steng dang 'og shu 'gro ba las// yal ga bcu 
173b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bar bshad// me tog 'bras bu rtag tu ldan// 'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// gang tshe sna las phyi byung srog/ shing gcig pa zhes bya bar bshad// gsang ba'i shing gi shing chen po// gsang ba 
173b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ni gnas na gnas// mu stegs nyan sogs thams cad kyis// shing de rnam par shes mi 'gyur// chos 'byung ba yi tshal chen por// de yi dbus su yongs gnas par// su tra rak+ta rang 'byung ba / 
173b6(rgyud 'grel): me tog 'bras bu yongs su h+yan// de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thar pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis// mngon sum nyid du bdag gis bshad// pa zhes bya ba 
173b7(rgyud 'grel): su krar brjod// ma ni raka tar yongs su shes// yi ge gnyis ni kun sbyor ba// dur khrod du ni rnam par grags// dur khrod shi ba'i tshal bu shes// yid dgas kyi ni gnas su bshad// gang yang pa yis bsdus 
173b8(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// gzugs dang kha dog mdzes pa'o// ma las byung ba'i gsum gyi dngos// de bzhi pa las byung ba'ang gsum// 'gyur ba drug po bsdus pa ni// dur khrod du ni rnam par grags// de phyir shi ba'i 
174a1(rgyud 'grel): tshal bu bshad// lus po yi ni brten byas pa// dbang po bcu po la sogs kun// 'dus pa dang ni khu bar 'gyur// sor ni dur khrod zhes byar brjod// rim gyis 'byung sogs ngo bo ni/ 
174a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bshad dang por gang gsungs pa// de lta bar ni gsang ba'i gzugs// shes rab pad ma'i mkha' khams sa// ri dgas 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis su// 'byung po thams cad byung ba'i gnas// dur khrod du 
174a3(rgyud 'grel): niyongs su brtag/ ri zhes bya ba'i ri bor bshad// lha rnams gnas su sa 'dzin te// lus kyang ri zhes bya bar brjod// gsum 'dus par ni yang dag ldan// dbang po bya yis yongs su gang // ri dgas 
174a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs sna tshogs ldan// lung rig gnas pa'i lha rnams ni// gtor dang bltung bas mchod par bya// srog kyang ri zhes bya bar bshad// rgyu dang mi chur bcas par 'dzin// 'bras bu shing gis kun tu 
174a5(rgyud 'grel): gang // ba spu rtsi yang phreng bas gang // chu ni yongs su 'bab par ldan// grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bsnyen pa// sa zhes pa ni pad mar bshad// rba zhes bya ba rdo rjes shes// ta zhes pa ni bde ba che// de byer 
174a6(rgyud 'grel): ril ri zhes brjod// gang yang ri yi phyogs gcig gnas// de la gnas pa'i lha rnams ni// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// dbang po sgo dbu'i gnas rnams ni// sna tshogs cho ga yi ni gnas// de phyir 
174a7(rgyud 'grel): cong rong zhes su bshad// srog gcong re cod rong ni// ka zhes pa ni lus kyi dngos// de ni srog gi rlung gis gzung // de phyir tsang rong zhes su btags// ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu 'bab pas// b+ha gtsang 
174a8(rgyud 'grel): rong zhes su gsungs// gang yang 'dod chags zhu ba yi// khu ba yi ni gzugs su gnas// ka zhes pa ni myos pa'i mdog/ da zhes pa ni zhu ba'i bdag/ ri zhes pa ni dga' ba'i bdag/ cong rang de ni de 
174b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar bshad// phug ni phyi nas bshad tshul gyis// sgrub pa po yi gnas su gsungs// bye ba brgyad cu'i rnal 'byor pas// gang du gnas ni rab brtags pa// de ni phug zhes bya ba'i ming // lus kun de dang 
174b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra bar gsungs// rkang pa'i mthil nas skye bo'i bar// gsang char khyab parlung gi gzugs// rtag tu rlung gi gzugs su gnas// phug zhes bya bar bshad pa yin// gsang pa'i gsang bar gnas pa'i lha// de ni lha dang mi la gsang // 
174b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud dang rgyud ni thams cad las// sba bar gsang ba yin par bshad// skye bo'i gnas las grong 'dab du// gtor dang btung bas mchod par bya// dbang po'i grong gi kun du gang // 'dab ni lus la rnam par 
174b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas// rang gi bdag po'i lha bsgoms la// nus pa yis ni mchod par bya// lus kyi grong khyer spyi bor gnas// 'dab ni mtha' yi rnam par gnas// dbang du gnas pa'i nang gi gang // grong gi 'dab zhes bya/ 
174b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bshad// grong khyer gang la gnas pa ni// skye ba'i byin gyis bslabs las 'byung // shes rab dbyings kyi dngos po ni// grong khyer bya ba'i ming du gsungs// rtse gcig pa dang rtse gnyis pa// gsum po dang/ 
174b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bzhi mdo ru// lha yi mchod pa sngar bshams te// lam du gnas te mchod par bya// las bcu la ni gnas pa ni// lam zhes pa ni lus la gnas// gcig pa rtogs pa las byung ba// gnyis po gnyis kyi/ 
174b7(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gyi// sum mdo theg pa'i khyad par du// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag shes bya// srog ni sum mdo zhes su gsungs// gsher dang dmar ser skam pa yi// bzhi mdo ru ni shes par bya// skyer ba la sogs rnam pa bzhi// steng dang 'og 
174b8(rgyud 'grel): ge khyad par gyis// sum mdo zhes ni yongs su grags// steng du tshangs pa'i lam zhes bya// de bzhin 'og tu khyab 'jug dran// drag po dbus su rnam par shes// lam ni gsum po dag tu bshad// gru bzhi// 
175a1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan kun ldan pa// gsang ba yi ni pad mar gnas// gru gsum lam gsum du shes bya// gnyis kyi gzugs su gnyis su 'gro// gang tshe dngos po gcig gyur pa// 'gro ba rnams 
175a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gnas kyi dngos// de ltar lam gcig shes bya ste// thar pa yi ni gzugs su gnas// btab pa'i lam ni yongs thob pa'i// zhing brgyad du ni gnas par bya// shin tu dgod dang spyod pa'i gnas// de bzhin 
175a3(rgyud 'grel): du ni rigs kyi ri// rgyal ba dang ni nye rgyal dang // de bzhin rab mchog chu yi gnas// char pa'i rtse dang de brgyad dang // de dag zhing zhes bya bar grags// gnas de dag tu 'dug nas kyang // gtor ma a lis mchod
175a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// zhing gi 'gram na gnas pa ni// nye ba yi ni zhing du bstan// zhing brgyad dag ni gnas rnams ni// lus la gnas pa'i bdag gi bshad// zhing brgyad dag ni gnas rnams ni// bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin 
175a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis// rim pa ji bzhin bdag gis dkrol// shin du rgod pa kha la gnas// spyod ma'i gnas ni smin ma'i mtshams// rigs can rna ba dag tu brjod// rgyal ba sum mdo yi ni bdun// nye rgyal de bzhin snying gar 
175a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// rab mchog sna yi rtse mo la// chu yi gnas ni mig tu shes// char pa'i rtse mo spyi bor gnas// san do ha ni sdom par gsungs// gsang ba yi ni pad mar gnas// ze 'bru dang ni ze bar ldan// 
175a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// de lta bas na brgyad du shes// ye shes dbang phyug ma dang ldan// lus ni zhing zhes bya bar gsungs// zhing ma shes rab tu shes bya// rnam pa kun gyi stong pas na/ 
175a8(rgyud 'grel): khyim stong du ni rab tu bshad// de na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni// cho ga snga mas mchod par bya// dngos po thams cad rnam spangs pas// lus kyang stong pa nyid du brjod// khyim stong zhes pa lus la bzung / 
175b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas lha rnams bsgoms nas ni// sna tshogs mchod pa drug cho gas// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis mchod// gzugs kyi stong pa de nyid ltar// na Ti bcu po'ang de bzhin no// de la gnas 
175b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes ni// yid kyi sbyor bas mchod par bya// stong pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis// gnas gang la ni rab gnas par// chos 'byung zhes bya ba yi khyim// ye shes rnam shes dag dang ldan// de la 
175b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i lha mo rnams// me tog chu yis mchod par bya// sgrub pos dngos grub thob pa'i phyir// gsang ba las kyang gsang ba ste// gang dang gang du gang bsnyen pas// de phyir bsnyen pa zhes su 
175b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// de dag las kyang gnas d+hu ru// gnas nas kyang ni mchog tu 'gro// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal ba'o// 'gram du phyin pas chu 'gram gnas// rab dga' la sogs sa brgyad dang / 
175b5(rgyud 'grel): legs pa'i blo gros dang bcas dgu// zhing brgyad khyad par du brjod pa// zhing dgu'i bdag por shes par bya// 'dod pa srog zhes bya bar shes// sa bon zhes bya dbang phyug go/ 'dod pa las byung nga rgyal 
175b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa che// 'dod pa'i spyi bor yongs gnas te// rkang pa nas ni spyi bor khyab// 'dod pa sum mdor bab pas ni// der ni 'gro ba gsum po rmongs// sa la sogs pa de bzhin drug/ 
175b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa yi ni gzugs su gnas// gzhan du bdud rtsi lnga yang brjod// dbang phyug dang sogs dngos grub brgyad// mi rnams gang gis sgrub byed pa// chu ngul sogs sgrub par bstan// 'dod pa lus 
175b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi yan lag ste// de nas glang chen zhes su bshad// gnas de dag na gnas pa nyid// lha rnams su ni rab grags pa// lnga po lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi// sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya// dbang po 
176a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// ji srid dbang ldan mtshams bar du// g.yas dang g.yon du bskor ba yi// rim pa rgyas pa shes par bya// dang po drag nag zhes bya ba// rkang pa yi ni mthe bong 
176a2(rgyud 'grel): bar// dus med drag po zhes grags pa// lha mo yi ni 'khor gyis bskor// gsang ba'i gnas su drag chen dang // lus kyi yan lag kun la khyab// lte ba'i gnas la lha byin te// sgyu ma yi ni gzugs kyi tshul// snying 
176a3(rgyud 'grel): gar gnas pa'i nag po che// sku mchen mo mchog gi mchog/ gtsigs pa kha yi phyogs gnas te// rdo rje mtshon ni mtshon chen po// 'jigs byed mchul brtag tu gnas// 'bar ba'i me dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ 
176a4(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo gnas padag pa dag pa che// tshangs pa bug las rnam par byung // sna yaM bar du rtag gnas pa// bgegs kyi rgyal po gtso bo che// de dag mtshams su gnas pa ni// dbang ldan la sogs rim pa 
176a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// tsa murti ni mgo ba'i gnas// 'ba' tili ni shing la brten// Ag+ho tsing ni sum mdor gnas// de nyid gsum po laM gsum bzhi// mgo zhes bya ba sgra chen po// bcu gnyis kyis ni mtshams su 
176a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas// shin tu rgod pa rgod chen po// bgegs med kyis ni rnam par 'joms// pi bang tsha yis 'joms pa ste// snying ga yi ni pad mar gnas// lha mo sgyu ma zhes su grags// 'gro rnams smos pas 
176a7(rgyud 'grel): rmongs par bshad// lha mo u mgrad par gnas// glad pas mi tshugs 'dod pa ma// rgyal mo lha tshogs lha mo che// na laM yi ni gzugs su gnas// pus me byin pa nag po sogs// bzhi po dag ni chen po 
176a8(rgyud 'grel): yin// dbang mo la sogs lha mo'i tshogs// snying ga yo ni pad mar gnas// gzugs la sogs pa'i bye brag drug/ reg bya yi ni gzugs su gnas// ze 'brul ni a yi gzugs// rdo rje sems dpa' 
176b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bzhugs// ngag 'phrog la sogs lha mo che// nye ba'i ngan long bzhi por 'dod// ngag 'phrog ma ni gsar bar gnas// 'bar byed ma ni spyir gnas te// sreg ma dang ni 'tshed mar byed// dbang phyug 
176b2(rgyud 'grel): chen mo me'i gzugs// 'jigs byed ma ni rkan la gnas// rlung gi gzugs can dbang phyug dag/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi lha mo ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang 'dus pa'i tshul// lce yi rtsa bar gnas pa'i rtsa// de ni

176b7(rgyud 'grel): dri dang gos la sogs// lus kyi de nyid la gnas te// rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag tu mchod// ji ltar de nyid rjes 'brangs te// de yi gtor las cho ga bshad// khrag ni rab tu mchod sbyin che// chu yi gnas ni de
