181a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par bya// kha dog sngon po drag chen mo// sbrul gyi rgyun gyis rnam par klubs// bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa yi// zhal gsum po ni spyan gsum mo// ha tar bzhad cing 'tshig pa ste// na 
181a2(rgyud 'grel): bza' dmar pos shin du mdzes// kha T+wAM gyen du bsgreng ba dang // gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid// gsum pa na ni rdo rje thogs// g.yon pa dril bu sgra sgrogs shing // gnyis pa na ni snod nyid de// gsum pa de bzhin ral 
181a3(rgyud 'grel): bri 'phyar// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru// dbus su mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya// oM yo ga shud+d+ha sarba d+harma yo ga shud+d+ho haM// ye shes kyi ni shar phyogs su// bdag gi chu las byung ba yi// sum las rdo rje 
181a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro bsgoms// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// skra grol bas ni rnam par klubs// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// phyag na kha T+wAM rnal 'byor snod// shin 
181a5(rgyud 'grel): du mdzes pa'i na bzas klubs// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o// ye shes kyi ni byang gi char// bdag gi me las byung ba yi// bruM las byung ba'i drag mor bskyed// kha dog ser mo shin tu mdzes// sems dpa' 
181a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ni skyil krung bcas// skra grol bas ni brgyan pa ste// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sku la na bza' mdzes pa mnapas// phyag gnyis kha T+wAM rnal 'byor snod// ye shes kyi ni nub phyogs char// bdag 
181a7(rgyud 'grel): gi rlung las byung ba yi// yuM las mkha' 'gro rol ngas ma// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can// kha dog dmar po kun tu 'od// kha T+wAM rnal 'byar snod bsnams shing // sgra sgrol bas ni mdzes pa ste// lus 
181a8(rgyud 'grel): kun sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar bar bsam// ye shes kyi ni lnga yi char// sa yaM ye shes las byung ba'o// hUM las mkha' 'gro gtum mo bskam// 
181b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can// kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes// kha T+wAM rnal 'byor sdod bsnams shing // rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// skra grol bas ni shin tu mdzes// ha nyar rgod pas 'jigs 
181b2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o// dbang ldan gyi ni phyogs kyi char// seng ge'i gding ni bsam bya ba// kha dog dmar zhing ser ba ste// glang po ya ni stan la bzhugs// rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzubs 
181b3(rgyud 'grel): can// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// me mtshams stag mo zhes bya ba// rin chen bdun gyi stan la bzhugs// phyag gnyis kha
181b4(rgyud 'grel): dog dkar zhing sngo// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// phyag na lcags kyu brgyan pa ste// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// 
181b5(rgyud 'grel): bden bral lha mo ce spyang mo// ha ha bzhad pas 'jigs par mdzad// ma he yi ni stan la bzhugs// mdog ni dmar zhing sngo ba ste// sku la na bza' mdzes pa gsol// phyag gnyis lcags kyu zhags pa dang / 
181b6(rgyud 'grel): sdigs mdzub kyis ni shin tu mdzes// sbrul gyis rgyan zhing rnam par klubs// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// rlung mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo// kha dog ser zhing dmar
181b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ste// klu yi stan la yang dag bzhugs// rgyan yang de nyid sbyar bar bya// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can// sdig mdzub lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar
181b8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// dbus kyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyi// phyi rol dag ni rnam bzhi la// shar du mkha' 'gro phu las bskyed// phyag gnyis kha dog dkar po ste// yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ 
182a1(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gyi rgyan gyi klubs pa ste// shin tu drag cing skra grol ba// 'od zer sna tshogs yang dag par// lag gnyis kha ru bcug nas ni// ha har bshad pas shin tu 'bar// byang du 'bar ma pheM las 
182a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// kha dog ser po shin tu drag/ spyi bo'i steng du lag pa gnyis// thal sbyar mar me lta bur 'bar// drag po'i gzugs can 'tshig pa ste// shin du mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan// yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs// 
182a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer me ltar 'bar ba bsgom// nub tu 'jigs byed pr-i las bskyed// kha dog dmar mo 'jigs su rung // yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' rgyan// lag gnyis snyim par sbyar byas 
182a4(rgyud 'grel): nas// khrag gi rgyun ni 'thur bar mdzad// me ltar 'bar zhing shin tu gsal// 'jigs byed drag mo bsgom par bya// lho ru 'phrog byed bri las byung // kha dog sngon po kun tu 'od// yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ 
182a5(rgyud 'grel): skra grol bas ni brgyan pa ste// shin tu 'bar ba'i na bza' brgyan// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis klubs pa ste// sdigs mdzub dang ni bdun shing thogs// sems can sems ni rmongs par byed// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing 
182a6(rgyud 'grel): drag/ kun rigs pas ni thams cad bsgoms// de nas ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas// bsrung bar bya ste/ mgo bor ni k+ShaM ngo // mig tu ni hUM ngo // sna dang rna ba gnyis la yuM ngo // khar suM mo// mgrin par s+t+wa~M ngo // 
182a7(rgyud 'grel): nam tshong du s+t+raM ngo // snying gar b+h+rU~M ngo // lte bar Sh+TaM ngo // de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas// sangs rgyas la bskul bas lha mo mang po byung ste/ dbu rgyan dang bum pa la sogs pas dbang bskur bar 
182a8(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo// bdag gis dbugs kyi 'od zer gyis// mkha' 'gro ma rnams spyan drangs te// de dag gi ni gzugs mdun no// dam tshig rnams ni bstan par bya// khu tshur gnyis ni bcings nas su// dbu ma 
182b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni brkyang nas su// rtse mo phan tshun sprad nas ni// ye shes lha mo bstan par bya// lag gnyis phan tshun sbyar nas ni// dbu ma dang ni mthe bong sprad// cung zad cig ni bskyod par bya// shar phyogs rdo rje ma la bstan// 
182b2(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur mnyam par bcings nas su// mthe bo gnyis ni brkyang byas la// byang gi phyogs nas brtsams nas su// rgya 'di drag mo la bstan bya// phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas su// mthe'u chung gnyis ni brkyang bar bya// nub 
182b3(rgyud 'grel): du gnas pa'i ro langs ma'i// phyag rgya ru ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas su// gung mo gnyis ni brkyang bar bya// lho phyogs phyag rgyar bshad pa ste// de ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings 
182b4(rgyud 'grel): nas// khro bo gnyis ni brkyang nas su// rtse mo sprad de gnas pa ni// mtshams bzhi yi ni phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis thal mo khang bcug nas// phum zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya// shar phyogs mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yin// 
182b5(rgyud 'grel): lag g.yon thal mo kha sbyang nas// spyi bo ru ni bzhag par bya// byang du gnas pa'i 'bar ma la// phyag rgya 'di ni brtan par bya// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas su// kha ru bcug ste hUM zhes bya// nub phyogs lha mo 
182b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed ma// phyag rgya ru ni sbyar bar bya// lag gnyis kun tu bskor nas su// sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo ru// gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag nas kyang // lho phyogs 'phrog byed ma la brtan// bskyed pa'i dus su 
182b7(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ma ste// phyag rgya'i dus su oM dang ni// sA hA'i bar du spel te bzlas// dam tshig lha mo rnams la ni// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// g.yon pa snying gar gzhag nas su// g.yas pa mchan khung gzhug bya/ 
182b8(rgyud 'grel): ba// dam tshig sems ma rnams la brtan// sngags ni oM hUM swA hA zhes so// de ltar ye shes sems ma dang // dam tshig sems ma rnams la ni// dam tshig so sor bstan nas kyang // gnyis su med par 
183a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya// da ni mchod pa 'byung ste// khro bo dang mthe bong sbyar la// lhag ma brkyang ste/ oM puSh+pe mA le hUM sAr+tha/ me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// me tog gi phyag rgya las dbu ma bsgred 
183a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // oM d+hU pe shwa ri hUM swA hA zhes pa ni bdug pa'o// khu tshur las mthe bo brkyang ba dang // oM badz+ra tISh+Tha dI pe hUM swA hA// zhes pa mar ma'i'o// lag pa g.yas brkyang ba dang // oM hUM swAhA zhes pa ni sngags dang 
183a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/ gung mo'i rtsar mtheb mo bskyod pa dang // oM ku ru ku ru ma hA ba la~M hUM sman/ zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyi nas mchod pa nyi shu yin// ye shes can gyis 
183a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya// d+hu zhes bya ba'i gru thang zhing // rnal 'byor maM kun mnyes par bya// rdo rje'u tshur gnyis bcings la// rked pa'i mtshams su bzhag nas ni// yan lag gsum du hUM gis bskyod// pi wang tshul du 
183a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgreng ba dang // gling bu'i tshul du 'bud pa dang // zang dung tshul du 'bud pa dang // dkrol ba'i tshul du dkrol ba dang // pa Da ha ltar brdung ba dang // gar gyi tshul du bskyod pa dang // bsil yab tshul du g.yob pa 
183a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // rgyal mtshan tshul du bskyed pa dang // bla re'i tshul du bri ba dang // ba dan tshul du 'phyar ba dang // gdugs kyi tshul du dgab pa dang // rdza rnga'i tshul du brdung ba dang // rnga zlum tshul du brdung ba dang // 'dzum pa'i 
183a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bzhad pa dang // kho bo'i tshul du khro ba dang // sgeg pa'i tshul du sgeg pa dang // 'gying ba'i tshul gyis rol pa dang // phyag 'tshal tshul du 'dud pa ste// mda' 'dren nu ma 'khyud pa dang // nyi shu'o// rnal 'byor 
183a8(rgyud 'grel): ma brgyad de nyid kyis// dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya// hUM zhes bya bar bdag sprul nas// hUM gi glu ni blang bar bya// rgyud las byung ba bzhin du ni// bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bya// rdo rje'i de nyid dang ldan pas// tshigs bcad 'di yis 
183b1(rgyud 'grel): blang bar bya// rdo rje gsor ba mdzes pa yis// sems can rnam thar bsgral bar bya// rnam thar chos su bya ba ste// rdo rje shin tu snying po mchog/ de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i dril bu 'dis blang ngo // oM badz+ra g+haN+Te hU~M 
183b2(rgyud 'grel): ho// oM badz+ra d+hat+te ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta saM pra ra Ni ta sarba bud+d+hak+She tra kra tsa li te/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta nA tha swa b+hA be na badz+ra d+ha ra hri da ya/ a ba san+to Sha ni hUM hUM hUM/ gos no/ a a a/ swA hA/ gnas brgyad dril bu'i sgra sbags shing // 
183b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsor de rang las byung ba'i lha mos bstod pa ni// lus can don phyir shes rab gsol btab pa// kun 'khyud la sogs gnyis kyi sa gnyis sprod cing // sgyu ma lta bu sbyor bas shin tu brgyan// srid pa las 
183b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dga' ba'i mthu dang spyan gyis gzigs// yi ge'i dngos po rang bzhin stong par rol// dngos dang dngos med las sgrol dbu mas mkhyen// mi 'gyur kun bcom lhag ma sems

183b6(rgyud 'grel): denyid mkhyen// gzugs ma sdu ma sems can smin mdzad pa// rdo rje kun rtog chos kyi rmongs pa gcod// rnal ma ma rmongs snying chos tshogs la 'dud// sems can sgrol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag la bstod phyag 
183b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// thams cad bdag skyes ngo bo gcig la bstod phyag 'tshal// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i rmongs pa gcod la bstod phyag 'tshal// de nyid gcig la rtag tu bdag 'dud bstod phyag 'tshal// rang dgar sems can 
183b8(rgyud 'grel): dkrol ba yi// rgyu med dngos la 'dud par bgyi// ten hUM te na te te hUM/ ston ka'i zla ltar rab mdzes shing // dung ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa// te na hU~M ta na te te hUM/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can// gnyis 'khrud sbyor 
184a1(rgyud 'grel): ba 'dzin pa'o// de na hU~M nyen te te hUM/ sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi// 'gro ba 'dzin pa rgyu med dngos// te na hU~M te na te te hUM/ srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan/ 
184a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer rnon po stong ldan nyi ma stong 'drar ldan// rnam mar sku dang cha byad rjes chags sems dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchog/ rol gar mdzad pa zhes bya bas khyad par du bstod cing // glu dang bstod pas 
184a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas mnyes par bya// khar bar du hUM gi sgra dang dril bu bsgrags la smon lam rnam pa gsum gdab par bya'o// rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas// snying ga'i phyogs su btsir bar bya// oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA/ 
184a4(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha ba badz+ra shud+d+ho haM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+ho haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho daM/ zhes brjod la lha'i rnal 'byol la gnas par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin gyis skyon sngags bzla ste// 'phreng ba de nyid

185a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma la sogs sbyar bar bya// zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang // gsang sngags dbye dang bcing ba dang // phyi rol gtor ba'i de nyid kyis// gtor ma'i las la sogs pas bsgrub//

185a8(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas kyis bskud cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @#// dam gag sa rgya na se sapa/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la 
185b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// chu yi sbyin sreg rim pa zhig/ 'gro ba sems can don tu ni// cung zhig bstan par bya ba yang // khyad par bsgrub pa'i don du bshad// chu yis sbyin sreg ji ltar 'gyur// sgrub pa po ni the tshom skye// 
185b2(rgyud 'grel): mes kyang sdig sreg sdig pa sbyong // chus kyang de bzhin 'dra bas na// des na sbyin sreg ces bya'o// sa bzhi la sogs mtshan ldan par// shin tu yangs shing gru bzhi la// kun tu dris byug maN+Dal steng // bla re la sogs rkyen rnams bre// 
185b3(rgyud 'grel): dbus su chu yi snod sogs la/ dri ni dkar pos byugs nas ni// bum pa skyon bral yon tan ldan// dbyibs ni gru bzhi 'am zlum po la// thabs khung lta bu'i dbyibs can de// bcu bzhi kha tshang sum gnyis zabs// 
185b4(rgyud 'grel): chu dang 'o mar bsres pa yis// dri zhim chu yis dgang bar bya// kha ni shing lo sar pas brgyan// yang na bum pa brgyad sogs kyi// gzhung gi don du 'dod par shes// 'dir ni blo dman don grub gcig/ bdag nyid 
185b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mkha' 'gro ru// skad cig gis ni bskyed nas kyang // mchod pa la sogs bya ba'o// de nas stong pa'i ngang las kyang // cho ga gsum 'am skad cig mas// ye shes mkha' 'gro zhal gsum ni// bzhad dang 
185b6(rgyud 'grel): khro ba sgeg dang bcas// phyag gnyis rdo rje dbyug pas mtshan// sems dpa'i skyil krung rgyan gyis klubs// kha dog dkar po'i na bza' gsol// byin brlabs la sogs rdzogs byas la// chu skyon la sogs 
185b7(rgyud 'grel): med pa yi// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su// pad ma'i tshul du cung zad dbye// oM ka ma la be ha swA hA// pad ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor brgyan pa yi// pad ma chu yi nang bkod la/ 
185b8(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar po yis g.yogs pa yi// sa bon dbus su bsgom par bya// rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi// sa bon las ni gzugs su bskyed// sku mdog la sogs gong dang 'thun// sngags dang 
186a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas spyan drangs bstim// lag gnyis phan tshun khu tshur bcings// 'dzub mo gnyis ni brkyang nas su// mdzub mo gnyis ni mdud par bya// dam tshig phyag rgya rab tu grags// oM 
186a2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o// me tog bdug spos dri la sogs// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// g.yon pa snying gar bzhag gnas su/

186a4(rgyud 'grel): steng rdo rje yi// cod pan la ni gtor bar bya// gsang sngags lan re bzlas nas su// lan re skyong bas dbul bar bya// lan grangs khri yi las kyis ni// thams cad rig cing tshe 'phel 'gyur// ka ra bi ra'i me 
186a5(rgyud 'grel): tog dmar// ngur ba dang ni ldan pa yi// las ni khri phrag byas pas ni// khyim rnams zhi bar rab tu grags// na ga puSh+pa'i yam shing ni// 'o mas spangs te dbul bar bya// las 'di khri phrag byas pa yis/ 
186a6(rgyud 'grel): grong ni zhi bar byed par 'gyur// pad ma yi ni yams shing rnams// khri phrag tu ni bzlas nas su// las rnams kun la sbyar byas nas// yul phyogs zhi bar byed par 'gyur// pr-i yang ku dang bil+la dang // de
186a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ut+pal ku mu da// rgyal po las la sogs sbyar na// pha rol yul 'khor 'joms par 'gyur// sngags pas rtag tu sbyor chu gtor// brgya rtsa brgyad du gtor byas pas// bye brag tu ni rgyas par 'gyur//

186b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka yi// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyong // me dang 'dra bar chu yis kyang // sdig pa 'dag pa kho nar gsungs// bdag gi 'di byas dge ba yis// sems can ma lus thams cad kyang // sdug

190b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni/ oM TuM hUM swA hA/ oM hUM swA hA/ sngags de go rims bzhin du bcings pa dang lan gsum du bcing bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra tu Shu ho zhes bya ba'i sngags des thal mo lan gsum du ga dbas nas dga' 
190b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// de ni bdag bsrungs pa'i cho ga'o// de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcas nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste mig sna rtse la bzhag nas dang po la 'og nas 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i 
190b8(rgyud 'grel): lha'i skus brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor dmigs nas dri la sogs pas mchod par bya'o// de la sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yin te/ nyi ma'i lag pa phye nas su// dud pa dri ma gsum bsgreng ste// oM ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha 
191a1(rgyud 'grel): ar+g+haM hUM swA hA/ nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang nas su// dkar po ye shes sbyar bar bya// sngags la/ oM pra ba ra sat+kA ra pra tIts+tsha hUM swA hA/ ji ltar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam byas te rim pa ji lta 
191a2(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin du me tog dang spos dang mar me dbul bar bya'o// yang na sngags dang phyag rgyas dri zhim pa la sogs pa mchod par bya'o// de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya sbyar bar bya'o// nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang bsgrengs 
191a3(rgyud 'grel): nas// dri yi phyag rgya dang por sbyar// oM hUM swA hA/ dri'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dkar po ye shes legs sbyar ba// me tog phyag rgya rnam par bsgom// oM suM swA hA/ me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// 
191a4(rgyud 'grel): dung dang pad+ma bkug nas su// spos kyi phyag rgyar rab tu sbyar// oM a swA hA/ spos kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// nyi ma rdo rje khu tshur la// mthe bong gyen du bsgreng bar bya// oM kuM swA hA// mar me'i 
191a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya'o// nyi ma'i lag pa phye nas su// dbus kyi sor mo bsgreng bar bya// oM i swA hA/ lA shos kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong bskyod cing // oM g+hu swA hA/

191a7(rgyud 'grel): yang phyag rgya yang phyag 'tshal ba gsum pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste/ pany+tsa DA ki ni pU dzo pas+thA ya At+ma ta tsiR+Ya tA ya si/ oM A tsar+ya pU dza u pa s+thA na ya At+ma ta niR+Ya dA ya mi au sa ka la satwa pa ri tra nA yAng+ga ta nir+Ya twe//

191b3(rgyud 'grel): dag dus 'di nye bar gzung nas su// snying po byang chub thob pa'i bar// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// mchog tu bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po yis// byang chub tu ni 
191b4(rgyud 'grel): nges byas pa zhig/ tshul khrims rnam gsum bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don bya'i tshul khrims kyang // so sor bdag gis brtan po gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang

191b7(rgyud 'grel): po 'byung ba yi// pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi// sdom pa thams cad dang ldan pa// ci ltar nus pa mchod pa'i las/

195b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha thams cad dgug par bya'o// gong ma bzhin du mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ dkar po dang gi wang spel la/ oM s+t+waM/ swA hA seng ge ma'i sngags dang phyag rgyas

196a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyar nas pad+ma ma kha bye ba'i tshul du bya'o// oM tiSh+Tha A sa na hUM swAt+ma sngags dang ldan pa sa lha thams cad gdan la bzhugs par 
196a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas rim pa 'dis phyag rgya bzhi bstan par bya ste/ rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams te/ oM yo g+haM ba ra dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma yo haM/ pad+ma ye shes sbyar bar bya// sa yi 
196a3(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dang rnam shes sbyar// gnyis ka lu gu brgyud du ni// lhag ma ba dan tshul du bya// dri ma gsum dang dud par sbyar// rtse mernga bo rdo rje 'dzin// snying po'i sngags de rnal 'byor nam+b+ha mkha' byin gyis

196a6(rgyud 'grel): bcings te// gnyis ka rgyab gnyis sbyar bar bya// aM k+ShuM swA hA drag mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// khu tshur gnyis ni sbrel nas su// kha ye phyogs su dkrol bar bya// oM yu swA hA ro langs ma'i sngags

196b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya dam bcings te/ dud pa dri ma gsum bsgreng ngo // oM b+h+rUM sAtra stag mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de yis phyag rgya brtan bcings te// sa gdugs dang ni pad+ma spel// oM y+m+R+YuM swAhA ce spyang ma'i sngags 
196b2(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// phan tshun lan gsum gdab par bya'o// oM b+hUM swA hA 'ug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// gang gi lha mo dgu rnams ni// snying po phyag rgya sngags/

200a8(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems dpa' ting 'dzin mchog/ rdo rje rdo rje chen po'i stobs// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i mchog/ bdud dang bdud ni rab 'joms pa// kun gyi khro bo khro chen po// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos 
200b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes mchog/ rdo rje hUM byed hUM byed pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug nor bu sbyin// chags pa chen po bde ba che// 'dod pa thar pa nor chen po// srid gsum 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog/ 'jig rten gsum 
200b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog khams gsum la// mi g.yor ba mchog mi gsal ba// shin tu phra ba rab 'dus pa// g.yo dang rab mchog thob pa yi// srid dang 'khor ba bdag byed pa// thog ma med pa tha med pa// 'dod 
200b3(rgyud 'grel): chags dag pa ting 'dzin mchog/ sna tshogs 'dod chags dbang phyug che// nam mkha'i mtha' las rtag pa'i don// 'byung ba chen po kun gyi gzhi// longs spyod dpal gyi rgyal po gtso// 'dod pa thams 
200b4(rgyud 'grel): cad rdzogs byed pa// phyag 'tshal bstod de phyag 'tshal bstod// gus pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grub bstod// bdag gi cho ga ma tshang ba rnams ni bcom ldan 'das la bzod 
200b5(rgyud 'grel): par gsol// khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzod// dngos grub gsol nas ci bder gshegs// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'dir ni gshegs su gsol// phyi rol lha rnams// 
200b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang se gol gsum dang sngags 'dis btang bar bya'o// oM gats+tsha gan+d+ha hUM swA hA/ ji ltar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams rang gi dbugs kyis drangs nas// rang gis lus la bzhugs te/ rang gi gnas la 
200b7(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya'o// 'di lta ste spyi bo dang mig dang rna ba dang lce la go rims bzhin du drag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdol pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang // ro langs ma'i mkha' 'gro ma dang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams/ 
200b8(rgyud 'grel): dgod do// seng ge ma dang stag mo dang / ce spyang ma dang / 'ug pa ma rnams go rims bzhin du mgrin pa dang // dpung pa gnyis dang snying ga dang / lte ba rnams la dgod do// sgo ba bzhi ni brla g.yas 
201a1(rgyud 'grel): / g.yon dang rje ngar la'o// puk+ka si la sogs pa go rims bzhin du lce'i thig le'i steng du puk+ka sI la sogs pa bstim par bya'o// brang la sogs pa'i yan lag lnga la ni drag mo la sogs 
201a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bstim par bya'o// kha'i gnas su byin gyis brlab nas gtum mo la sogs pa bstim par bya'o// so'i phreng ba dang lce la yang thod phreng ma la sogs pa bstim par bya'o// de dag gi bdud rtsil sogs 
201a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snod ni lus la byin gyis brlab par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi lha tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug la sogs pa ni ba spu'i bu ga dang rkang pa la sogs pa la go rims bzhin du thim// keng dus 'jigs byed la sogs 
201a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug ni rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dbugs dang 'od zer la thim par bya'o// snying gar sgeg mo// nu ma'i bar du dri chab ma'o// mgrin pa la dri pi wang ma'o// mgo bo la 
201a5(rgyud 'grel): me tog ma'o// so'i phreng ba gnyis la dbyangs ma'o// gsang bar spos me ma'o// dpung pa gnyis per gar byed ma'o// mig gnyis la mar me ma'o// gzugs kyi rnam pa 'am ngo bo nyid du rnam 
201a6(rgyud 'grel): par ram/ dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo rnal 'byor nam mkha' bdag go/ zhes nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o// bsrung ba dgod pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang // go cha bgo ba byas nas rdo rje ra ba la sogs 
201a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bsams nas bzhag par bya'o// nyal ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang rtag tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas lha dang bdag gi sbyor ba bsgom/ de dag ni shin tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o// 
201a8(rgyud 'grel): de nas longs spyod rnal 'byor pa bzhin du ji snyed dam tshig gi rdzas de dag gis rdzogs kyi 'khor lo'i zas rim pa mchod pa 'dis bya'o// yi ge hUM gis dga' bar bya ba dang / yi ge yu~M gyis dag par bya 
201b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / yi ge hUM gis mkhregs par bya ba dang / yi ge suM gyis bdud rtsir bya// yi ge hUM gis ro mnyam por bya ba dang / pad+ma'i snod la bzhag la nyi ma'i lag pa bdud rtsi'i snod bzhag nas/ zla ba'i 
201b2(rgyud 'grel): lag pa'i mthe bo dang srin lags dang ri rab tu bsgom/ oM ha/ ho/ hrIHsa bon gyi sku gsung thugs gzugs dang dri dang ro dang dpa' bo lha gsum gyi bdag nyid bzung 'dzin spangs pa'i rang bzhin dkyil 
201b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi lha re re'i 'khor lo la mthe bong dang srin lag gis 'thor 'thung gis sbyin par bya'o// de nas mchod nas phyag byas te de nas rang gis lus la gnas pa'i lha dang 'khor lo'i lha ji ltar dga' bar tshim 
201b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// de kho na bzhin du tshogs kyi 'khor lo chog la yang sbyor ba gsum gyi rang bzhin lha'i sbyor ba la gnas nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la mchod par bya'o// 'di lta ste dpral ba dang spyi bo dang lce'i 
201b5(rgyud 'grel): mol thig le gsum byin nas ji ltar bde bar bya'o// de ltar mngon sum du dga' ba yul gyi mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod nas/ yongs su rdzogs pa la gong ma bzhin du 
201b6(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs pas rdzogs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// tshigs bcad bzlas nas gtang bar bya'o// tshigs bcad ni 'di lta ste/ oM ba ba bat+tA li bat+tA li che/ oM kuru 
201b7(rgyud 'grel): ku ru bat+tA li ma hA bat+tA li swA hA/ dur khrod gnas mo dngos grub zhal// gtum mo 'jigs byed yi dgas kha// dam tshig sring mo khrag dga' ma// ki li ki li sgra sgrogs ma// dur khrod du yi tshal dbus 
201b8(rgyud 'grel): su// tshogs dang pho nya bcas pa ru// 'jig rten gtum mo dud sol ma// gsol zhig bzhengs shig dam tshig ma// gnas nas dbang du mdzad du gsol// tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi ku ru du tra oM pr-i ha kri sa sarba 
202a1(rgyud 'grel): duSh+TaM b+hak+Sha phuM pheM phreM pr-i phaT swA hA/ rdo rje dam pa bcings nas su// dkar po gi wang bsgrengs nas su// gnyis ka rtse mo bkug nas ni// kha yi 'gram du bzhag par bya// 
202a2(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma gtor ma byin gyis brlab// dud pa sol ba zhes bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' dang ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po
202a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang po'i sdes mdzad pa rdzogs so// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i btsun mo dang 'dus las// dpal ldan dga' ba bzhi 
202a4(rgyud 'grel): ston pa// 'jig rten gsum po bskyed pa'i mgon// sna tshogs gzugs can de la 'dud// gdan bzhi'i rim pa las 'ongs pa// 'khor lo bzhi la yang dag gnas// de nyid bzhi zhes gang bshad
202a5(rgyud 'grel): pa// de ni bdag gis gsal bar bri// dag byas bde ba'i stan gnas te// mdun du bder gshegs yang dag mchod// blo ldan ma lus stong bsgoms nas// rgyud las gsungs pa bsam 
202a6(rgyud 'grel): papar bya// lhun po'i rtse mor khang brtsegs ni// shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong // der na byang chub sems nyid las// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms par bya// rkeng pa'i mthil du gnas pa yi// 
202a7(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu// ji srid lte ba'i mtsho skyes su// rim gyis steng du 'gro ba ste// de nas me yig las byung ba// me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum tshul// 'di ni bdag dang kun bsregs 
202a8(rgyud 'grel): nas// sna tshogs nam mkha' mtshungs par bsam// de nas sngags dang mtshan ma yi// cho ga rim pas lus su bsgom// seng ge'i stan la gnas pa yi// ri bong can gyi 'od 'dzin 'phro// 
202b1(rgyud 'grel): me dang chu yi dbus gnas pa// sna tshogs pad+ma yid 'ong ba// der ni kun tu rnam 'gro ba'o// sde tshan dang po bsam byas te// grangs dang kun da zla 'dra ba'i// 'od zer tshogs ni shin nu bsil/ 
202b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas tshogs chen rnams 'phro ba'o// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu'i 'od// ye shes lha mo'i bdag nyid gsal// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid// dbugs kyi rlung la zhon nas su/ 
202b3(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' san+ta yi bdud rtsi mthung // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya dang ni chos kyi khams// gzhan yang mig dang rna ba dang // sna dang lce dang lus dang yid// rnam shes drug dang 'byung ba dang / 
202b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung las gyur dang phung po lnga// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba'o// 'gro ba thams cad de las byung // shar dang lus ngan phyogs su ni// dbyangs yig dang po gnyis pa dgod// nub du bcu pa'i mtha'
202b5(rgyud 'grel): ma ste// lho yi 'dab mar de yi mtha'// mkha' 'gro ma dang drag mo'i gzugs// ro langs ma dang gtum mo'o// seng ge stag dang ce spyang mo// 'ug pa mo sde mtshams bzhir dgod// dkar dang ser 
202b6(rgyud 'grel): dang de bzhin dmar// sngo dang sngo bsangs bzhi pa'o// mtshams su kha dog 'dren ma ru// ma ning las skyes bsam par bya// zhal gcig phyag gnyis shin tu drag/ lha yi rgyan gyis shin tu klubs// 
202b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum khro zhing bzhad pa ste// kha T+wAM ga dang mi thod ldan// mtshams kyi lha mo g.yon na ni// sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa bsdams// ral gri lcags kyu dgra sta dang // dbyug pa rnams te phyag 
202b8(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na'o// lha mo rdo rje cod pan can// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// mi yi pags pa'i bla gos dang // sgeg pa yi ni nyams kyis mdzes// mche ba can dang cod pan can// ngang pa 
203a1(rgyud 'grel): ci bgyi phyogs kyi gdan// mtshams su seng ge stag gdong dang // 'ug pa dang ni ce spyang ngo // mkha' 'gro ma dang mar me ma// 'jig ma 'phrog byed rang rgya can// ro dang nyi ma'i 
203a2(rgyud 'grel): stan bzhugs pa// rang gi gnas kyi mdog bzhin bsam// me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog/ bya grub shin tu dag rnams las// sangs rgyas gzugs su bskyed nas su// rang gi rigs kyi phyag 
203a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gdab// gang zhig phyi rol dkyil 'khor dga'// de yis de dag lus bsgoms nas// dbyangs yig dang po thig le'i gzugs// sngar bstan bzhin du lta bar bsgom// bdag nyid de ltar
203a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas su// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sngags kyi bdag nyid ma bsten par/ las rnams bya bar nus min pas// ji srid snang ba mthong ba'i bar// rnal 'byor can gyis
203a5(rgyud 'grel): de srid bsgom// mtshan ma thob na myur du ni// rtag tu grol ba'i dngos grub 'gro// kha snga mig dang rna ba ni// rang gi lag pas bsdams nas su// ma yengs blo yis bltas nas ni// yang dag/ 
203a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas thig le mthong // rlung dang me dang sa dang chu// 'khor lor sgyur ba'i thig le ste// de yi mtshan nyid shes byas nas// las ni ji bzhin sbyar bar bya// dkar po snang na zhib pa bya// ser 
203a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing dmar bas rgyas pa ste// sngon pos na dkyilas ni bya// ngu ba'i medog gis bskrad cing gsang // lag gnyis gsang bar mnyam gzhag ste// mchod rten 'og tu thur sel la// ka sha'i yi ge 
203a8(rgyud 'grel): bltas nas su// shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas bsam// mig gnyis sna rtser bltas nas su// rlung gis lte bar gsal bar bsam// gzugs ni stong par bstan byas na// yid bcing 
203b1(rgyud 'grel): ba yi dam pa yin// rnam par snang mdzad dbyangs dang po// de bzhin sangs rgyas lngar ldan pas// rang gi lha yi sbyor bas ni// 'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya// drod mtha' rtse drag bcas 
203b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // de nyid dgu pas brgyan pa dang // me la gnas shing i yis brgyan// 'di yis rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab// oM AHhUM swA hA/ bzlas pa'o// ha ho hrIHbyin gyis pa drab pa'o// 
203b3(rgyud 'grel): a A aM aHrai r-I laM l-I// phuM pheM phreM pr-i/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sa bon no// rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor la// gnas pa yi ni thod pa la// lus las byung ba thems cad bsam// zla ba
203b4(rgyud 'grel): zhu ba'i tshul du 'gyur// de nas zla ba bar snang 'dzag/ pad+ma'i dbang phyug shin tu mi dog mdzes shing // rnam par snang mdzad dri zhim btung bar mdzod// phyag na rdo rje ro bro rdo rje dbang // rnam 
203b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum lha gsum du ni gzung bar bya// lte bar me yi rang bzhin bsam bya ba// 'od gsal 'od zer dra ba'i tshogs 'phro ba// nyi mar gnas la dag pa'i blo yis ni// bsregs pa'i lha la gtor na 
203b6(rgyud 'grel): gos mi 'gyur// nang gi sems las sprul pa yis// bdag gi gdan gyi sgom pa dang // sngags dang thig le'i de kho na nyid kyi dum bu ste dang po'o// // ye shes lus su bsgoms nas ni/ 
203b7(rgyud 'grel): thur sel rlung ni bsdams nas kyang // steng du drangs te bsdams byas la// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i brtan par bya// chu shing me tog lta bu'i rtsa// snying gar gnas shing 'og tu blta// sna tshogs 
203b8(rgyud 'grel): pad+mas mdzes pa la// sa bon dag gis dgod bya ste// de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ dbyugs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon// gya gyur rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ga 
204a1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag dam tshig rdo rje ste// mgo ni rin chen rgyal po yin// thig le sgra dang bcas pa ni// sangs rgyas gtso bo zhes byar grags// zla ba'i zer ltar dri med pa'i// rigs 
204a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis khyab pa'i 'od zer 'phro// gal te sna tshogs bsgrub 'dod na// shes rab can gyis 'di bsam bya// de nas drod kyi gsum pa dang // brgyad kyi mtha' dang bdun pa yi// dang po de bzhin drod 
204a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtha'// sgra dang bcas pas yang dag brgyan// shar gyi phyogs su mkha' 'gro ma// de bzhin byang du drag mo bsgom// nub kyi phyogs su ro langs ma// lho phyogs mkha' 'gro gtum mo ste/ 
204a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon du bstan pa'i mdog bzhin du// phyogs kyi 'dab mar bsgom par bya// mtshams su kha dog 'dren ma ru// brtsegs pa'i sa bon bzhi po bsam// yan lag brgyad kyi go cha gang // sngags 
204a5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyi rnal 'byor ldan// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs pa'i// sngags de dag ni blta bar bya// las bzhi yi ni gnas skabs la// rjes su 'thun pa'i mi shigs bsgom// de bzhin las bzhi 
204a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub byed pas// lus kyang kha dog bzhi ru dgod// zhal gcig phyag gnyis la sogs pa// zhal phyag ji snyed 'dod par bya// drag la khro bor bsgom par bya// zhi ba la ni zhi ba'i lus// rlung dang 
204a7(rgyud 'grel): me yi steng du ni// nyi ma la gnas drag po bya// sa chu zla ba la gnas te// zhi ba'i las ni bsgom par bya// oM su~M k+Shu~M yuM hUM hUM/ skr-in+d+he m+muk+Sh+mAM/ phuM pheM phreM pr-i/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa bon no// oM hU~M TaTad+ha 
204a8(rgyud 'grel): hU~M ts+tshatrA~M su su mu A A A phaT phaT laT/ thubargyad kyi dug dkrig pa'o// ma~M hrI ba~M tra~M AH/ zang byed dkrug pa / che ba la pa rag thu pra pra paH/ dam tshig srung ba'i/ 
204b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'di bris nas// dpung par btags ste/ srung pa/ mos/ nad pa nad las grol gyur zhing // dus la bab pas mtho ris 'gro// rdo rje 'dzin mar snyom zhugs nas// gzhan gyi gdan ni 
204b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa ste// dngos grub sna tshogs byed pa'i gdan// dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gnas// tshes gcig sogs la rkang g.yon gyi// mthe bong sogs 'phel mgo bor gnas// de nas g.yas
204b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi cha la ni// zla ba'i rigs kyi 'ju bar 'gyur// rlung dang me dang nyi ma la// gnas pa'i rang la sa bon blta// thams cad dbang bskur phyag rgya ni// blo dang ldan pas gsang sngags kyi// sbyor ba 'di
204b4(rgyud 'grel): yis slob ma dbab// ra ma ram du hUM badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya oM AM hUM hri/ sngags 'di gnas bzhir bkod nas su// rdzas bcu dag ni gzung nas kyang // 'bum du bzlas nas bsgrub par bya// 
204b5(rgyud 'grel): de ni kha ru blugs tsam gyis// slob ma myur du babs nas ni// gang gis 'khor lo'i steng du ni// shin du myur bar 'khor zhing gnas// des ni 'gro ba sgyu ma dang // smig rgyu lta bus mthong bar 'gyur// snying 
204b6(rgyud 'grel): gar rdo rje bkod nas su// tiSh+Tha badz+ra zhes brjod la// zhing bar shes nas mi g.yo zhing // byang chub sems ni brtan par gyis// zhes brjod do// ri dgas dbang zhon rdo rje gzhu dang mda'// thogs shing 
204b7(rgyud 'grel): rang 'od btsun mo thod pa dril// bsnams pa'i zhal gsum phyag drug mdog sngo ba// snying ka'i phyogs su rnam par bsgom byas nas// rdzogs ldan yi ge 'bum phrag gcig du bzlas// gnyis ldan 
204b8(rgyud 'grel): dus su sngags pas 'bum phrag gnyis// gsum ldan la ni sum 'gyur bya ba ste// rtsod dus bye ba gsum dang 'bum phrag bzhi// le lo'i nyes pa phan min gdams ngag dang // spro ba nyams dang 
205a1(rgyud 'grel): yul la chags pa dang // dad pa dang bral dge ba'i rtsa ba nyams// de dag thub pa'i ka ni 'grub mi 'gyur// nang gi sems las sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa 
205a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i/ gzhan gyi gdan gyis bsgom pa'i de kho na nyid de dum bu gnyis pa'o// // sbyor ba'i gdan la gnas pa yi// 'dab ma bcu drug pad+ma che// gnas der gnas pa'i lha mo 
205a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// sna tshogs gzugs can yi dga' ma// yi ge'i dbang phyug dbus sa bon// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// ma mo'i tshogs dang yang dag ldan// ri dgas mtshan ma'i bdud rtsi 'dzin// 
205a4(rgyud 'grel): shar du ma mo gsum yin te// de bzhin byang du rnam pa gsum// nub kyi phyogs su'ang gsum yin te// lho yi phyogs su rnam gsum dgod// mtshams su ma ning sa bon rnams// sngon bzhin 
205a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dren mar shes par bya// phyogs kyi 'dab ma'i sa bon rnams// phyogs kyi bder gshegs mdog du blta// mchod rten rtse mo'i sgo ru ni// blo ldan yi ge'i dbang phyug bsam// de 'od bdud rtsir 
205a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzag pa yis// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bkru bar bya// de yi 'og tu 'bab 'gyur bas// sa yi bu gar thim par bya// bdud rtsi char pa las byung des// lha mo thams cad bskyangs par 'gyur/ 
205a7(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni// srid pa stong nyid bsgoms byas nas// mngon gsum sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'di ni sngon por bsgom 'gyur na// 
205a8(rgyud 'grel): nad dang sgra dkar 'byung mi 'gyur// dbang chen la gnas bsam nas ni// dpung rnams thams cad bcings par 'gyur// dkar po'i mdog gis ltas mkhan dang // dri ma med pa'i snyan ngag 'gyur// / 
205b1(rgyud 'grel): zla drug tsam du goms pa yis// dngos grub 'dir 'gyur the tshom med// ye shes lha mor 'dun 'khyud pa'i// rdo rje sems dpar rnams bsgoms la// dngos grub kun byed gdan dang ni// sngags 
205b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol son shes bya// 'di ni sbyor ba'i gdan shes bya// rnal 'byor thams cad yang dag 'byung // snying po las kyang snying po sbyor// sangs rgyas ye shes sgrub byed pa// thub pa'i dbang ba 
205b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ste// gdan de 'dod pa thams cad pa'o// de las longs spyod spyad byas na// der ni chags las khyad par 'gro// steng gi lam du 'bar ba dag/ ji snyed mgrin pa'i bar du dmigs/ 
205b4(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par 'khyud nas lha mo rnams// gang yang mgrin par yang dag rig/ g.yas g.yon gyi ni mthe bo yis// steng du 'gro ba btsir bar bya// rgyas pa'i 'og tu spyod pa yis// bde ba dam pa 
205b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs par bya// thog mtha' spangs pa'i skad cig ste// der ni dngos po dmigs mi 'gyur// byang chub sems ni bde ba che// rang rig pa ni skye 'gyur ba// brjod las ring du song ba ste// mthong 
205b6(rgyud 'grel): med gang na'ang gnas pa min// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtson pa yis// bsod nams las ni rang gis rtogs// de lta mod kyi lus dang ni// bla ma'i man ngag gis mtshon bya// de nyid kha dog med 
205b7(rgyud 'grel): cing mtshan nyid med// thub dbang 'chi ba'i gnas skabs lta bur rtogs// dag pa'i lus su bsgoms nas sngags kyis ni// man ngag ji bzhin sgo rnams bsdams nas su// rnam shes sa bon 
205b8(rgyud 'grel): rlung la yang dag gnas// tshigs dgu nas ni steng du 'pho bar bya// 'khor ba'i rga mtsho 'jigs rung ba'i 'dam du bying ba yi// 'che zhing rmongs par 'gro bar zhugs gang yin// nyi ma stong gis mngon
206a1(rgyud 'grel): shes drug ldan lus// bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur// nang gi sems las sprul pa'i sbyor ba'i gdan gyi bsam gtan gyi de kho na nyid dang / bdag med ma'i mngon par byang/ 
206a2(rgyud 'grel): chub pa dang / gong du 'pho ba ste dum bu gsum pa'o// // rI yi rtser gnas ge sar dang // sna tshogs 'dab ma 'jam pa la// de yi dbus gnas dpa' bo ni// 'dod don thams cad sgrub 
206a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// 'byung po kun gyi gnas yin te// thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu yang yin// lus can kun la khyab pa ste// thams cad thams cad bdag nyid gnas// haM gyi sa bon yang dag 'byung // 'jig 
206a4(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum bskyed gtso bo yin// yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag nyid te// rin chen sna tshogs 'bras bu 'byung // mtshan ma sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur bcas// rlung bskyod 
206a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la zhon nas su// rtag tu lte bar 'gro 'ong byed// mgo bo mtha' na rlung dkyil 'khor// gzhu yi dbyibs ltar gnas pa ste// steng dang 'og gi rlung la ni// 'dab ma bzhi po yang dag gnas// lce dang 
206a6(rgyud 'grel): rkan ni sbyar nas su// rtag tu sgra dang bcas byed pa// gcig tu gyur cing thim 'gyur ba// der ni phyag rgya chen por brjod// 'jug pa'i rlung ni bsdams nas su// steng du drangs te sbyar bar bya// ji srid
206a7(rgyud 'grel): ldog par 'gyur bar du// rnal 'byor pa yis brtsir bar bya// ji ltar maral mar blugs zhing // ji ltar chu la chu blugs dang // nam mkha' dang ni nam mkha' bzhin// rang gis rang ni rig par 'gyur// 
206a8(rgyud 'grel): 'jug dang 'byung dang gnas pa ni// dal zhing dal ba'i rim gyis su// cha med dge ba rab zhi gnas// rang bzhin med pa nyid du 'gro// ye shes 'di ni rang rig ste// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// 
206b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis ni// de nyid rnal 'byor can zhes bya// kun tu dga' la sogs rim dang // nyer bstan la sogs bye brag dang // rnal 'byor la sogs rim pa yis// bla ma'i lung las 
206b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog du bde// sa bon med cing sgom pa med// rang bzhin stong pa gnas med pa// ma lus bsregs par gshegs par bya// khyad par 'gro ba'i bde ba gang // gang phyir chags pa'ang rnam rtog ste// 
206b3(rgyud 'grel): chags bral de yi dri mar bcas// gti mug spangs pa gang yin pa// gnyid log sad pa bzhin shes bya// sa 'og sa steng mtho ris su// skad cig gcig gis sku gcig 'gyur// bdag dang gzhan gyi rtogs/ 
206b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// bcing bar nus pa ma yin no// sngags kyi rjes 'brangs man ngag shin tu bstan// gang yin dngos rnams chu zla lta bur blta// yul la mngon zhen dag ni bzlog 'gyur zhing // thub pa'i dbang po'i 
206b5(rgyud 'grel): lam ni nye bar 'gyur// rang gi sems nyid bdud yin pas// de bas sems ni dbang du bya// rang sems dbang du byas nas ni// bdud dang dragra dag yod ma yin// dper na ge sar dri zhim la// mos 
206b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bung ba pad nang du// nyi ma nub pas bcings nas su// sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur// de bzhin bla ma'i lung ni nyi ma nub pa'i sems can gang // 'khor ba rab 'jigs rab rib bde ba'i
206b7(rgyud 'grel): zhags pas bcing gyur pa// de shar ba yis de kho na nyid lam ni nyer mtshon nas// rjes su 'thun pa'i lam gyi go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ dper na zas la longs spyod dang // 'dod la mngon par zhen/ 
206b8(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin// de bzhin du ni goms byas pas// dngos kun stong pa nyid du mthong / 'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa yis// gdan bzhi pa yi de nyid bzhi// dgra las rgyal ba'i slob dpon gyis// rang gi myong ba 
207a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bris// gdan bzhi pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par byang chub gtan la phab pa ste dum bu bzhi pa'o// // dpal gdan bzhi pa'i de kho na nyid bzhi pa slob dpon dze tA ris
207a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang // bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gos lha bcas kyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // @6/ dpan na du rnam par gzhag pa bzugs sa/ rgya gar skad du/ 
207a3(rgyud 'grel): ShaT ta tA bya ba sbran/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid drug rnam par gzhag pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// // dpal ldan khyab bdag lnga yi dngos// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma btud de// 
207a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i bka' bzhin nyer brten te// de nyid drug 'di bdag gis byas// gsang rgyud 'phags pa gdan bzhi las// btus te slob ma blo zhan la// phan phyir dad pas 'di byas kyang // mkha' pas dpyad cing 
207a5(rgyud 'grel): bzod par gsol// rdo rje dril bu bgrang phreng dang // ye shes dang ni rnam bzhi la// bdud rtsi 'od dang mchod rten gnyis// bsnan te drug du shes par bya// dang po rdo rje brnams pa ni// bkrol te lag pa 
207a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis brkyang nas// pad+ma'i lag skor lnga byas te// pus mo g.yas g.yon steng du bzhag/ lag mthil gnyis la bsgom pa ni// g.yas su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang // g.yon du zla ba'i dkyil 
207a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dag/ ma dang a las bskyed par bya// de sted rdo rje dril bzhag nas// hUM dang a las bskyed par bya// A li kA li yi sbyor ba yis// thabs dang shes rab dngos su ni// rtogs te de 
207a8(rgyud 'grel): nyid bsgom par bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i de nyid ni// bsgom pa'i man ngag 'di lta ste// rdo rje'i steng gi rtse lnga la// rigs lnga'i lha dang sbyar bar bya// dkyil gyi rtse mor rnam par snang mdzad// shar gyi rtse 
207b1(rgyud 'grel): mor mi bskyod ma// lho rtser rin chen 'byung ldan te// snang ba mtha' yas nub tu dgod// byang du don yod grub pa bsgom// de 'og pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// byang chub sems brgyad shes bya ste/ 
207b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i phyag dang byams pa dang // nam mkha' mdzod dang kun tu bzang // phyag na rdo rje 'jam dpal dang // sgrib sil dang ni sa snying po// lha rnams brgyad po 'di dag ni// ji bzhin phyogs su bsgom 
207b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// dbus kyi sgo nga lta bu la// ye shes lnga ni bsgom par bya// de yi phyi rol phyogs bzhin// lcags kyu la sogs rnam bzhi bsgom// de 'og 'dab brgyad pad+mar yang // sgeg mo la 
207b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs brgyad bsgom pa// rgyud las sbas nas ma gsungs kyang // man ngag don gyis shes par bya// 'og gi rtse mo rnam lnga yang // bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma lnga ste// dbus kyi ye shes
207b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma// shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// de bzhin drag mo byang phyogs te// ro langs ma ni nub kyi rtser// lho ru gdol pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje de nyid lha mor bsgom// de ltar sum cu rtsa gcig ltar// 
207b6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs te rdo rjer bsgoms nas ni// hUM gi dbyings 'di blangs byas te// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya// hUM mdzes pa'i rdo rje gsor nas su// sems can thar pa la ni dgod// rnam par bar/ 
207b7(rgyud 'grel): pa chos kyi don// rdo rje snying po 'dzin par bya// hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho des ni 'khor ba bcod 'gyur te// nyon mongs mun pa bsal byas nas// bla med byang chub thob pa dang // ye shes snang ba 'thub par 
207b8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// rdo rje'i de nyid mi shes na// byang chub dngos grub ring du spangs// rdo rje dag par ma gyur na// brgya byin mtshon cha rdo rje 'dra// de nas dril bu'i de nyid ni// nang gi nam mkha'i khams la ni// byang 
208a1(rgyud 'grel): chub snying po gnas pa yin// mtshan nyid med par spangs pa ni// bum pa shes rab bdud rtsi'o// de steng 'dab brgyad pad+ma la// sa bon brgyad las lha mo brgyad// shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste// na 
208a2(rgyud 'grel): bza' dkar mo byang gi phyogs// nub tu ma ma ki zhes bya// de bzhin lho ru sangs rgyas spyan// me yi mtshams su skul byed ma// rdo rje lu gu rgud dbang ldan// khro gnyer ma ni rlung mtshams su 
208a3(rgyud 'grel): bden bral mtshams su rin chen sgron// lha mo de brgyad dbus su yang // shes rab pha rol phyin ma ste// pad+ma rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ma// gzugs rdzogs 'od dang ldan par bsgom// steng gi 
208a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// sngon bzhin sgeg mo la sogs brgyad// rtse lngar mkha' 'gro ma lnga bsgom// dbus kyi lce ni ye shes to// thams cad 'du dang 'phro bar byed// nyi shu rtsa gnyis lhar sbyor ba 
208a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i dril bu 'di// sngags 'di dag ni bzlas nas su// phyogs brgyad dag tu lan gsum dkrol// oM badz+ra dar me ra ne ta pra ra ne te sarba bud+d+ha pra tsa li ti pradz+nyA pa ra mi te/ na tra saM b+hA ba 
208a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho a swA hA/ shes rab chos kyi dril bu 'di// sangs rgyas thams cad slar byas nas// mi shes 'dam la bying ba yi// sems can sangs rgyas don du bkrol// de nyid sbyor ba 
208a7(rgyud 'grel): dman na ni// dngos grub ring du mtshon pa ste// de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// glang chen dril bu bkrol ba 'dra// de nas bgrang phreng de nyid kyi// yang dag cho ga shes par bya'o// shel dang nya phyis 
208a8(rgyud 'grel): mu tig dang // dkar po la sogs gzhan yang rung // zhi ba'i las la khyad par gsungs// gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang // pad+ma'i snying po rgyas pa yin// gur kum la sogs dri yis ni// 
208b1(rgyud 'grel): byugasas pa'i ri lu dbang la smos// ru rag sha dang lung thang dang // mi rus mngon spyod zhes su gsungs// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod la// bo de tsas ni las kun byed// de yi grangs ni 'di lta ste// 
208b2(rgyud 'grel): nyis rtsegs shes par bya// g.yas pa'i lag mthil nyi ma la// a yig dmar po bsgom par bya// g.yon gyi lag mthil zla bo la// hUM yig dmar po bsgoms nas su// sa bon de gnyis
208b3(rgyud 'grel): las bskyed pa// g.yas sor rdo rje rtse lnga pa// g.yon ni pad+ma 'dab lngar bsgom// phreng ba gang yin dkyil bzhag ste/ rdo rje pad+ma stob par sbyar// rI lu dgra bcom bsgoms nas su/ 
208b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng thag lha dgur byin gyis rlabs// mdo 'dzin 'og ma mchod rten te// gong ma chos kyi sku ru bsgom// bgrang phreng de nyid bsgoms nas su// sngags 'di yis ni byin gyis brlab// oM ya te ya/ 
208b5(rgyud 'grel): ma hA dz+nyA na sarba bud+d+ha ma hA b+ha be ta/ hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho/ a swa hA/ chos kyi sku dang mchod rten la// dgra bcom bskor ba byed bsams te// mchod rten grib ma'ang mi 'god phyir// bsgyur log/ 
208b6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas phreng ba bgrang // phreng ba de rnams bgrang ba yang // so so'i khyad par gyis shes te// zhi ba'i phreng ba 'dzub la bzhag/ de bzhin rgyas pa gung mo ste// srin lag la ni dbang du bshad// / 
208b7(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod mthe chung shes par bya// sgrub pa'i lha gang dgug bsams te// mtho bong lcags kyus bkug pa bsgom// de yang lha mo g.yon pas 'dren// g.yas pas lha rnams 'dren pa yin/ 
209a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dag pa'i bskrang phreng gis// gang 'dod dngos grub 'grub par byed// de nyid med pa'i phreng ba ni// bud med rgyan gyis do shal 'dra// de nas ye shes de nyid// 'di ltar 
209a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag shes par bya// chos kun ye shes gcig pa la// khyad par ring thung gyur nas gnas// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang ni lha min dang // nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// rgyal 
209a3(rgyud 'grel): chen dang ni gang ba bzang // lto 'phye dang ni grul bum dang // mi dang mi min mkha' 'gro ma// byol song dang ni yi dgas dang // dmyal bar bcas pa'i sems can dang // byol song gzugs kyi 
209a4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par dang // phra mo sko nga 'dzin sogs pa'i// de rnams g.yo ba thams cad dang // mi g.yo ba yi rnam pa yang // sa chu me dang rlung gi khams// phra mo rtswa dang lo ma dang // rdo dang bong brtse 
209a5(rgyud 'grel): mo sogs// thams cad ye shes snang ba yin// de yang sems dang ldan pa dang // sems pa med pa gnyis su 'dod// sems dpa' dang ldan khyad par ni// ye shes bye brag 'di lta ste// 
209a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal chen sum cu rtsa gsum dang // 'thab bral dang ni dga' ldan dang // 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang // tshangs ris tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don// tshangs chen dang ni 'od chung dang // dpag/ 
209a7(rgyud 'grel): med 'od dang 'od gsal dang // dge chung dge rgyas tshad med dge/ sprin med dang ni bsod nams skyes// 'bras bu che dang mi che ba// ma gdung ba dang gya nom snang // shin tu mthong dang 'og min te// 
209a8(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa gsum lha rnams ni// ye shes rags shing zab pa ni// nyis gyur nyis 'gyur shes par bya// de yang rgyal chen ris bzhi nas// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed par du ni// 'dod pa lnga yi 
209b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dag/ gong nas gong du zab pa yin// lha min ye shes khro ba ste// yi dgas ye shes sme ba yin// gti mug ye shes byol song gi/ dmyal ba'i 'jigs pas ngu ba yin// mi yis/ 
209b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rnam lnga ste// glen pa dang ni 'on pa dang // lkugs pa dang ni byis pa dang // ye shes can dang rnam pa lnga// bye brag tu ni shes par bya// gzhan yang gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i// rtsa ba'i rgud

209b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas shes pas bskul ba'o// rnal 'byor gtsug lag las byung ba'i// ye shes de nyid mi shes te// phyi yi gtsug lag shes na yang // gar mkhan cha lugs dang 'dra'o// de nas bdud rtsi'i 'od de nyid// 
209b5(rgyud 'grel): man ngag 'di ltar shes par bya// ban da'amanya phyis la sogs pa// bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i yi// bdud rtsi'i 'od kyis bkang byas la// sngags dang phyag rgya dag par bya// g.yas pa zla dkyil

209b7(rgyud 'grel): dri ma gsal// hri yis mthu yang 'joms byed pa// rim pa de ni shes par bya// de ltar log pa bsal nas su// 'di ltar yang dag sbyor ba bsgom// gzugs na pad+ma'i dbang phyug ste// rnam par

210a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i mthil du zla ba bsgom// de dkyil bdud rtsi sa bon sum// bsgoms nas srin lag 'theb rtser sbyar// bdud rtsi'i dkyil du phyag rgya de// bzhag nas rim pa 'di

210b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas lha rten 'dra// de nyid drug gi rim pa 'di// phyi nang gang du sbyor na yang // 'gal ba med cing dngos grub ster// ston pas thun mongs bstan phyir ro// smi ti dz+nyA na kI ra na ti yi slob mas zhus pa 'di byas pa'i// 
210b8(rgyud 'grel): dge ba thob pa gang yin pa// de yis sems can sangs rgyas shog/ de kho na nyid drug rnam par bzhag pa// rgya gar gyi mkhan po smi ti dz+nyA na kI ra tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta de nyid kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// / 
211a1(rgyud 'grel): pal du 'chus chen po'i drud kyi 'brel pa 'gas so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mA yA tan+t+ra s+ya pany+tsi kA mA yA wa tI nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel sgyu ma can zhes 
211a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs la ci mi srun med// 'gro bas rgyal bar rab tu bsrungs// mi gtsang ba yi rnam rtog rnams// sdong ba dang ni tshang tshing rnams// bsregs pa'i me 'dra 
211a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom byas te// 'gro ba'i don ni bya ba'i phyir// nag tu rtse mo byed pa yin// las las phyir ldog gyur pa'o// sgyu 'phrul gzungs mi'i theg pa las// rgyal ba'i bla ma rgyal gyur cig/ don rnams ci ltar gnas pa/ 
211a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// tshig gnyis gsal bar mi ston yang // don rnams ji ltar gnas bzhin yin// rnga lta ji ltar gsungs pa yi// tshig las mi 'gal zla ba yis// byas pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel ni// sgyu ma can 'di 
211a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gyur cig/ sgyu ma chen mo rnam bshad kyi// tshig bshad rnams la bzo bar ni// bdag ni rab tu gsung mi bya// kye legs pa po nyid tshig 'di la// yongs su zhugs par bya ba min// don nyid snying por 
211a6(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bya// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang // gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi// yang dag gsang ba'i rgyud nyid ni// bdag gis rab du bshad la sogs// 'di dag gi ni tshig gnyis kyis// dbu 
211a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid bag ni 'dir mabyung // de nas yang ni tshig sgra gnyis// dbu ni stong pa ma lus sbyor// de ltar 'gal bar bdag gis go/ yongs bshad yongs su bshad pa ni// rtsa ba'i rgyud las gang gsungs pa/ 
211a8(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u// bcu pa nyid las nges par phul// rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'phros pa ste// yang na le'u nyid bcu gcig pa// de phyir bshad pa'i don gyi don// de dulha mo rgyud nyid 'di/ 
211b1(rgyud 'grel): de phyir gang nas byung ba bstan// rdo rje zhes bya mi shigs te// sems de nyid ni nam mkha' bzhin// bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa ni// sems ni nam mkha' yang dag bshad// skabs ni// 
211b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbyin pa'i phyir// de sems nam mkha' la ni 'phur// yang na yang dag 'gro ba ste// bskal pa'i dus bzhi ma byung las// lung dang bstan pa mi rtag go/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje nyid// 
211b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes gsungs so// de mthun rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sems nyid nam mkha' spyod par 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer can// de yi 
211b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams nyid la// rdo rje ma lus gsungs pa zhes// byA kA ra Na yod par gsungs// de nas sgra nyid 'di ltar sbyar// nam mkhar 'gro la rje zhes pa// dbyings ni de nas btags pa ste// 
211b5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la spyod grub thams cad// DA ke nI zhes bya bar grags// de dag gar na grags ce na// 'byung la sogs pa'i dbyangs las ni// mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba yi// de dag nyid kyi bshad pa 
211b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// de nas bshad pa 'di nyid ni// ma rig ri ni rnam par 'joms// rdo rje ye shes la sogs gsungs// nA zhes bya ba gsungs pa ni// mtshon pa'i skad la nA nyid bstan// skyes bu dag 
211b7(rgyud 'grel): ni thams cad grags// bde ba nyid ni thams cad rig/ shes rab ma nyid stong nyid bstan// de bas 'di ni snying rje stong // de dag nyid ni gnyis su med// byang chub sems nyid yongs su gsungs// 
211b8(rgyud 'grel): gtan tshigs rim pas gang nyid rigs// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams nyid// rnal 'byor ma rnams nyi shu bzhi// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// don nyid bshad pa'i grub pa'o// gsang 
212a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi// gsang ba rnams dang sku gsung thugs// 'khor lo gzugs kyis rnam par gnas// de nas dbang phyug la rnams gsum// gsang ba'i dbang phyug 
212a2(rgyud 'grel): rje dpon ma// de dag gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma// yang dag gsang ba zhes bya ste// sa la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga// de dag gsang ba mchog nyid de// rnal 'byor ma lnga rnam par dag/ gsang ba'i 
212a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni rnam par gsungs// sa yi khams ni ltung byed bshad// chu khams gsod byed mar ni grags// me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma// rlung khams gar gyi dbang phyug ma// nam mkha'i khams ni rab 
212a4(rgyud 'grel): tu gsungs// sgyu 'phrul chen po dbang phyug tsho// de rnams rnal 'byor ma lnga bstan// sgra yi sde nyid rgyud dngos te// sgra rgyud gnyis su med pa la// de dag yang dag gsang ba'i mchog/ de ltar 'di/ 
212a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rab tu gsal// de phyir 'khor lo gsum pa las// dam tshig mchog ni bzhi pa'o// ye shes pad+ma yang dag gnas// mkha' 'gro ma lnga smra ba po// yang dag gsang ba'i rgyud nyid rab/ 
212a6(rgyud 'grel): de don 'gugs pa rab tu bstan// de ltar rgyud 'di dag gis bshad// spros par bshad par bya ba'i don// yang na spyi yang gsang ba'i phyir// lha mo thams cad mi mnyam ste// 'on kyang gtso bo
212a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dang dbye// gtso bo dbang mo nyid byas la// rje dpon ma nyid so sor bstan// ma lus tshangs pa'i sgo nyid khyab// g.yo ba dang ni mi g.yo ba// khyab ces bya ba nyi tsher byas// ma lus zhes bya/ 
212a8(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed do// tshangs pa'i sgo nyid khams yin te// 'dod khams rgyal po chen po bzhi// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed man chad du// tshangs pa'i khams sogs bcu bdun te// gzugs kyi khams la
212b1(rgyud 'grel): skal bar bya// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang // 'du shes med pa'i skye mched dang // yod min med min skye mched dang // tshangs pa'i khams nyid de bzhin te// g.yo dang mi g.yo ldan/ 
212b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// g.yo ba zhes bya 'gro drug nyid// mi g.yo zhes bya mi 'gul rnams// de dang ldan par spyod pa ste// g.yo dang mi g.yo tshangs pa'i khams// gzhan gyi lta ba nyid la grags// mdzod 
212b3(rgyud 'grel): khams bshad pa'i rim pa yis// rlung gi phung po rim pa bzhin// yang kun 'gro dang rnam par 'gro// yang dag 'gro ba rab tu 'gro// so sor 'gro dang yongs 'gro rdzogs// de steng dbang phyug bdun 
212b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams gnas// rig pa'i bden bral dbang phyug dang // tshangs pa'i gnas dang tshangs pa'i zhi// dus kun zhi ba mthu yi sku// spyad sku nyid dang bdun pa rdzogs// de snyed rlung me chu dang sa// de ltar/ 
212b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad grub byas la// gti mug dar gyi blo gros dang // yon tan 'dod chags rig pa ste// smin pa sgyu ma mthar phyin te// sgrib pa bcu gsum de la gnas// de yi steng du brag bzang ste// de yi 
212b6(rgyud 'grel): steng du tshangs pa'i khams// gang dag gis ni thams cad khyab// gang gi sde dpon mar gyur te// a la la sde khams gsum khyab// bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo nyid// ya mtshan che yang ya mtshan che// 
212b7(rgyud 'grel): lha mo kun mkhyen rgyu la sogs// rgyu dang 'bras bu spyod pa las// skye ba'i rgyu ni skye ba nyid// dngos po rnams kyi skye ba'am// 'di nyid las ni skye ba'i rgyud// don mang gzung ba dbang po las// 'di ltar
212b8(rgyud 'grel): dbang gsungs shes par bya// lha mo thams cad gang nyid de// lhung byed la sogs lha mo bzhi// drag mo la sogs nyi shu bzhi// kha da'i zhal ma la sogs brgyad// de rnams thams cad lha mo nyid// 
213a1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rnams nyid sum nu drug// lA mo kun bzhin zhes su bshad// tshangs pa la sogs zhes bya gang // tshangs pa zhes bya rnam par snang // sku yi rdo rje 'phro ba las// stobs chen la sogs rdo rje sems// tshangs 
213a2(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya dpa' bo brgyad// de rnams kyi ni gang nyid lnga// spyan mi sdug la sogs pa yi// thod pa dum sogs yan cad du// sku gsung thugs la 'phro ba rnams// dpa' bo rnams ni bcu dang drug 
213a3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi// de rnams snang mdzad rim pa yin// tshangs pa rnams kyi rgyu ba'i rgyu// de nyid las ni byung ba'i don// ci ste chen mo mthu ldan nyid// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ma che// 
213a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ni de yang bstan par bya// 'di ltar the tsom mkhyen byas la// 'di nyid sgyu 'phrul chen mo gsungs// mi srid yon tan brtan pa mo// gang bshad chu ni 'phrin las bzhi// don phyir gzugs ni spangs 
213a5(rgyud 'grel): byas la// 'di rnams gzugs bzhin ldan pa ste// lhung byed ma ni sgyu 'phrul bzhi// 'di rnams las che sku rgyu che// 'di rnams las ni 'di nyid bzang // de nyid chen mor phyin gsungs pa// de 'di
213a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni gsang ba ste// de rnams 'byung ba'i bdag nyid gcig/ lhung byed la sogs 'di bzhi yin// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid ma// gsang ba chen mo de phyir yin// de phyir sgyu 'phrul chen mo gsung // 
213a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba rang bzhin yang dag gnas// rdo rje rje dpon ma nyid gsungs// rdo rje 'bras bu rdo rje mtshan// rje dpon ma ni sgyu 'phrul che// dbang phyug la sogs yon tan ldan// gzhan las de nyid dbang phyug ma// 
213a8(rgyud 'grel): de nyid chen mo dbang phyug che// yon tan ldan pa gcig pu min// bcom ldan sgyu 'phrul chen mo can// lha mo kun dang tshangs srog kyi// skyed byed ma ni bstan par gsungs// sgyu 'phrul drag chen la sogs/ 
213b1(rgyud 'grel): denyid bcom ldan sgyu 'phrul che// zag chen drag po las byed ma// lha mo rnams kyi bskyed pa'i rgyu// spu phyir de nyid drag mo min// 'di nyid yang ni drag por go// ci ste 'di nyid 'di ltar bsgyur// 'byung po nyid kyi sdud byed ma/ 
213b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po zhes bya srog chags nyid// khams nyid dag ni 'dus byed de// byed pa'i rang bzhin gal yod// de phyir 'byung ba sdud byed ma// dpyir bcom ldan 'das kyis ni// skye ba dang ni rab tu brlag/ gtan 
213b3(rgyud 'grel): tshigs nyid ni bstan pa la// stong zhid snying rje gnyis su med// yan lag gnyis ni so sor bstan// lha mo mang pos khyad par can// sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes par grags// de phyir the tshom za byas la/ 
213b4(rgyud 'grel): de ma thag tu tshigs su bcas// gnyis pa dran phyir de nyid gsungs// gang gis ma lus khyab la sogs// bcom ldan 'das mas 'di dag khyab// de dag nyid 'di sgyu 'phrul che// gang de nyid ni sku 'phrul 
213b5(rgyud 'grel): che// de nyid srid par yang dag khyab// 'di yi ye shes sku gcig khyab// gzhan yang byed pa gal te gsungs// 'di rnams de nyid kyis ni bsdu// bcom ldan 'das bde chen po yi// khams 
213b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum nyid ni yang dag bsdu// skyed byed ma phyir de nyid kyi// de nyid kyis ni yang dag go/ gsang ba rnams kyi gzung ma 'di// gsang ba po rnams sangs rgyas lnga// rnam par snang mdzad la 
213b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs nyid// de dag rnams ni yum nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyed byed ma// dri ma'i snying po las kyi phyag/ de dag nyid ni spang bar gsungs// ye shes phyag rgya ma rab rtogs// bla med byang chub 
213b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyu yi phyir// rgyal 'gro sbed byed ma ni bsgoms// legs ldan phyag rgya ma sogs nyid// bcom ldan 'das ma rdzu 'phrul che// legs ldan phyag rgya ma nyid 'thad// legs ldan phyag rgya ma nyid don/ 
214a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba po rnams dang ni srid// gsum las 'das pa rnams kyi ste// ci ste 'di nyid yum du 'gyur// the tshom za phyir 'di ltar gsungs// sgyu ma'i sgyu ma rnams grags sogs/ 
214a2(rgyud 'grel): bye brag 'di srog nyid kyis// kun gyis bskur nyid rnam par grags// mtshan gyi gtan tshigs med ma yin// ba dang glang ma de ltar don// khyad par nyid ni da ltar gsungs// 'dus pa dang ni rgya che nyid// 
214a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi rim pa gnyis// sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya gsungs// rtul ba skyed byed mthu dang ldan// de phyir rgyal ba rnams kyi yum// yum 'di nyid ni rigs yin te// 'on kyang byang chub 
214a4(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid 'di// sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ste// gang phyir don nges 'di ltar yin// de nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir// bshad pa'i rgyud las bstan pa nyid// tshigs su bcad pa'i sde gnyis gsungs// 
214a5(rgyud 'grel): a ra li nyid khu bar bskur// shes rab ma nyid bde chen gsungs// a ra li dang rnal 'byor ni// sgyu 'phrul chen mo de nyid gsungs// gal te bcom ldan 'das ma 'di// gsang ba rnams kyang
214a6(rgyud 'grel): skyed byed ma// lhas byin la sogs ma gyur te// rgya che 'di nyid skyon du 'gyur// the tshom mthong byas len gnyis gsungs// rig ma 'jig rten gsum nyid de// lus ngag yid dang sku gsung thugs// 
214a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum nyid gang gis grub// sangs rgyas nyid ni ma lus sbyor// 'jig rten gsum grub ye shes dngos// ci snyed chos nyid 'gro byed dngos// 'dod pa thams cad gzugs sgra rnams/ 
214a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa thams cad rab sbyin ma// bzlas brjod bsgom sogs nyon mongs pas// 'dod pa thams cad byin byed ma// 'di nyid mang pos 'bras bu gcig/ de phyir nyon mongs shes rnams 
214b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis// de ltar sbyin pa nyid ni bstan// gang gis rnam par shes tsam sogs// gang gis zhes gzhan med ces gsungs// sgyu 'phrul chen mo rnam par shes// rnam par khyad par shes tsam gyis// 
214b2(rgyud 'grel): yang na ci ltar 'di nyid de// the tshom go byas 'di ltar gsungs// rig ma ye shes phyag rgya ma// grub byed dbang phyug ma zhes bya// grub pa po ni mkha' 'gro ma// dbang phyug ma nyid he ru shes// 'di 
214b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar shes pa tsam gyis ni// grub pa po la bcom ldan grub// nyon mongs ma byas thams cad grub// grub pa po la rab tu bstan// rnal 'byor ma mo la sogs gang // 'khor lo gsum spyod rnal 
214b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma// sgrol gnas dang glul gnas// srang ma rnal 'byor ma mo brgyad// 'jig rten khams gsum gang nyid de// yul lus sa bcu nyi shu bzhi// de rnams 'dir ni 'dus byas la// sku 
214b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs ni 'khor lo gsum// khams gsum zhes bya rab tu bshad// ci snyed ma lus grub la sogs// ci snyed ces bya phung po khams// skye mched chos ni ji snyed do// de rnams ma lus ci// 
214b6(rgyud 'grel): yang grub// lha yi rnam pas grub par 'gyur// ci ste grub 'di gal te bzla// thams cad sgyu ma sprul pa yin// thams cad ces bya bar med gsungs// phung po skye mched khams rnams nyid// 
214b7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ma sngar gsung mtshan// sgyu 'phrul chen mo nyid kyis te// grub pa po nyid las ni spro// dngos ni ci ste grub mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma byed gang // sa yi khams la 
214b8(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dbang // rnal 'byor gyis ni thams cad tsam// dbang phyug byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid// rnal 'byor dbang phyug byed pa mo// de ltar sgyu 'phrul byed pa yi// sngon ma mthong ba'i rnal 
215a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis// gzhan gyis pho brang la sogs sgos// mi snang ba rnams gang nyid de// gzhan gyi pho brang gzhan gyi lus// thog ma'i lus ni mi bzung ba// mi snang zhes bya gzhan 
215a2(rgyud 'grel): mi mthong // 'di ltar bstan pa le'u las ni// seng ge rnam par rol la sogs// de dag bdag gis bshad par bya// yang na ci ste ming tsam gyis// las rnams byed par dga' ba gang // 
215a3(rgyud 'grel): gal te dbang ni bzla bar bya// rnal 'byor sgyu 'phrul rig pa sogs// rnal 'byor de dag yi ge nyid// sgyu 'phrul zhes bya sngags gzugs rig/ de nyid rnal 'byor sgyu 'phrul rig/ yi ge dang ni 
215a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags gzugs kyis// las rnams 'di ni gsal bar gsungs// rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu grub// bgazhad rkang pa mi rkos bstan// A li kA li rnal 'byor te// de nyid kyis mi 
215a5(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba myong // nyid kyi yon tan bstan pa ste// de nyid kyi ni sgyu 'phrul ltar// de yi rnal 'byor sgyu 'phrul te// de nyid kyi ni go bar byed// rnal 'byor sgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul rig/ yi ge zhes bya mi 
215a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te// sngags kyi gzugs nyid rab tu gsal// yi ge sngags kyi rang bzhin 'di// rnal 'byor rdzu 'phrul rig pa yis// yi ge sngags kyi gzugs kyi spro// spro zhes bya ba sngon dang 'brel// 
215a7(rgyud 'grel): ci ltar de nyid rnal 'byor rnams// gang phyir 'di ltar spro bar 'gyur// 'di ltar the tshom go byas gsungs// klog dang bsam par byed pa dang // ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom rnams sogs// 
215a8(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta mdor na go bar bya// rig pa klog pa byed ces bya// rnal 'byor sgyu 'phrul rig pa nyid// sngon gsungs las kyi mtshan nyid kyis// gang rig grub par rten byas la// klog pa tsam gyis// 
215b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur// grub pa po nyid bsnyen sogs te// dka' bar mthong byas mi spyod ste// 'di ltar the tshom go byas gsungs// bsnyen gnas dang ni brtul zhugs dang // nyon mongs mi dgos la 
215b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs te// 'di ltar las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ltar the tshom go byas gsung // bde dang dga' rnams la sogs te// bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab ma// de nyid kyis ni sgyu 'phrul che// thabs/ 
215b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan nyid he ru ka/ thog ma de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ shes rab zabs la sogs rnams kyis// thabs dang shes rab sgrub thabs la// lung 'bogs bdag gis bstan par bya// mdol 
215b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor nyid ni khyod// de ltar nyid ni bstan par gsungs// lte dkyil dpa' bo gnas la sogs// lte ba'i dkyil na zhes bya gang // lte dkyil sprul pa'i 'khor lo nyid// de nyid sprul pa'i 'khor lo la// 
215b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo bcom ldan a ra li// thams cad la ni de nyid med// 'on kyang gang phyir phyogs na bstan// ze'u 'bru spyod yul la zhes bya// ze'u 'bru 'dab ma drug cu bzhi// snying po bar gyi yan lag nyid// 
215b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba ma tshor ye nyid de// de yi spyod yul de dag la// ze'u 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul la// dus kun 'gro don mdzad ldan nyid// a ra li ni zhugs par 'gyur// 'di ltar the tshom go byas gsung / 
215b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dang sems min sems dngos la// thog med sems dngos don phyir sems// dge ba nyid la yang dag dga'// nyon mongs gnas skabs dbye ba'i phyir// bskul ba'i bdag nyid bsam pa 
215b8(rgyud 'grel): yis// yang dag rab 'byor min pa las// bskul ba med phyir skyes lta bur// sems dngos min par sgyur la sogs// the tshom go byas 'di nyid gsungs// sems dngos zhes bya bsam rig go/ 
216a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar dngos nyid 'di yis te// sems nyid rang gsal rang bzhin te// shes dang shes bya'i rang bzhin gang // go phyir ye shes thabs nyid de// snying rje shes rab rang bzhin te// shes 
216a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba bde mchog stong // 'di dag gnyis ni gcig tu bsgyur// shes dang shes bya rang bzhin te// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya nyid// gang na ci ste 'di ltar ni// bcom ldan 'das nyid shes 
216a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// 'di ltar the tshom go byas gsung // sangs rgyas bstan pa zab pa ste// de dag bdag gis bstan par bya// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyis ni// rab med phyir na za ba nyid de// sangs 
216a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams zhes sku gsung thugs// de rnams gang na bstan par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa nyid// bar na gsungs pa'i 'og gi gdan// ci ste stan byed gal te gang // A li kA li mnyam byed 
216a5(rgyud 'grel): ces// A li zhes bya a la sogs// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug nyid// kA li zhes bya ka la sogs// nganya gnyis ni dri mi rgyud// de nyid spang phyir sum cu gnyis// 'di ltar phreng gnyis kA li zhes/ 
216a6(rgyud 'grel): A li phyogs gnyis de nyid spyod// kA li phreng ba gnyis sbyor mnyam// grangs ni bcu drug rnam par bzhag/ A li kA li mnyam byas la// de na shar bu 'byor bya zhes// gnas na sangs rgyas bstan pa 
216a7(rgyud 'grel): la// pad+ma'i steng du zla mtshan phyed// yaM 'byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhon// r-i las byung ba phreng gsum gyi// shar bu shes rab ma nyid gsung // 'di dngos rang 'byung ma nyid gsungs// shes rab ma 
216a8(rgyud 'grel): gnas de las 'byung // de nyid kyi ni gzugs can ma// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la// las kyi rlung gis bskul bar 'bar// thams cad las ni grub byed ma// sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes byar grags// 
216b1(rgyud 'grel): skra rtse stong phrag yan lag ma// glog 'phro mnyam pa'i 'od byed ma// lha sku rnal 'byor rnam nyid la// ba spu rtse mo bu ga rnams// lha dang lha min 'jigs byas la// phyogs nyid thams cad ma la byung // snying
216b2(rgyud 'grel): chos 'khor lo bsreg byas la// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// de dag nyid la song bar bya// g.yas pa'i sna sngags byung bar bya// mdzod spu nyid 'gro bu ga la// phyogs bcu la gnas 
216b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams// de dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams// g.yon sna sbubs la zhugs byas la// spyi bor 'khor lo dag bsregs byas// rnam par ma lus dbyung bar bya// sngar gsungs bu ga/ 
216b4(rgyud 'grel): yis ni yang // spyi bo la ni rab tu 'jug/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bsregs pa yi// phyogs kyi de phyir dga' bar 'gyur// lto la dkyil 'khor 'od byas la// snga ma lta bu me 'gul te// shar bu steng du 
216b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar zhes bya// gsungs pa'i rim pas shar bu gzugs// steng du zhu 'gro gtan tshig 'di// shes rab ces bya gang phyir 'gyur// khu ba'i gzugs kyis zhu 'gyur sogs// ci tsam du nyid de ltar gzung // 
216b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi thigs pa'i gzugs can nyid// tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni// skye ba dang ni 'dug pa dang // grol ba'i phyir na bdud rtsi yin// thigs pa rnam shes kun gyi ni// yi ge bcu drug yang dag gsungs// / 
216b7(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug sgyu 'phrul chen mo ste// thigs pa lta bu yongs su bstan// dbyings yig sgyu 'phrul chen mo nyid// de nyid go phyir yang na gsungs// 'di rnams sgyu 'phrul chen mo gnas// de'i thigs pa 
216b8(rgyud 'grel): rnam shes ci// khams kyi don rnams bcu drug ni// de dag gzugs nyid theg pa'i gzugs// khams kyi nor rnams bshad pa yin// yang ni bdag gis bshad par bya// lha mo khyod kyis mod la 
217a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon// thigs pa'i gzugs ni 'di la yod// de phyir thigs pa'i gzugs shes bya// dbyangs dang 'dra bar dbyung phyir thigs// gang gsungs smra 'don bshad pa'i rgyud// gsang 
217a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig rnam par bshad pa la// ra zhes rak+ta'i khams la sogs// gi ri dzi na/ ga sha d+hA ba tra/ tA ga na d+ha/ ku suM tra ma ri Na/ a ri na/ bi sing+ga ra/ gun+du ra/ gat+taM ni de'i la// daM sa ga ra tsa/ swa g+ha re 
217a3(rgyud 'grel): dze ma// 'di rnams snying po ga pur 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul chen mo khams bcu drug/ thigs pa'i rigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// chu klung ne rany+dzan nyid// snyan dngags kyi ni rigs par 'gyur// sangs 
217a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan bstan pa la// dpa' bo gtam rgyud skabs 'di nyid// de nyid spang bya thigs pa bshad// thigs don rnam par shes ma byas// bcom ldan 'dis nyid dmigs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 
217a5(rgyud 'grel): dephyir thigs pa gsungs// de yi mtshan nyid dpa' bos bshad// shes rab yang dag sbyor la sogs// nyid mgo thigs gzugs zhu bar 'gyur// 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang nyid de// byang chub sems ni 
217a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can// dri ma'i phyir gzhan khyad par med// dug bzhi rnams ni 'dra bar gtam// 'di ltar the tshom go byas gsung // gang dbang po lam 'di nyid sogs// gang gang zhes bya 'dod pa yis// 
217a7(rgyud 'grel): la sags nyid dbang bar 'das// da dbang ba mas nyid de// gang dbang bas denyi la ma 'am// de yi mtshan nyid dang bzhin gyis// byang chub sems nyid rang bzhin gyis// yang dag 'ad 
217a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor zhes// yang dag ces bya thig gzugs can// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // 'dod pa zhes bya gzugs kyis ni// de nyid kyis ni yang dag bshad// de nyid 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor 
217b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid tshe gang // sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba// rnam snang mdzad sogs nyid dag ste// de rnams bya ba byas pas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par 'gyur// / 
217b2(rgyud 'grel): rang dang gzhan dang de bzhin gshegs// nyid kyi phyir na mnyam pa'i don// ci ste dri ma sangs rgyas 'gyur// thams cad go byas gal te bzlas// dam tshig chen po grub pa dang // ri lu chen po grub la 
217b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs// goms dang lobs dang mngon sum byed// de phyir 'di nyid dam tshig rnams// de nyid chen po dam tshig che// de ltar dam tshig chen po rnams// sangs rgyas rnam nyid rnam pa lnga// grub 
217b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dam tshig chen po nyid// ri lu chen po 'grub par bya// gang dag ri lu chen po 'grub// de dag grub pa nyid kyis ni// dam tshig chen po grub par 'gyur// gang nyid dam tshig chen po 'grub// dzaH 
217b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid ri lu yin// 'grub pa de yi zhes bya gang // rnam par bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs// sbrang rtse khrag dang ga pur ldan// khrag dang tsan dan 'byor par bya// tshogs kyi dkyil na rab tu bzhag 
217b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad las ni de nyid mchog/ ra sa ya na zhes bya ste// dam tshig chen po 'grub rgyu yin// rnal 'byor ri lu grub 'di nyid// ji ltar bya ba gal te bzlas// sgyu 'phrul chen mor rab sbyor bas/ 
217b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor sdom pa byed la sogs// sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya gang // de rnams dbyangs yig bcu drug yin// de nyid 'di na rab tu sbyor// so sor dam tshig sku gsung thugs// de dag nyid kyi 
217b8(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rnams// sgyu 'phrul chen mor rab sbyor gyis// rnal 'byor 'byor nyid longs spyod yin// dam tshig rnal 'byor sdom pa nyid// ci ste byed ces gal ter bzlas// yo byad rnam lnga 
218a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhes bya// spyod yul gang nyid yo byad yin// me tog spos la sogs rnam lnga// 'dod pa lnga nyid gzugs sgra sogs// de rnams kyis ni yang dag ldan// yo byad rnam pa// 
218a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga dag dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan// 'di rnams ci ltar rnyed pa bzhin// de ltar de rnams shin tu spyod// mi spang ba ni de nyid don// 'di ltar bsdoms pas ci 'gyur te// 'di ltar 
218a3(rgyud 'grel): the tshom go byas te// grub pa'i dbang po shes bya sogs// yang dag rtag pa'i bya ba nyid// rnal 'byor dbang pos shes par bya// bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid grub pa ste// dam tshig grub pa'i ri 
218a4(rgyud 'grel): lu nyid// grub pa 'di nyid 'bras bur gsungs// ri lu gcig pu 'di ltar grub// grub 'gyur zhes ni gal te bzla// gang grub pa ni shes byas gang // ye shes gang gis grub pa yis// 
218a5(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i de nyid grub par 'gyur// grub pa nyid ni grub byas la// khams gsum ma zhes lha yi khams// rigs 'dzin gzugs kyi rnal 'byor rnams// yang na lus ngag yid rnam gsum// dbang 
218a6(rgyud 'grel): po lnga dang spyod yul lnga// de rnams gang na brten par byed// de nyid khams gsum zhes bya nyid// srid gsum sku ni bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'chang // gang 'khor khams ni 
218a7(rgyud 'grel): sum nul// de rnams kyis ni 'di ltar thob// bdag gi ye shes rab bshad bya// lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo bden// brdzu min bden par bdag gis bzla// gal te nges par 'di ltar gsungs// 
218a8(rgyud 'grel): legs so legs so bcom ldan 'di// rang ba dag khyod ni rdzu 'phrul che// de nyid ye shes sgyu 'phrul chen// bstan pazla smra dang de bzhin bshad// las gnyis ma nyid go bar bya// khyod ni ye shes/ 
218b1(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus nyid// mkhas pa rnams kyis rig pa ste// rig ma 'jig rten gsum grub ma// srid pa gsum gyi skyed byed ma// sku gsung thugs nyid rab grub byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug ces bya 
218b2(rgyud 'grel): ste// chen po yang yin rnal 'byor yin// bsam gyi mi khyab tshan nyid de// A le kA li sngon du bsam// rnal 'byor chen pos ngal sor gsungs// lto ba'i dkyil gnas gang ba yi// zla ba'i

218b4(rgyud 'grel): legs ldan khyod kyis gal te bstan// kun gyi rang bzhin dngos legs nyid// de dag nyid ni legs ldan te// chu sbyin lta bu legs ldan te// yang dag 'byor las skye ba dang // rab 'byor las skye 
218b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar gnyis// yang dag 'byor skye zhes bya ba// b+ha ga dkyil na yang dag gnas// bde ba thams cad sbyin pa'o// thams cad byis pa rmongs pas na// de la gnas pa ma shes so// the tshom 
218b6(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa'i phyir na gsung // yi ge phreng rnams zhes bya gang // yi ge rnams ni a dang ka/ dbyangs dang mtshon dang gsum rnams kyi// phreng ba rnams kyi zhes bya ba// yi ge phred pa rnams kyi 
218b7(rgyud 'grel): bshar// don mi spong phyir yi ge yin// mi dmigs pa ni bde mchog yin// de rnams kyi ni tshor ba'i phyir// de yi phyir na legs ldan yin// yang na legs ldan dpe med nyid// yi ge phreng 
218b8(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams kyi ste// A li kA li rnam sna tshogs// las kyi ye shes yin pa ste// sngags kyi shar ba spyod pa yi// cho ga'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig/ tshig bshad sum brgya A li kA/ li ni rab 
219a1(rgyud 'grel): tu bstan pa yin// a yig thig le me 'od zer// dmar pos brgyan par byas pa ste// bsgrub bya snying po spyi bo gsang // de bzhin lte bar rnam par bsam// a yig/ 
219a2(rgyud 'grel): thig le ldan bzang ris// 'tshal dang 'dra ba'i mdog tu ste// bsgrub par bya ba'i spyi bo la// bse 'bras 'dra ba'i mdog ni bsam// myos dang brlag dang gsang dang bsam// ye shes nyid kyi// 
219a3(rgyud 'grel): mthu ni bstan// gang dag bsams tsam gyis sogs 'di// g.yo ba ces bya skye bo rnams// mi g.yo zhes bya mi 'gul rnams// g.yo dang mi g.yo 'grub par 'gyur// g.yo ba ces grub zar 
219a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// yang na ci ste de ltar grub// legs ldan mi g.yo mi 'grub po// byas pa'i 'bras bu'i rig pa dang // ye shes phye ba'i bzhi pa la// de ltar don nyid 'chal ba dang // ye shes nyid dgongs// /

219b1(rgyud 'grel): po che// bdun khor kun gyi sha za 'am// lha mig dang ni rdzu 'phrul che// mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs// yon tan yod phyir mi 'gag gsung // nyin re bzhin du zla 'thung sogs// zla ba ces bya
