298b4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes nga yis bskyed par bya yis// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du sla/ 
298b5(rgyud 'grel): bar mi bya ste/ khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas de'i spyi bor rdo rje gzhag la// 'di ni dam tshig gi rdo rje ste/ gal te tshul 'di su yang rung ba la smras na khyod dam tshig rdo rje 'das 
298b6(rgyud 'grel): mgo 'gas par byed do zhes brjod la// slar yang rdo rje snying khar gzhag/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' dang khyod kyi// snying la de ring yang dgazhugs// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu 
298b7(rgyud 'grel): dral te gshegs// zhes brjod do// de nas mna' bsgrags te/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng gi pad+ma'i snod kyi chu la oM a mr-i te ud ces pa mngon par bzlas la/ 'di ni khyod 
298b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbul ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na bsreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// ces brjod do// de ring phyin chad khyod kyi rdo rje 
299a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' nga yin gyis/ ngas gang bsgo ba rnams bu khyod kyis bya dgos la/ nga brnyas par yang ma byed cig/ byas na yang bam spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 
299a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo'o// de nas slob mas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs la/ dpal he ru ka bdag la dbab par 
299a3(rgyud 'grel): gsol zhes gsol ba btab la/ de nas slob ma'i snying khar dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan pa la hUM/ mgrin par chu'i dkyil 'khor bum pas mtshan pa la baM/ spyi bor rlung gi 
299a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ba dan gyis mtshan pa la ha/ rkang mthil du rlung dang / me yis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor la dz+haiM dmar po bsgoms la// rdo rje gsor te/ dril bu dkrol zhing bsgyings pa dang 
299a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas/ oM a be sha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ ra ra ra tsa la yaM/ tsa la ya hUM a ha dz+nye'u zhes lan rgya bzlas la 'bab po// babs na lde la a dmar po bsams la/ zung shig rdo rje dge 
299a6(rgyud 'grel): mi dge zhes dris nAs legs nyes gang yin pa ston par 'gyur te/ de yang thugs babs na yongs su shes pa skye'o// gsum babs na sngags smra'o// sku babs na nam mkha' la 
299a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas so// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra zhes pas babs pa brtan par bya'o// 'di ni babs pa'i cho ga'o// de nas slob mos maN+Dal byas te/ me tog bkram la lha dang / bla ma la yon phul nas 
299a8(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba gdab bo// de nas slob dpon gyis/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi// lha yi 
299b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi rim pa bzhin/ bsod nams gang yin de dag shog/ 'dis ni dngos grub gang 'grub dang // rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur// 'di yis bsod nams ci yod las/ dkyil 
299b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog/ ces bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod la// de nas mig slar snang ba'i 'od kyi kha dog dri'o// des kyang smra ste/ dkar po la sogs pa la gang mthong ba las 
299b3(rgyud 'grel): gang grub pa'i ltas brtag go/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la sngar smos pa'i baspyod pas bstod la me tog dor bar bya ste/ bde gshegs snying po'i dkyil 'khor du// rig pa'i me 
299b4(rgyud 'grel): tog 'di bor bas// sngon tshe ye shes bsnyen pa'i lha// gang yin de la babs gyur cig/ ces brjod nas pra tIts+tsha hoHzhes pas me tog dor bar bya'o// de nas me tog gang dang gang du 
299b5(rgyud 'grel): ltung ba de las de dang mthun pa'i lha dbog par bya ste/ de yang rin chen la sogs pa'i// gang la babs pa'i rigs kyi lnga// gtso bo rigs de bsgoms nas ni// dngos grub 'gyur 
299b6(rgyud 'grel): the tshom med// ces brjod nas me tog blangs te slob ma'i mgol bcing ngo // de nas slob ma'i mig gnyis su// oM bsgoms la/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' nyid khyod bya// mig 'byed 
299b7(rgyud 'grel): par ni brtson par mdzad// phyed pas thams cad mthong 'gyur ba// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med ces brjod de gdong g.yogs dgrol// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ ltos shig ltas 
299b8(rgyud 'grel): shegs pas dpa'// / midag gang du srung chu ba// de de kyad kyis yid// nas brjod pa/ dkyil 'a ba gang bajug la ma bsrungs nas yang dam pas gas pa bang dum 
300a1(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon du 'gro bas bstan par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'o// de nas dbang bskur te/ de yang dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan// gzhan du na ni dngos 
300a2(rgyud 'grel): grub dag/ shin tu ring bar 'gyur ro zhes// rdo rje 'dzin pas de skad gsungs// de bas na dngos grub kyi phyir rjes su mthun pa'i yon bla ma la phul nas gsol ba btab la phyag bya'o// 
300a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyis de la dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu snying po'i dkyil 'khor phyed tsam gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa la dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa ge sar dang bcas pa 
300a4(rgyud 'grel): lho ru lha mo bzhi'i mtshan ma spangs la der slob ma gzhag ste/ shis pa'i cho ga bya'o// de yang yung kar la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ lag pa g.yon gyi khu tshur gyis gzung nas lag gnyis 
300a5(rgyud 'grel): su bskor nas kham phor gyi me'i nang dugs so// de bzhin du lan gsum bya'o// de yang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs la nye reg bya ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i dri snying khar me 
300a6(rgyud 'grel): tog mgo la mar me mig sngar mar dang / sa rdzas sa bsreg pa'i bdug pas bdugs te shis pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas he ru ka dmigs la mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs
300a7(rgyud 'grel): steng du bla re g.yas phyogs su hUM bzlas pa'i gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can gzung ngo // g.yon du rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng la/ zangs dung dang / dung gi bud pa la 
300a8(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rol mo'i sgras nam mkha' gang bar bsams la// rdo rje dang dril bu dkrol te/ phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra// 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma 
300b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum spangs pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba// de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis dang po yin// de yi nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'jig 
300b2(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum du grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa// chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa yin// dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan 
300b3(rgyud 'grel): zos pa'i bkra shis phyug/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi sbyin pa'i gnas// tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi// de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa 
300b4(rgyud 'grel): yin// zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyi glu blangs dbang bskur te/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang // de bzhin gshegs kun sku khrus gsol// lha yi chu ni dag pa 
300b5(rgyud 'grel): yis// de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o// ta thA ga ta sa ma ya shwe yai hU~M zhes brjod cing // dang por rnam rgyal gyi bum pa'i chus gtor// de nas lha mo rnams kyi bum pas so// de nas/ 
300b6(rgyud 'grel): nang gi dbang bskur te// snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la bkug la/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis// 'di la dbang 
300b7(rgyud 'grel): bskur rab tu gsol// zhes yid kyi dbang bskur nas/ de dag rang gi 'od las byung ba'i dbang skur bar bsams la// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi// gsang gsum gnas 
300b8(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba yi// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// dbang bskur gsang ba chen po sbyin// badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM zhes brjod cing bkru'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 
301a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs dang bcas pa de dag slob ma'i bu kar btsud de/ lus thams cad la de'i rang bzhin du byas nas mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi sbyor bas gnas par bsams te 
301a2(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi chu'i dbang ngo // de nas gser la sogs pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin las byas pa'am/ ma 'byor na dar dang ras la sogs pa'i cod pan bcings la/ nam 
301a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' gang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ rin chen dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis der bzhugs par bsams te/ bdag po'i rtags kyis mtshan ma yi// rtags kyi 
301a4(rgyud 'grel): dam pa cod pan gyis// de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas// 'gro ba'i mgon skyabs byed par shog/ oM rat+na mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa ces pas dbang bskur te/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang 
301a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin cod pan gyi dbang ngo // de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs te/ slob ma'i gnas gsum du gtugs la// sangs rgyas kyi ni rdo rje'i dbang // de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// 'di ni sangs 
301a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad nyid// rab sgrub phyir ni rdo rje gzung // ma hA badz+ra hUM zhes pas// lag pa g.yas su rdo rje byin te// snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i dbang ngo // de nas
301a7(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon du dril bu byin la// shes rab dril bu'i dbang bskur ba// de ring khyod la sbyin par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// shes rab chos kyi dbyings shes 
301a8(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ mahA badz+ra b+haN+DA a ces pas g.yon par zil bu byin la/ g.yas g.yon bsnol te 'khyud pa'i tshul du bya'o// 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje'i rang bzhin bdag po'i rang bzhin gyi dbang ngo / 
301b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje dang dril bu slob ma'i spyi bor gzung la// gang gang snang ba de dang de// he ru ka dpal bdag nyid gtso/ gang chos rnams ni rnam dag pas// sangs rgyas ye shes rang bzhin
301b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid// oM badz+ra sat+kA tAM/ a b+h+r-i Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra nA ma/ e b+hi She ka ta ces pas ming gi dbang bskur te/ kye dpal che ge mo zhes rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming las gang 'dod pa sbyin no// 
301b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin gyi mig gi dbang ngo // de dag ni go rims bzhin du me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba grub pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par 
301b4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i ye shes te/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no// dbang bskur ba rnam pa lnga po dag gis ni// rgyud la sogs pa mnyan pa dang / bshad pa dang / sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur ro// 
301b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni/ spyan la sogs pa rig pa lnga'i las yin pa dang / ma rig pa bzlog pas na rig pa'i dbang ngo // de nas slob dpon gyi dbang bskur te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ 
301b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba// thugs rje can khyod bka' drin gyis// de ring bdag la stsal du gsol zhes gsol ba gtab pa dang / rdo rje che dang dril bu che// zung cig rdo rjer byin gyis 
301b7(rgyud 'grel): rlabs// de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur// slob ma'i cho gas rnams bsdu bar gyis shes slob ma la dbang bskur la/ de'i rjes la dam tshig gsum po 'dzin du gzhug ste/ hUM gi rdo rje 
301b8(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas// rtag tu khyod kyis gzung bar bya// phyag na rdo rje'i brtul bzhugs brtan// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta 
302a1(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ye/ tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM d+ha ra ya mi/ hi hi hi hi d+h+waM/ zhes pas rdo rje gtad de gzung la/ de kho na nyid 'di brjod do// thog mtha' med pa'i sems 
302a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snying po bdag nyid gtso// bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// 
302a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas a las bskyed pa'i dril bu byin la/ 'dri de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal 
302a4(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhed// ces pas dril bu byin la// srid pa rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag/ rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis// sred pa dam pa mchog tu
302a5(rgyud 'grel): byed// oM badz+rar+thAr+t+ta raNI pa ra Ne/ saM pra ra Ni sarba bud+d+ha She tra pra tsa li te pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta/ nA dra swa b+hA be/ badz+ra d+ha ra hr-i da ya/ a pra ti ha ta sa shwA na/ nAMtrUM hUM phaT swAhA/ ces pas 
302a6(rgyud 'grel): dkrol bar bya ste dril bu'i brdul zhugs so// de nas phyag rgya'i brtul zhugs sbyin te/ de la shes rab lo grangs bcu gnyis kun du khyud byas te// rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba yi// slob dpon
302a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi ni dbang du 'dod ces gsungs so// de bas na rang gi lha'i phyag rgyar byan gyis brlab po// de yang yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir// dam tshig phyag rgya rab tu grags// rang gi lus kun
302a8(rgyud 'grel): brtag byed pa// de ni phyag rgyar rab tu grags// shes pas rang gi lha'i mngon par rnam par rtogs pa bskyed// me tog la sogs pas kun nas mchod cing bstod pa bya ste/ de yang 
302b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems pa dang bcas pas// me tog gcig slob ma'i mgo la dor la// de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// sras dang bcas pa rnams rol cing // rdo rje snyems pa'i rnal 
302b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis// dga' ston bde ba'i mchod pa gyis// hUM/ sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'phang // sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// des ni bcom ldan 'bral mi 'gyur/ 
302b3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba de yis rgyun yin no// oM lus can rnams la dam chos kyi// khyod kyis glu ni blang bar bya// de yis bde gshegs dngos grub ni// myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur// hriM/ de nyid 
302b4(rgyud 'grel): thal mo'i gar gyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad chags par byos// sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phrin las kyis// gar mkhan tshul du bsgyur bar gyis// ho/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la 
302b5(rgyud 'grel): spos phul bas// brtul zhugs bzang pos legs tshim gyis// lus can bder gshegs cha lugs su// ye shes kyis ni tshim par gyis// a sangs rgyas rnams la me tog 
302b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor // byang chub yan lag tshegs 'gyur bas// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yi// bder gshegs su ni thob par 'gyur// b+h+rUM/ chos kyi me ni legs spang bas// rdo rje chos dang 
302b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba ru// sems can ma rig ldongs pa la// ye shes sgron mas 'bar bar gyis// pra/ rgyal ba rnams la dri phul bas// tshul khrims de bzhin shes rab dang // rnam grol ye 
302b8(rgyud 'grel): shes mthong ba yi// byang chub lus can rnams la bsgos// ga/ de'i rjes la gser gyi thur ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ ji ltar mi mkhan rgyal ba yis/ 
303a1(rgyud 'grel): 'du rna bsngal bsgyud // rban+d+ha rdzun mags pa'i// lid-i k+sha rtul ba rnams kyis gsal// oM badz+ranA d+b+ha yA/ a pa kA sa/ denas mal 
303a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun tu byung // rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa/ de ltar chos rnams shes byas nas// 
303a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can don ni mnyam med byos// 'on kyang rgyal ba'i sras su skye// de nas hoHzhes bya bas mda' gzhu byin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags par byos shing / 
303a4(rgyud 'grel): ces bskal// phyogs bzhir mda' re 'phang ba dang // 'og tu yang mda' 'phen du gzhug go// de nas badz+re he du kruM zhes bya bas/ 'khor lo rkang pa'i bar du gzhag/ yang / oM b+hA 
303a5(rgyud 'grel): ra zhes bya bas lag pa g.yas su dung gtad nas/ g.yon par ma hA mA yA'i pu ti byin te/ dril bu yang dkrol zhing / deng nas btsams te sems bskyed pa// tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 
303a6(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis the tshom dogs med par// yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis su// chos kyi dung ni bla med pa// dri med kun tu gang bar gyis// sngags spyod tshul gyis cho ga rnams// skye bo 
303a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la rtag tu shod// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la// phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang // khyod la rtag du bsrung ba mdzad// ces brjod do// de nas 
303a8(rgyud 'grel): so so'i 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i chas lugs su byas te/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// chos kyi 
303b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de bzhin du chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang / rin po che dang pad+ma dang / las kyi tshig bcug tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba byin la de nas yang / zhi rgyas dbang 
303b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bsad pa dang // dgug sdug brjing dang bskrad pa dang / dbye dang gnas pa la sogs pa'i// las de thams cad 'grub par gyis// ram tha mig sman sa 'ag dang // mtshal ldum 
303b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin ril bu ste// rnal 'byor ma yis dngos grub rnams de dag ci dgar bsgrub par gyis// ces bya bas rjes su gnang ba'o// de nas bdag nyid langs te/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
303b4(rgyud 'grel): su dmigs nas/ g.yon pa snying khar chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ltar byas te/ rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas lung bstan to// oM 'dir
303b5(rgyud 'grel): ni khyod la ngas lung bstan// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// srid pa shin du dag pas na// srid po ngan 'gro dag las bton// he badz+rA nA maHta thA ga ta b+hur b+hu ba swaHgang la 
303b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'di dang phyag rgya chen po mchog tu bsad pa'i cho ga 'dis lung bstan pa de la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams mgro ni gcig du/ 
303b7(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por lung ston par mdzad de/ sngags 'di dang phyag rgya 'di'i mthu yin no zhes bya bas dad pa bskyed pa'o// de nas gsang ba bsgrag ste/ 'dod chags dang bral 
303b8(rgyud 'grel): blta bu'i sdig/ khams gsum na ni gzhan med de// de bas 'dod la chags bral bar// nam yang bya ba ma yin no// ma hA mA yA ta na hUM/ de nas slob ma'i spyi bar gdugs 
304a1(rgyud 'grel): gzung la// gdugs dang bcas par bskor ba byas te/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi drung du gdugs dang bcas pas spyi bo gtugs la/ sngags rnams 'dzin par gyur 
304a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags// shes brjod la gdugs gzhag la 'di skad ces brjod do// di ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur// sngags dang rgyud rnams 'dzin 
304a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bar// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris// khyod 
304a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis nan tan bskyed nas su// sgrub pa po rnams sngags la spyod// de ras dbugs phung ste/ gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ zhugs pa dang ni mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun 
304a5(rgyud 'grel): las rnam grol to// de ring khyod ni dge bar gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// phyin chad 'chi ba yod min te// mi thub gdod pa yod min pas// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga'
304a6(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis// srid pa shin tu dag pas na// srid pa sdug bsngal las 'das so// rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya dang // byang chub sems ni spang mi bya// gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang // 
304a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med// dam pa'i chos kyang smad mi bya// nam yang dor bar yod mi bya// mi shes pa'am rmongs pa la// de nyid bstan par mi bya'o// rdo rje dril bu mi 
304a8(rgyud 'grel): spang zhing // slob dpon nam lang smad mi bya// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pas na// de la smod byed gang yin pa// des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob// rang dag yongs su 
304b1(rgyud 'grel): spangs nas su// dka' thub kyis ni gdung mi bya// ji ltar bde bar bder gnas nas// 'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas// khyod ni de ring 'bras bu yod// lha dang dam tshig 
304b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mtshungs par// rtag tu khyod rnams grol bar 'gyur// dbugs dbyung ba'o// de nas slob mas phyag byas te// gtso bos ji ltar bka' 
304b3(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi// zhes khas blang ngo // 'di ni slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'o// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur sa phyogs dben par bya ste/ 
304b4(rgyud 'grel): yol bas par bcad nas/ rgyud nas gsungs pa'i lo ni bcu gnyis ma la sogs pa'i// dam tshig can bla ma la phul la/ kye bcom ldan 'das byang chub zhi pa dga' ba che// rdo rje 
304b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas yang dag byung // mi phyed phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrub// rdo rje stor ba cil gus// bdag nyid chen po khyed ji bzhin// gtso bos bdag ni mdzad du gsol// 'khor ba'i 'dam 
304b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgya mtsho ru// bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs// ces gsol btab pa dang / de nas dpal ldan slob dpon ni// rjes su brtse dang ldan pa yis// snying rje slob ma la 
304b7(rgyud 'grel): bskyed de// rdo rje 'dzin par mdzad pa la// sho chang bza' btung yid du 'ong // me tog bdug spos dri la sogs// rgyal mtshan dril bur bcas pa yis// slob mas rdo rje can la 
304b8(rgyud 'grel): mchod// de nas phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bas// phyag rgya khu ba dang ldan pa de srid du bsten la// snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba ste/ slob ma dang / phyag rgya 
305a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mig bkra ba la/ slob ma la dbang bskur te/ ji ltar bder gshegs thub chen gyis// byang chub sras la dbang bskur ltar// de bzhin gshegs 
305a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang bskur bas// bdag gis sems rgyun 'di yis bkru// bo d+hi tsit+ta a bi Shiny+tsaH/ ces brjod la slob mas kyang // a to su kha ces brjod do// bde ba rdzogs par
305a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go/ shes rab kyis kyang de ltar bya ste// thabs dang shes rab kyi gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o// de'i rjes la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur te/ slob mas snga ma ltar 
305a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba btab nas/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i shes rab ma byin gyis brlabs te gtad la/ mgo bor lag pa gzhag pa ste// dga' sder gnas te bu mo 'di// sna tshogs gzugs
305a5(rgyud 'grel): can yid 'ong ba// zung shig zung shig sems dpa' che// bzung nas mchod pa rab tu bya// thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs ma rgyas// 'gro ba gsum po 'di yis dag/ de bas khyod
305a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis nam yang ni// 'di dang bral bar mi bya ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brdul zhugs bla na med// blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba// de la mchog gi dngos 
305a7(rgyud 'grel): grub med// ces brjod la sbyin no// des kyang 'di skad brjod do// gshang gci khrag dang khu ba dang / sha chen la sogs bza' ba dang / bud med rnams la rtag gus dang // b+ha ga'i 
305a8(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar 'o byed pa// bu khyod spro bar byed rus sam// ces brjod do// bu mchog des kyang lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro// khu khrag la sogs bza' ba dang // bud med rnams la 
305b1(rgyud 'grel): rtag gus shing // b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o bgyi'o// zhes brjod do// yang shes rab kyis/ e ma'o bdag gi pad+ma 'di// bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan// bde chen phyag rgya chen po ni// 
305b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid du ni rtag tu gnas// blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// ces brjod do// de'i rjes la ji skad du bshad pa'i kar na byas la snyoms par zhugs 
305b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ man ngag gis de'i skad cig mtshon par bya'o// dbang bzhi pa bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o// su 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub gzhung la// dad cing 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ 
305b4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i lugs bzhin sbubs te bris// dge rtswa rtse rabs rnams la sngo// chu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dngos grub parnyes pa kukA ris mdzad pa rdzogs so// 
305b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po na wi ko Ta dang / bod kyi lo tsab mgos lha btsas kyis bsgyur ba'o// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los bsgyur// ye shes lnga dang sku 
305b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum nyid// 'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro mo// kun tu rtog pa 'ching gcod cing // 'jig rten bya ba rab 'jug ma// de snyed rnams la phyag
305b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// gnyis mod ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// ldan cig skyes pa'i ro snyoms shing // bdag med ngo bo phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// byang chub 
305b8(rgyud 'grel): sems mchog rnam par dag/ 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i dbyings// mi spyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// mchog sbyin ma ni bde ba che// mi zad rdorje 
306a1(rgyud 'grel): nor bu dbyings// bla na med pa'i dbang bskur ba// rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// dri med chos ni rnam par dag/ sku gsung thugs ni mtshan ma 
306a2(rgyud 'grel): bral// dri med ye shes che bsnyems pa// pad+ma mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las ni thogs pa med// rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'gro ba'i mgon// nan tan ye shes che
306a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems pa// las kyi mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal ma hA mA yA'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa/ slob dpon ku kur pas zhal gzigs pa'i tshong stod pa'o// / 
306a4(rgyud 'grel): dge legs 'phel// @#/ []/ rgya gar skad du/ tatatra u pa de sha/ bod skad du/ dekhon nyid kyi man // bcom ldan 'das dpal rdorje 
306a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// glang gi snying bar pad+ma 'asbyar dbus gnas gsal// za ba la ba dang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa// khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par 
306a6(rgyud 'grel): ni nyer 'gro ba// gsal ba'i chos kyis dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal// dbang po g.yo ba'i rta kun nang du nges sbyar ba'i// ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i sdod gyur 
306a7(rgyud 'grel): pa// khams gsum ba skyed pa'i rgyu nyid du ni nyer 'gro ba// mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra ba dri med dpal du 'gyur// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba yis// chos ni rjes su drad par bstim// 
306a8(rgyud 'grel): chos rjes dran pa'i skyo ba yis// chos kyi skur ni rang nyid 'gyur// dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes// ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyis// shin tu bsgom pa 
306b1(rgyud 'grel): goms pa las// 'bar ba 'di ni the tshom med// snying la rtag tu gnas pa yi// thig le gcig pu yi ge med// skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na// ye shes skye bar 'gyur ba'i 
306b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs rje can// 'di nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing // rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems// 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas// 'odi nyid mchod pa 
306b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis ni// mchod 'od thams cad mchod pa yin// gang zhig 'di la rtag lta ba// de ni rgyal pos mchod par bzhed// nang gi sbyor ba'i rdo rje yis// rnal 'byor rdo rje can du
306b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod// de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis// yid 'dod rnams kyi lus la mchod// mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par// gang 'di rgyud las gsungs 
306b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dag/ de ni phyi rol gzhan du 'dod// dngos med gzhi la dgod pa yis// lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa yi// mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rab
306b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'o// bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i// rgyud 'di don dam ma yin te// don dam yang dag skyes pas na// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// nyi shu rtsa bzhir che ba yi// 
306b7(rgyud 'grel): ga nas sogs de nyid la gnas te// de bas de kun 'khor ba nyid// skyo bya de nyid can gyis min// gal te de nyid mid gyur na// de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya// 'on te de nyid ldan gyur/ 
306b8(rgyud 'grel): na// de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs rnams// brten pas dri ma med par 'gyur// yang na mi nus bag med pa'i// mi yis gnas ni bsgrags 
307a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te// bsam gtan las gzhan bde med phyir// de bas bsam gtan
307a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gzhal bya// rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor// de mi khams rnams zad par 'gyur// de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni// rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya// dpal 
307a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can// rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni// thugs rje thugs gdung ring po nas// rdo rje rnal 'byor can rnams gzigs// de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub 
307a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur// des ni rjes btsun ye shes kyang // rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// sna tshogs spyod pas yang dag ldan// spyod dang brtul zhugs 
307a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa yi// spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spangs la// de nyid brtul zhugs la dga' bya// gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas la// rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs can// bsam 
307a6(rgyud 'grel): gtan zas mchog gzhol gyur pas// smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis// gcer bu 'am yang na gcer bu min// gang rung ji lta ji lta bur// rang gis lhag pa'i lhar dmigs 
307a7(rgyud 'grel): la// de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam// lkug pa'i dngos por thal 'gyur bas// zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni// rnal 'byor can gyis nyer brten na// rnal 'byor chen po 'di 
307a8(rgyud 'grel): gsal 'gyur// ye shes sgron ma mchog mthong na// rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' la// ngang pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no// 
307b1(rgyud 'grel): mig 'phrul mkhan ldan 'jig rten du// 'gro don kun ni byed pa'o// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni// mngon 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// spyod dang 'di la nges par ni// ji skad 
307b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad par der 'gyur bas// sems ni dag par gyis shig ces// sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs// gang phyir shin tu gsang ba na// de nyid bdag gis gsal 
307b3(rgyud 'grel): ma byas// des na bla ma yang dag par// mnyes byas yang dag 'dod pas blang // dge la dmigs pas nye bar bsags te 'phel ba yin// blo gros brtan rnams mngon dga'i 
307b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub gnas su 'gro// 'gro ba'i spyod pa de ltar snying la yongs bsgoms la// dge la mngon par dga' bar skad cig re rer gyis// de nyid brtan pa legs bris las// 
307b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa// des ni sems can ma lus kun// de nyid rin chen rab gsal shog/ de kho na nyid kyi man ngag legs par bris pa slob dpon blo bzang snying 
307b6(rgyud 'grel): pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA mA la gup+ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o// 
307b7(rgyud 'grel): de dzin nyid kyi man ngag gi 'brel pa bzhugs// rgya gar skad du/ tata tra u pa de sha pri ta ti/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gi 'grel pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems 
307b8(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gang du snying gi pad+ma kha sbyar dbus gnas gsal// phra bar lta ba rang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa/ khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba/ 
308a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal zhes pa la// gang du zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba dang sbyar te/ 'di ni gnas bzhi ste bdun 
308a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin la// gang dang de gnyis ni rtag tu 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir// de la phyag 'tshal ba yin no// de la chos zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid de yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o// de 'dzin par chos 
308a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings te/ d+hA tu ni bsnun zhes bya ba dbye ba'i tshig gis ni gang du chos kyi dbyings yin pa de ni khams gsum pa nye bar 'gro zhing song ba yin pas de la phyag 'tshal ba'o// gang du zhes 
308a4(rgyud 'grel): na/ snying gi pad+ma Sha sbyar dbus gnas zhes bya ba smos te/ snying gi ni snying ngo // pad+ma ni chus skyed de/ 'dab ma bzhi pa/ kha dog dmar po 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin no// 
308a5(rgyud 'grel): del lte ba'i dbus gnas kha sbyar gsal zhes bya ba zla ba dang / nyi ma gnyis las yongs su grub pa ste/ 'di gnyis ka yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi ngo bo nyid do// de la zla ba ni sa dang 
308a6(rgyud 'grel): tshwa'i rang bzhin no// nA ma na me da d+hA kI rang bzhin ste/ kha sbyar de'i dbus gnas pa'i dang dz+wal 'di l-I yad pa san thA swA r+yaH dbus na gnas pa'o// dal 'ang don ni 'di yin/ 
308a7(rgyud 'grel): yon tan brgyad kyi phreng ba'i rnal 'byor mo'i ngo bo nyid kyi dbus na bzhugs pa de ni bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings te/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o// gsal zhes bya ba ni 
308a8(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba ste// gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi snang bar byed pa'o// ji ltar zhe na phra ba lta ba zhes bya ba smos te/ phra ba ni bcom ldan 'das yin la// de ni phra ba rnams las kyang phra 
308b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gyur pa rdo rje nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam du 'jug pa'o// de la myong ba de ni nye bar 'gro ba'o// der lta ba ni rnam par/ lta ba ste/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i snal ma shin du phra ba'i bu ga la 
308b2(rgyud 'grel): mi yengs par/ lta ba'o// yang na phra ba yin la/ lta ba yang de nyid yin pas nA pra bar/ lta ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro// de'i rang byung ba ni rgyun gyis 'bab pas rab tu 'jug pa'i/ 
308b3(rgyud 'grel): de la myong ba ni ring po ma yin pas bar ma chad par nye bar 'gro ba'o// sems kyis 'jug pa ni sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/ rgyu de'i phyir ro// de yang gang zhen 
308b4(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ khams gsum ni 'dod khams dang / gzugs khams dang / gzugs med pa ste/ de rnams gcig tu bsdus pa ni khams gsum 
308b5(rgyud 'grel): mo// bsdus pa'i don gyis khams gsum pa ste/ khams gsum gyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum pa'o// ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni lhag med pa'o// gnyis su med par nye bar 
308b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni song ba ste/ bsdus pa'i tshul gyis so sor snang zhing 'di dag thams cad nam mkha'i gzugs su yongs su gyur pa'o zhes pa'i don to// ji skad du der 'gro yid

308b8(rgyud 'grel): yin zhe na/ cung zad tsam yang mi gsal ba ma yin gyi/ rnyog pa med pa la gsal bar gyur pa yin te/ de lta bur gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de la phyag

309a7(rgyud 'grel): ro// ye shes de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ ye shes rgyal ba ma lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ rgyal ba ni sdig pa thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan

309b7(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa rtsa ba nas bton pa la bya bar bshad la/ rdo rje rdul 'byor ma bzhi ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'di rnams kyi dbus na bcom ldan 'das chos 
309b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings de dang lhan cig yang dag pa'i sbyor ba bya'o// sbyor ba des ci zhig bya zhe na/ chos ni zhes bya ba la sogs smos te/ chos ni zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor gyi nang na gzhugs pa'i bcom 
310a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das yin la/ de yang snga ma bzhin du bsgoms pas phyis chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par skye zhing / nam mkhar snang bar nye bar 'gro ste/ rnal 'byor pa rang 
310a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid chos kyi skur 'gyur ro// de'i don ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur ba de yin te/ pad+ma'i steng du thig le bzhi las lha mo bzhir bskyed la/ lte ba'i thig le las bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa

310a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang dngos po med pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro// ji skad du 'gro ba dang 'ong dang gnas pa nyid// dal gyis dal ba'i rim gyis ni// de nas dngos po med 'gyur te// zhi ba gcig pu mngon
310a6(rgyud 'grel): blugs nas// zhes bshad pa ni man dag // ye shes de bsgoms pa las khyad par ci zhig sgra zhe na/ dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes// ye shes mchog ni shes rnams /

310a8(rgyud 'grel): ba yin pas na gsal byed pa'o// nye bar snang bar byed pa'i ye shes te/ dbus na gsal bar byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro// rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 
310b1(rgyud 'grel): ni sems la bya ste/ ji skad du sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba rnam grangs su bshad pa'i phyir ro// de'i dbus su gsal bar byed pa'i ye shes ni snying gi pad+ma kha sbyar 
310b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi nang du chud pa'i mi g.yo bas// lta bar byed pa'i ye shes te chos kyi dbyings su gyur pa'o// de gang zhig ce na/ mchog gi ye shes rnams kyi zhes bya ba smos te/ de kho na nyid mthong ba 
310b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi'o// gyi mda' tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhe na/ shin tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ shin tu yang rgyun mi chad par sbyor bas bsgom zhe na/ sems pas rgyun mi 
310b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chad par goms shing bslab pa'i tshul gyis rnam par lta ba'i rgyu des na/ 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'di ni ste/ snying la gsal zhing snang bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do// 'di'i don ni 
310b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin te/ ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas skabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni skad cig tsam gyis ye shes kyi snang bar 'bung bar 'gyur te/ ji skad du srog dang rtsol ba bsdums 
310b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar// zhes bshad pas na som nyi mi bya'o// don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir// snying la rtag tu gnas pa yi// thig le gcig pu 
310b7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge med// skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na// ye shes skye bar 'gyur ba mchog/ ces bya ba la snying la zhes bya ba ni// pad+ma Sha sbyar la bya ba ste/ der thig le zhes bya ba la/ 
310b8(rgyud 'grel): rje phra mo'ang ba nyid gnas shing dus thams cad du 'dug pa'o// ci 'di dngas pa yin nam/ 'on te ma yin zhe na/ yig med cis bya ba smras te/ dngas po med pa'i nga ba nyid 
311a1(rgyud 'grel): kun bzhi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin khyab par snang ba'o// de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgom pa las ni ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro// ci nyan thos la sogs pa dang 'dra'am 'on 
311a2(rgyud 'grel): tre ma yin zhe na/ mchog ces bya ba smos te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'o// de ltar phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro ba'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas/ de kho na nyid 
311a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi man ngag bshad nas// da ni phyi rol gyi mchod pa g.yeng ba dgag par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs rje can// 'di nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing // rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang 
311a4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems// 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas// zhes bya ba smos te/ snying pa'i pad+ma'i bsgyur ba'i dbus 'di nyid du bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba 
311a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gsal ba'i thugs rje chen pos 'khrigs pa bzhugs te/ de rnams ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// de ni nam mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gis ye shes 
311a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i bdag nyid can du bshad do// de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o// byang chub sems 
311a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' zhes bya ba ni byams pa la sogs pa'o// byang chub ces bya ba rnam par mi rtogs pa'i ye shes la sems dpa' ste/ dgongs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o// de skad du// 
311a8(rgyud 'grel): gzung dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid las// byang chub ces bya 'ga' yang med/ rtogs pa'i shes pa las grol ba'i/ sems ni byang chub yin zhes bshad// ces bshad pa'i 
311b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro// de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi// 'gro ba gsum pa dag kyang gnas pa'o// 'o na 'di ltar 'gro ba gsum po dag kyang 'di nyid du gnas so zhes bya ba ni tshig ci rigs pa 
311b2(rgyud 'grel): yin zhe bshad bya ste/ gang gi phyir khams gsum pa 'di dag thams cad ni sems kyi rnam pa yongs su gyur pa yin gyi/ phyi rol na yod pa ma yin te/ bems pa'i bdag nyi 
311b3(rgyud 'grel): can rnams ni snang bar mi rigs pa'i phyir ro// zhes bya bar dgongs te/ ji skad du/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum po 'di dag ni sems tsam mo zhes gsungs pa'i 
311b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hair ro// 'on phyi rol pa smras pa medan/ gang gis de ltar mdzad rten/ 'du cad mchod pa nyid kyini// mched 'od thams cad mchod pa yin// gangazhig 'di la rtag lta ba// nan 
311b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba mchod par bzhed ces bya ba smos te/ 'di nyid ces bya ba ni theg pa'i rgyal po dngas pa dngos po med pa de la mchod pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
311b6(rgyud 'grel): dus thams cad du mchod pa nyid yin no// gal te de rnams la mchod pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi mchod pa lnga la ltos nA ni/ des rnal 'byor pa rnam par g.yeng bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ gang zhig 
311b7(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ bcom ldan 'das phra ba'i rdo rje mgon po 'di la rtag tu lta zhing gnyis su med pa nyid kyis skad cig re re la de nyid mi chod pa yin te/ phyi rol gyi mchod pa 
311b8(rgyud 'grel): rnam par g.yeng bar byed pa rnams kyi ci zhig bye/ 'on de ltan ni mchod pa zhes bya ba med de/ des na 'di ni 'gal ba nyid du shes so zhe na/ nang gi sbyor ba'i rdo rje yis// rnal 
312a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor rdo rje can du 'dong // de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis// yid 'dod rnams kyis lus la mchod ces bya ba smos te/ bdag nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'i rnal 'byor 
312a2(rgyud 'grel): ni nang gi sbyor ba'o// de yang rnal 'byor ni ldan pa ste/ thabs dang shes par snyoms par 'jug pa'o// de yang ji skad du/ shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor 
312a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni bya bar bshad// ces gsungs pa'i phyir de nyid ni mi byed pa'i phyir rdo rje dang 'dra bas na rdo rje'o// rgyu de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa nyid rdo rje can yin par 'dod ces gsungs pa'o// 
312a4(rgyud 'grel): de bas zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba bshad pa yin te/ rgyu de'i phyir na rdo rje'i mchod pa yis zhes bya ba mi phyed pa'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas yid la rnal 'byor 'dod pa 
312a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi lus mchod par bya'o// de ltar na bcom ldan 'dis thams cad zlog par mdzad pa yin te/ rgyal ba rnams kyi mchod pa 'di dag nyid rgud las gsungs pa ci'i phyir zhen 
312a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga'i sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par// gang 'di rgyud lus gsungs pa dag/ de ni phyi la gzhan du 'dod// rjes bya ba smrasate/ mdzad pa de dbul 
312a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste/ me tog la sogs pa lnga po 'di dag phyi nang gi dag nyid can rnams yin la/ des myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yin te de ltar yin tu zin 
312a8(rgyud 'grel): kyang // gang 'di rgyud rnams las gsungs pa/ de ni phyi rol pa nyid yin la/ phyi'i rtsom pa'i tshogs kyis rnal 'byor pa thams cad rmongs par 'gyur ro// de ltar yin du zin na ni mchod/ 
312b1(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba med de chad par lta ba dang mtshungs so zhe na/ dngos med zhi la bkod pa yis// lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa ni// mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste// sangs rgyas
312b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab du sgrub pa'o// zhes bya ba smos te/ dngos po med pa'i bzhi ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i gnas te/ dngos po dang bcas pa'o// 
312b3(rgyud 'grel): de med pas na dngos po med pa ste/ dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don to// de la bkod pa'i yang dag par dmigs pa ste/ rgyu des rang gi lhag pa'i lhar ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'o// 
312b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid ni mchod pa chen por 'dod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa dang / rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par byed par 'dod pa yin na/ rnam par g.yeng bar byed pa'i phyi'i 
312b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa rnams kyis ci zhig bya/ gal te gzhung du yang dag par dgod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis dgongs pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i// rgun ni 
312b6(rgyud 'grel): don dam ma yin te// don dam yang dag bskyed pas na// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// ces bya ba smos te/ bstan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gdul bar bya ba'i don du 
312b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa yin la// yang dag skyed pas na/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems las ye shes 'byung ba'o// ston pa med cing zhes bya ba ni ston par byed pa med pa'o// bstan pa med ces 
312b8(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni gzhung gi tshogs kyang med pa ste/ rnam par mi rtog pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// phyi rol tu g.yeng ba'i blo can rnams kyi gnas la sogs par 'khor bar byed pa dang ldan pa rnams 
313a1(rgyud 'grel): dgag par bya ba'i phyir nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yi// gnas sogs de nyid la gnas te// de bas de kun 'khor ba nyid// smyo bya de nyid can gyis min zhes bya ba smos te/ 
313a2(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa bzhir bye ba'i zhes pa ni/ rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bzhir bsres shing bgrangs pa ste/ de la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro rgyu des na gnas kyi rdo rje 
313a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs rnams kyang sems kyi rdo rje la gnas so// de bas zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba smra ba yin te/ de rnams su 'khor ba nyid kyis khams zad par byed pa yin pas skyo zhing 
313a4(rgyud 'grel): zhum pa nyid mi bya'o// gang gis she na/ de nyid can gyis min zhes pa smos so// rnal 'byor pa chen po rnams kyi mi bya'o// 'o na phyi rol tu zhen pa skyon yin na// gtso bor bya ba
313a5(rgyud 'grel): gang yin zhe na/ gal te de nyid med gyur na/ de yi 'khrus pas ci zhig bya// yang na de nyid ldan 'gyur na// de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod// ces bya ba smos te 'di ni go sla'o// 
313a6(rgyud 'grel): 'on te bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gnas pa la sogs pa bgrod pas dri ma med pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de bas na rang gi gzhung nyid dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ gnas dang nye ba'i 
313a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas sogs rnams// brten pas dri ma med par 'gyur// yang na mi nus bag med pa'i// mi yi gnas ni bsgrags par bya/ zhes bya ba smos te/ gnas dang nye ba'i 
313a8(rgyud 'grel): gnas la sogs pa la brten cing // bsnyen bkur bya bas rnal 'byor pa dri ma med par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba ni/ sred de rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/ 'thon pa 
313b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i gnas su bgrod cing mchod pas bsod nams su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ngo mtshar med de/ yang na la la zhig bgrod par mi nus pa'am/ bag med 
313b2(rgyud 'grel): cing bya ba mang pos g.yengs pa ste/ de gnyis kyis kyang gnas la sogs pa'i ming bsgrags pas dag pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de yang ci don dam pa nyid du bsten pa yin nam zhe 
313b3(rgyud 'grel): na ma yin te/ nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni/ sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te/ bsam gtan las gzhan pa de med phyir// de bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol bya zhes
313b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba smos te/ gang bdag cag rnams kyis de skad du smras pa de ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang du byas pa yin te/ gang gnas bgrod pas dri ma med pa nyid du 'dod pa 
313b5(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyir bstan pa yin gyi/ de yang don dam par ni ma yin no// de'i phyir bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid 
313b6(rgyud 'grel): can yin la/ 'di nyid las bde ba zhes bya ba gzhan med de/ de bas na nyin mtshan rtag tu bsam gtan kho na mchog tu bsten cing de la gzhol bar bya'o// 'o na phyi rol mngon par zhen 
313b7(rgyud 'grel): cing / btsal ba la skyon ci yod ce na rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor// de yi khams rnam zad par 'gyur// de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni// rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya 
313b8(rgyud 'grel): zhes smos te/ phyi rol gyi sbyor ba la mngon par dga'i rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyi khams rnams yongs su skams par 'gyur te/ de bas na phyi rol gyi bya ba rnams yongs su spangs la 
314a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rol pa ste/ rnal 'byor gyis rnam par rtse bas de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba la gnas par bya'o// 'o na khyad par can dag bzhugs pa'i gnas la bgrod pas
314a2(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa 'grub bam zhe na/ dpal ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can// rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni// thugs rje thugs gdung ring po nas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can rnams 
314a3(rgyud 'grel): gzigs shes bya ba smos te/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi ye shes dri ma med pa'i spyan gyi// thugs rje'i dbang gis ring po nyid nas kyang bsam gtan la rnam par gzigs te
314a4(rgyud 'grel): de bas na gnas bgrod pa la sogs pa mi bya'o// 'o na de dag gis gzigs pas ci 'gyur zhe na/ de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub mchog/ ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur/ 
314a5(rgyud 'grel): des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang // rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya'o// zhes bya ba smos te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can dgyes par gyur nas thugs rje'i dbang gis 
314a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub kyi mchog gi ye shes stsol bar 'gyur zhing bsten par mdzad pa dang / gzhin yang ral gri'i dngos grub la sogs pa ji ltar mngon par dga' ba bzhin du/ rnal 'byor pa rnams 
314a7(rgyud 'grel): la stsol bar mdzad do// de bas na ye shes kyi dakho na nyid rnam pa thams cad du 'bad pas bsgrub par bya zhing mnyes par bya'o// ci rje brnyan ye shes mnyes par byed pas spyod pa 
314a8(rgyud 'grel): dang / brtul zhugs rnams la ltos par bya 'am zhes/ sna tshogs spyod par yang dag ldan// spyod dang bcul zhugs bshad pa rnams// spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spangs la// 
314b1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid brtul zhugs la dga' bya// zhes bya ba smos te/ nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa du ma spyod pa dang / brtul zhugs rnams rgyud de dang de las gsungs pa rnams kyis lus sems rnam 
314b2(rgyud 'grel): par g.yeng bar 'gyur te/ de bas na de spangs shing dor la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/ rjes su mthun pa'i de kho na nyid kyis brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 
314b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa'i dbang gi spyod pa dang / brtul bzhugs gsungs pa yin no zhes bya bar gsungs so// ci bya ba'i rgyud rnams las kha zas ji lta bur gnas par gsungs pa de lta bu'i kha zas
314b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis gnas par bya 'am/ 'on te ma yin zhe na/ gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas pa// rnam pa de byas brtul zhugs can/ bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol 'gyur bas// smyon 
314b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis zhes bya ba smos te// kha zas bsod pa rnams sam// bsod pa ma yin pa 'am/ bslangs pa'am/ bslangs pa rtags pa 'am// brtags pa 
314b6(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa 'am/ gang yang rung ba'i zas la longs spyod cing gnas pa ni zas kyis gnas pa'o// brtul zhing zhugs pa'i phyir brtul zhugs te/ lung las bshad pa'i sdom pa'o// 
314b7(rgyud 'grel): de lta bu'i brtul zhugs dang / zas la ma ltos par bsam gtan nyid zas dang 'drabs na zas so// zas de la mchog tu gyur pas sus kyang rjes su rtogs par mi 'gyur bar smyon pa'i 
314b8(rgyud 'grel): spyod pas gnas par gyis shig ces bya ba ste/ gzhan du skye bo rnams dang nye bar 'dre bas kun tu gces par 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor pa gos la sogs pa slong ba la sogs pas 
315a1(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs can g.yengs par 'gyur na dge ba ji ltar byed ce na/ gcer bu 'am yang na gcer bu min// gang du ji lta de lta bur// rang gis lhag pa'i lhar 
315a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs la// de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam/ zhes bya ba smos te/ gcer bu 'am yang na gcer bu min// zhes bya ba ni go sla'o// bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa nas gnas kyi 
315a3(rgyud 'grel): nges par bshad pa 'dir yang de bzhin du bya 'am zhe na/ gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba smos te/ lam gyi bzhi mdo la sogs pa'i nges pa med do// 'o na skyil mo dkrung bcas nas thog 
315a4(rgyud 'grel): zag bzlas brjod bya ba'i spyod pas ni lus la gnod par 'gyur ro zhes na/ ji lta de lta bur zhes bya ba smos te/ gnas skabs gang yang rung ba dag tu ste/ spyod lam rnam bzhir de kho 
315a5(rgyud 'grel): na nyid rnam par bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o// ci rtogs pa mang po dag gis 'dis ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ram zhe na/ zla drug tsam gyis nges pa ni// zhes bya ba smos te/ nges 
315a6(rgyud 'grel): par zla ba drug gis 'di 'tshang rgya ba nyid kyang nges par 'grub pa ni/ ci skye bo rnams dang 'dres shing g.yengs pas sam zhe na lkugs pa'i dngos por thal 'gyur bas// zla drug tsam gyis 
315a7(rgyud 'grel): nges par ni// rnal 'byor can gyis nges bsten na// rnal 'byor chen po 'di gsal 'gyur zhes bya ba spyos te/ lkugs pa'i dngos por thal 'gyur bas// zhes bya ba ni dgongs 
315a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang gis mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs la gnas pa'i yang nyes pa med do// de bas na rnal 'byor chen po 'di yang gsal zhing 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams 
315b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis// nye bar brtse bar 'gyur ro// 'o na 'di nyid kun gyis bkur ba dang / bsnyen pa'i dus su 'gyur ram zhe na/ ye shes sgron ma mchog mthong na// rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 
315b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dus te// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' la// dad pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no zhes bya ba la/ ye shes ni rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid do// de'i smon 
315b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ni snang ba'o// des mchog tu gyur pa ni dam pa ste/ de lta bas nA lha mo rnams yang dag par nye bar sdud do// ji lta bu zhe na dper na pad+ma'i 'byung gnas kyi mtsho pad+mas khyab par 
315b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas la dang pa'i tshogs rnams 'babya par 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o// ji ltar 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir// reg 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten du// 'gro kun don ni byed pa'o// 
315b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni// mngon 'thur 'di la the tshom med// ces smos te/ 'di dag ni kau sla'o// gzhung rtsom par byed pas bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir/ spyad pa 'dis na 
315b6(rgyud 'grel): sa pa / snad ba shad pa du gas// sems ni dag par sa// sems na rnams la bdagags 'dubs/ zhes thA ba smosadren zlar/ 
315b7(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir shin du gsang bas na// de nyid bdag gis gsal ma byas// des na bla ma yang dag par// mnyes byas yang dag 'don pas blangs// zhes bya ba la de kho na nyid shin tu 
315b8(rgyud 'grel): gsang zhing gcig du sba bar bya ba nyid yin pas ngas gsal bar ma bshad de/ de bas na kye sems can rnams bla ma yang dag par mnyes shing mgu bar byas nas de blang zhing gzung 
316a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gi 'grel pa// slob dpon blo bzang snying po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ma la gup+ta dang 
316a2(rgyud 'grel): zhwa chen gyi lo tso ba rin chen bzang pos bskur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o// // rdzu ma che pa'i thu babs pags// rgya gar skad du/ mahA mA yA sA d+hA ni/ bod skad du 
316a3(rgyud 'grel): lha'aphrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// skum chen mo rnam sgeg pas// sna tshogs sum gzhad gad ltar// thugs rje'i stobs can dgu' 
316a4(rgyud 'grel): na// s+yA ma~Ms rnam rgyal phaga'atshal lo// sdug bsngal gsum gdungs bdag nyid rnams bsrum pa// gang las b+hu ba'i bde ba chen pa med// thugs rje chen po'i dgapa 
316a5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs chen pa'o// de nyid rnam brgyan tham pazang la 'dud// sgyum chen po \u0f7fsa 'brangs nas// s+yA m+b+hi'i sbubs banarda rje paM// gang gi sgrub yang 'dod pa yis// bdag gis 
316a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs 'di brtsams so// snying pa'i nang na tha ba la// thaM dkyil rang gis bon bas ma// de yid 'di sa lus drug pas// lus rten pa nar gzhag pa// de shA pa las 
316a7(rgyud 'grel): sa rnams dang // 'jig rten srid pa snang ba 'o// mdunan wA dang sangs rgyas rnams// nus pas ma lus mchod par byar// dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa 'i/

328b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rnal 'byor sems bskyed la// me tog phreng dang bcas+t+ra pa yi// rdo rje snying khar gzhag nas su// oM sur te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho sid+d+hi badz+ra ya thA su khaM// de ltar rnal 'byor 
328b2(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed nas// lag na phreng ldan slob ma de// oM a khaM bi ra hUM zhes pas// slob ma dkyil 'khor gzhug byas nas// slob dpon gyis ni tshig 'dis brjod// 
328b3(rgyud 'grel): deng khyod he ru ka dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rigs su zhugs kyis// nges khyod la he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste// ye shes des khyod de bzhin gshegs pa 
328b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang / he ru ka dang mkha' 'gro ma'i// dngos grub dag kyang thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig spos// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i// 
328b5(rgyud 'grel): mdun du brjod par mi bya ste// dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re// de la 'khor lo gzhug byas nas// lag gi rdo rje spyir gzhag la// khyod kyis su yang rung ba la// gal 
328b6(rgyud 'grel): te khyod kyis smras gyur na// khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje yis// rang gi mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur// de nas bdu rtsi lnga ldan pa'i// pad+ma'i snod kyi dri yi chus// snying 
328b7(rgyud 'grel): po bzlas te 'thung ngu gzhug/ he ru ka dpal de khyod kyis// khyod kyi snying la di ring gzhug/ gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de yi mod la dral te gshegs// badz+ra ud 
328b8(rgyud 'grel): ka au aHhAM/ de nas 'di yang brjod par bya// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das nas bsreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub na// 
329a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// de nas brtsams te khyod kyi ni// he ru ka dpal nga yin gyis// nga yis bsgo ba khyod kyi gyis// khyod kyis ngal brnyas byas 
329a2(rgyud 'grel): nas// mi bde ma srings dus byas nas// dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ti ra// de nas slob ma'i gtso bo yis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// bdag la byin 
329a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlobasu mdzod la// rdo rje'i ye shes dbab tu gso mi// slob dpon rgyan cha bgos byas te// 'gyings dang bcas pas slob ma la// bltas te rdzas kyis gdug 
329a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // oM badz+rA a be sha a/ zhes bcu rtsa brgyad du bzlas// dril bu'i sgra bsgrags rang srid las// 'od kyis bder gshegs bkrug te gzhug/ des kyang babs 
329a5(rgyud 'grel): par ma gyur na/ slob ma'i snying kha'i zla ba la// he ru ka dpal yum bcas bsam// de yi rdo rje pad bskyod pas// 'od zer dmar po sa yan lag kun// gal te 
329a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig gyur sngags bzlas nas// gdon mi za bar 'bab par 'gyur// babasta nas khrel yi ge e// 'dog dmar pos bsams nas ni// smros shig 'ad 
329a7(rgyud 'grel): chags rjes chen po// dpag tu med pa bde ba che// dge dang mi dge 'di 'dri bas// babs na dge dang mi dge ston// 'das drang ma 'ongs ston gyur na// brgya pa'i 
329a8(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis brtan byas nas// de nas slob dpon 'di skad brjod// 'dir ni bsod nams ji lta bar// rigs kyi rim bzhin 'di yi lha// 'dis ni dngos grub gang 
329b1(rgyud 'grel): yin dang // rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur// 'di yis bsod nams gang yin las// dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin 'gyur// slob mas me tog phreng ba de// pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hoHzhes 
329b2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor// lha de rang la 'grub pa'i phyir// me tog de yis mgo la bcings// de nas slob ma'i lag pa la// gzung nas de yi mig dbye bya// he ru ka
329b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal deng khyod kyi// mig dbye bar ni brtson par mdzad// mig ni thams cad dbye mdzad de// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// oM badz+ra ne tra yo ho ha ra pa Ta laM hrIHzhes pa sa gdong g.yog 
329b4(rgyud 'grel): bkrol nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed// khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyi brlabs// 'gro ba'i phun 
329b5(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs pa kun// dngos grub kun khyod mngon du 'gyur// dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang // gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis// zhes brjod me tog lhung ba'i lha// 
329b6(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo de lta bstan par bya// dkyil 'khor de yi lha nyid kyang // nan tan du ni de la bstan// de nas slob ma dang ldan pas// bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ mchod yon dam 
329b7(rgyud 'grel): pa phul nas su// dbang bskur don gsol gdab bya// he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba// 'gro ba skyabs phyir rdo rje can// de ltar yon tan 'byung gnas sogs// de bzhin 
329b8(rgyud 'grel): bdag la de gsol cig/ dpa' bo chen pos mi ldog pa'i// dbang bskur ba de bdag la gsol// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyi// de skad/ 
330a1(rgyud 'grel): gco la gsol btab nas// de nas 'jug pa'i b+ha ru ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris la// steng du seng ge'i khri bshams te// sna tshogs mdzes pa'i gradan 
330a2(rgyud 'grel): bting nas// gnyis med blo ldan der gzhag te// he ru ka dpal der sprul la// gdugs dkar slob pa'i steng gzung nas// 'bad de mchod pa ci nus mchod// de nas 
330a3(rgyud 'grel): me tog chu sogs pa'i// dbang ni dam pa glang ba'i phyir// dbang bsku re bar chod zhi ba'i phyir// yungs kar bsngags te bgegs bzlog la// slob mas khrus byas rgyan 
330a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang bgo/ khI gzhag snyim pa'i me tog ni// dkyil 'khor la ni gtor bar bya// oM prA tI r+b+ha hoHzhes brjod la// me tog blangs te slob ma yi// mgol cings te sngags 
330a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di brjod// oM d+har+m+ma ku Na Da a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod do// de nas dang por slob dpon gyis// rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs nas// chu rnams thod par bsdus nas ni// 
330a6(rgyud 'grel): glu blang dril bu sogs sde bsgrags// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes// bzlas te rang nyid 'od kyis ni// rig pa'i lha mo dam pa rnams// bdud rtsi'i chu yi sa bag chags 
330a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams dbang bsgyur nas sa byung / sa / sams thas pa ng+geng+ge rgyul// rte byu wAn de bdakun sa/ 
330a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dam pa de dkon te// dar dbyangs bcings la 'di brjod do// thor gtsug cod pan gyis brtan pa// bder gshegs kun gyis bsngags pa yi// rin chen dbu rgyan 
330b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa pa dang // dar dbyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra pa da ka badz+ra a ra li hoHdbu rgyan dbang mchog dam pa'o// rin chen rgyu yi rdo rje la// snang ba mtha' yas der 
330b2(rgyud 'grel): bcug la// lag tu gtod tshe 'di skad brjid// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas// de ring khyed la dbang bskur bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shin tu 
330b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub phyir rdo rje gzung // oM badz+ra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ lag tu rdo rje dbang bskur ro// dril bu don yod dpal bcug ste// lag g.yon gtod tshe 'di skad brjod// 
330b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu cang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// de tshe dril bu'i 
330b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra sgrogs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni// mchog gi srid pa byed par 'gyur// AM shrI hA 
330b6(rgyud 'grel): ruka a d+hI pa ti stAM/ a b+hI Shiny+tsa tritiSh+Tha bi ra sa ma ya/ zhes brjod g.yon du dril bu'o// phyag rgya che dang ldan pa la// sngags kyi dbang bskur ming gdags te// oM shrI hi 
330b7(rgyud 'grel): ruka a d+hi pa tis+t+waM/ a b+h+yAM Shiny+tsA mi/ shrI he ru kAnA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye dpal ldan ming dbang po// de nas rdo rje brdul zhugs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ 
330b8(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dpal phyag na bsnams// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag du bcang // he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha staM d+ha ra ya mi/ 
331a1(rgyud 'grel): hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes brjod pa ni dril bu dang 'brel ba'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o// de ltar rdzogs pas gsang ba yi// dbang mchog snod grur slob ma la// slob 
331a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon mdun du slob ma de// pad+ma zla ba bzhugs bsams la// gsang ba'i dbang phyir gsol ba gdab// gsang ba'i dbang bskur chen po la// gtso bo gsang ba bdag 
331a3(rgyud 'grel): la gsol// de ltar brjod rjes slob dpon gyis// lha yi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas// sngon zhing chu la sogs pa yi// dbang rnams rdzogs nas slob dpon gyis// gsang ba'i 
331a4(rgyud 'grel): go 'phang 'di brjod do// dam tshig phyag rgya rab gsungs pa// yid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// gang gi lus kun brtan byed pa// sa yi phyag rgyar rab tu grags// de skad slob 
331a5(rgyud 'grel): ma la smras nas// rang dang rig ma lhan cig tu// yid dang rjes mthun bza' dang bca'// btung ba la sogs rjes su bya// khal sogs pa ga bur gyis// dri zhim mchog tu 
331a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgos pa dang // yid 'phrog pa yi dga' ba dang // sgeg dang rol sogs sngar byas te// kye ma gnyen mchog sogs pa yis// lha mos bdag la bskul ba dang // dang 
331a7(rgyud 'grel): po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug bya// dga' ba'i bde ba 'byung ba dang // nam mkha' gnas pa'i bder gshegs rnams// bkra shis glu la sogs pa yis// yid la yang dag/ 
331a8(rgyud 'grel): bskul bsams te// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsang sngags gnas las byung ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin pa yin/ 
331b1(rgyud 'grel): de skad brjod nas nor bu dbyung // mthe bong srin lag gnyis kyi khar// bder gshegs zhu ba'i rang bzhin gyi// byang chub sems de slob dpon gyis// dri dang bcas pa'i slob

331b4(rgyud 'grel): tu// sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas te// de dbus slob dpon rang nyid ni// sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i ting 'dzin gnas// slob ma bzang pos slob dpon la// gus 
331b5(rgyud 'grel): pas yon phul mchod byas la// phyag rgyas dbang po gnyis sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor gyis ni 'khor lo kun// spro dang bsdu ba'i tshul bstan la// dbang bskur 'dod phyir 
331b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab// rang bzhin slob dpon go 'phang che// bder gshegs rnams kyi dbang bskur ni// sangs rgyas byang chub reb bsrub pa// de ni sems can dpag med
331b7(rgyud 'grel): don// brtul zhugs mchog ni khyod drin gyis// ji ltar 'dul bzhin bdag bgyid do// de ltar gsol ba btab rjes la// rdo rje slob dpon dam pa la// snyoms 'jug ting 
331b8(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin btang nas ni// slob ma 'dod lha'i ngo bor bskyed// rang lus 'khor lo rnam spros nas// rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa// lag pa'i lo mas bum pa ni// bdud 
332a1(rgyud 'grel): / rtsi'i chu dang bkra shis glus// dbang ni bskur bar bsams par bya// rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs pas// sngon bzhin chu la sogs pa nas// gsang ba'i dbang gis 
332a2(rgyud 'grel): bar dag gis// cho ga rdzogs rjes shes rab la// brten pa'i ye shes sbyin bya ste// sngon bzhin slob ma rang la bstan// gzhag ste gus bcas 'di brjod do// mdzes pa 'di ni 
332a3(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba dang // brten par bder gshegs kun gyis brtag/ 'di ni gzungs ma yid dga' ma// khyod kyis rtag tu brjod par bya// de skad smras la slob dpon gyis// phyag rgya dam pa

332a7(rgyud 'grel): yis// 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal// de nas me long bstan rje sel// chos kyi mtshan nyid
332a8(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o// chos rnams gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang 'bras las thams cad

333a2(rgyud 'grel): nas dbugs dbyung sbyin bya ba// gas de chen mtshig gi dkyil 'khor du// mthong ba dang ni bcug pa yi// sdig pa kun la sa grol 'gyur bar// khyod ni shin tu di ring nas// slob

333b1(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste// chu bo chen por dor bar bya// bum pa gzhan rnams ma lus kun// chu bo chen por bkru bar bya// de nas mi 'chi bcu phyed dang // ba yi rnam lnga tsan dan dang // gur ku ma

333b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhan po kar+m+ma badz+ra dang // lo tsa ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o// / @#// sa kyang pon / gapas ma dpa #// rje bats+tsha nA spyan ras gzigs

334a1(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag yid gsum mi dge ba las bzlog nas/ dge ba'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i rim pa ni dang por gnas yid du 'ong bang / srog chags bsal ba'i sa la 
334a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jim pa byas la/ maN+Dal gzhung bzhin du byas te/ oM badz+ra re khe hri zhes brjod cing / ba'i rdzas lngas 'og ma yang bya'o// de ltar maN+Dal byed pa'i dus su phan yon yang brjod 
334a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ chur bcas lci ba sbyin yin te// bskyang nul bya ba tshul khrims yin// grog mo sogs bsal bzod pa yin// bya ba brtson pa brtson 'grus yin// de rtseg gcig/ 
334a4(rgyud 'grel): pabasam gtan te// ri mo snyoms par shes rab yin// thub pa'i maN+Dal byas pas pha rol phyin drug 'di dag ba rnyed par 'gyur// lha mi khyad par can skye bla ltar gzi 'phags 
334a5(rgyud 'grel): shing // nas kun las grol gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rgyal rigs 'bru dang gser sogs 'byor pa sa gang bar skye// de nas ni lha mi mchog gi khyim du lus bya/

334a7(rgyud 'grel): lha gang yin du bsgoms la// hUM gi sa lce dang lag pa byin gyis brlabs la// pad+ma'i bskor ba dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bu blangs te/ brla stengs gnyis su gzhag nas// 
334a8(rgyud 'grel): hUM dang aHsa rdo rje dril bu byin gyis brlabs la// de kho na nyid 'di brjod de/ hUM/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// kun
334b1(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po gtso// zhes brjod la rdo rje gsor zhing / oM ma hA badz+ra hUM/ zhes brjod do// dril bu'i de kho na nyid 'di brjod do// 
334b2(rgyud 'grel): A srid pa rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// ngo bo nyid kyi dod nas dag/ rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis// srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed// ces brjod la/ dril bu gsel zhing // 
334b3(rgyud 'grel): A~M badz+ra g+hAN Ta aHzhes brjod do// de nas oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas bsrung bar bya'o// de nas mchod pa rnams kyi steng du hUM dkar po re re bsams la 
334b4(rgyud 'grel): oM AHhUM/ zhes brjod pas hUM 'od du zhu nas// bdud rtsi ru byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas bdag nyid kyi lha gang yin pa'i snying kha'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas// lhun gyis// 
334b5(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i gnas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bla ma dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ mchod pa dngos su 'byor na dbul te/ oM badz+ra 
334b6(rgyud 'grel): argaM pra tits+tsha aHhUM/ zhes pas yon chab dbul/ au bA h+yaM pra tI ts+tsha AHb+h+yAM/ zhes pa sa zhabs bsil dbul/ au any+tsa mA naM pra tIts+tsha AHd+h+waM/ zhes pas zhabs// 
334b7(rgyud 'grel): bsil dbuliM/ oM pad+mA ka mA la pra tIts+tsha AHhUM/ dan gyi'o// oM badz+ra maN+Da la prA tIts+tsha AHd+h+waM/ maN+Dal gyi'o// oM badz+rAd+b+ha pa prA tIts+tsha AHd+hI/ au badz+ra puSh+pe prAd+d+hiH 
334b8(rgyud 'grel): 'du / banan pa / / / zhes pas 
335a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams phul la/ de nas yan lag bdun pa rnams bya ste/ na mo sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla ma dam pa dang bcas pa bdag la dgongs 
335a2(rgyud 'grel): su gsol/ bdag gi 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe/ skyeb 'di dang skye ba gzhan dag tu/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci gyis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags par bgyi'o// 
335a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / so so'i skye bo khyad par can gyi dge ba thams cad la yi rang zhing spro bar bgyid do// bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying 
335a4(rgyud 'grel): po la mchis kyi bar du/ thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi sangs rgyas dang theg pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa dang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun 
335a5(rgyud 'grel): la skyabs su mchi'o// bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ ji srid du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba bsgrub pa'i slad du dzaM 
335a6(rgyud 'grel): srid du mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu ma thob pa de srid du sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag gi theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags tha na med pa'i lam baMsten par bgyi'o// / 
335a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi rnam par smin pa'i lus kyi dngos po 'di yang zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul nas mchod par bgyi'o// namo bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i
335a8(rgyud 'grel): byang chub chen por bsngo bar bgyi'o// de nas bstod pa bya ste/ sangs rgyas gtso la yon tan mchog mnga' ba// che dgus mchod cing yon tan sprin tshogs 'dus// 
335b1(rgyud 'grel): goko'aphangs mchog brnyes ston pa chos char 'bebs// sangs rgyas dkon mchog de la phyag 'tshal 'dud// skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs 'dus pa'i// shin tu phan 
335b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bde ba nges mdzad gsung // 'khor brtag bde mya ngan mi 'da' ba'i// dam chos dkon mchog de la rtag phyag 'tshal// dge 'dun che la mthu rtsal rmad mnga' ba'i// bslab/ 
335b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bdag gzhan don phyir bsgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa'i// dge 'dun dkon mchog de la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas gsang 
335b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang gzung sngags bzlas// de nas mdog don/ bskor ba b+ha/ gtor ma gtang smon lam gdab bo// de nas spyan drangs pa'i lha rnams gshegs su gsol te/ 
335b5(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs par bsgom mo// mdo rgyud rtogs pa'i dgongs pa'i 'grel mdzad cing // nyon mongs mi mthun phyogs grang thabs bstan nas// yon tan mchog rnams
335b6(rgyud 'grel): d+hAd la sbyor mdzad pa// dus gsum bla ma rnams la sgrub sumachi'o// skye zhing ste bdag ni thams cad du// blo ldan rigs bzang ngargyal med pa dang // snying rje che zhing bla ma 
335b7(rgyud 'grel): dad cing // rdza ba yan lag dam tshig la gnas nas// mchog dang mthun mongs dngos grub myur thob nas// 'grob sems can rnams kyi don byed shog/ spyi'i chos 
335b8(rgyud 'grel): spyod slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// // oM rje btsun he ru ka laM phyag 'tshal lo// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can// thugs rjes su sprul 'gro den mdzad// 
336a1(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug gtso// he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum mdzes// zhabs gnyis phyed dkrung gar tshul gyis/ 
336a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// bud+d+ha mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal 
336a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag/ rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen rgyal po rab tu 
336a4(rgyud 'grel): zab// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dri ma med// dngos gnyis dag pas gos pa med// pan+t+ra mkha' 'gro phrag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje mi 'ching 'dod chags che// rnam rtog nam
336a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// pad+ma mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje dag pa gdon pi za// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/

336a7(rgyud 'grel): mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba'i// 'jig rten mche ba gtsigs pa po// g.yas ser g.yon ljang rgyab zhal dkar// mnya ba med skul phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs 
336a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rigs kyi bdag/ rigs btsun rigs pa 'phrul nas 'khyud// dbul rigs kyi bdag po bzhugs// bde che sbrul phraga'atshal lo// sgeg dang dpa' byad 
336b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs su rung // drag dang rgod dang 'jig par byed// snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la// nyams dgu yon tan khyod la 'dud// nam mkha'i 'od kyis khebs mdzad cing // 'jigs pa po yang 
336b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par mdzad// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// bder gshegs sku la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yas g.yon dang po mda' dang gzhu// lhag mthong ba kha T+wAM 'dzin// mgo
336b3(rgyud 'grel): zeng brgya phyed do shal byas// mgon po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dbu skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng // ka pA la lngas dbul brgyan// nar stod yogs stag lpags bsnams// 
336b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs rung khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos po'i rang bzhin kun gyi mchog/ skul mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs// 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po// sku gsum bdag nyid khyod
336b5(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud// khyod kyi ye shes spyan zur gyis// mi mthun phyogs rnams skrag mdzad cing // rgyal mtshan dril bus slar gso mdzad// thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku 
336b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum ye shes lnga bdag nyid// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// 'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa po// stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang // 
336b7(rgyud 'grel): de nyid brtan par g.yo bcas pa// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad kyi// bdag nyid chen po khyod la 'dud// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel byed cing // phun sum tshogs pa 
336b8(rgyud 'grel): kun ster ba// byang chub la ma ni ston pa po// ye shes sku khyod phyag 'tshal stod// bsam med dpe dang bral bas brjod du med// bde chen sku ste mi 'gyur 'dus ma byas// 
337a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos dang dngos med rnam sbyangs dmigs pa med// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod// shang phyogs lha mo rdo rje'i rigs// byams 
337a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid sku mdog s+ho// sa khams me long ye shes pa dag/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro byaga'atshal bstod// lho phyogs lha mo rin chen rigs// snying rje'i bdag nyid 
337a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog ser// chu 'ams mnyam nyid ye shes bdag/ rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod// rub phyogs lha mo pad+ma'i rigs// dga' ba'i bdag nyid sku
337a4(rgyud 'grel): me dog dkar// me khams so sor rtog rang bzhin// pad+ma mkha' 'gro b+hag 'tshal bstod// byang phyogs lha mo las kyi rigs// btang snyoms rang bzhin sku 
337a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog ldang // rlung khams bya bgru ba rang bzhin// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// thams cad zhal bzhi phyag bzhi ma// phyag na rang rang mtshan ma 
337a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// mtshan dang dpe byad sku la rdzogs// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod// skal 'od kyi phreng ba 'phro// mi mgo khrag 'dzag do shal byas/ 
337a7(rgyud 'grel): zhabs gnyis nyi la phyed dkrung bzhugs// 'khor gyi lha mo phyag 'tshal ba stod// phyag rgya rnam pa lnga dang ldan// kA pa la lngas dbu la brgyan// sgeg pa la sogs 
337a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang ldan// lha mo'i 'kho la phyag 'tshal bsnyed// rje brdzun 'khong dang bcas pa la// bdag gis bstod pa'i bsod nams kyis// sems can kun 
337b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis rjes btsun gyi// go 'phangs bla med thob par shog/ rje btsun dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so// // gang zhig tshe 'phos te bdun 
337b2(rgyud 'grel): tshigs kyi dus su dge rtsa byed na// ming dbyang ngam gos la sogs pa'i mtshan ma cig la brten bcas la/ de nas maN+Dal bya ba dang / mchod pa dang gtor ma gzhung bzhin du 
337b3(rgyud 'grel): bshams te/ de nas bdag lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsgoms la/ mchod pa'i khyad par 
337b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis mchod// mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma bsngos la/ de nas bstod pa dang 'dod pa'i don gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas bdag nyid kyi snying 
337b5(rgyud 'grel): kha'i sa bon gyi 'od zer spros te/ tshe 'das kyi sem pa yi ge e thung ngu'i gzugs 'od zer gyi lcags kyu sa bkug la/ rten gang yin pa de la ba stim te/ rnam smin gyi 
337b6(rgyud 'grel): lus de nyid du bsams te/ bdag gi pa'i sa byon gyis 'od cing smos te/ bsgrub pa'i snod 'a bam+b+ha pas/ las dang nyan mongs pa'i brag chags kyi 
337b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs nas/ lus shel dag pa dang 'dra ba bsam mo// de nas nam mkha' la bsgoms pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rigs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag na 
337b8(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'i bum pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun rnams kyis dbang bskur te bkrus pas/ sgrib pa thams cad byang ba rabasam/ de nas bzlas pa bya ste/ bdag gi snying
338a1(rgyud 'grel): kha'i sa bon gyi yi ge las/ bzlas pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba la sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du bskor bar bsams la/ de nas phreng sngags gang yin pa'i 
338a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa byas pas/ sngags kyi phreng ba la 'od zer phras pa se/ bsgru ba bya'i snying par thim nas lus ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad 
338a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs par bsam zhing bzlas pa'o// de nas smon lam gdab cing dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo// de nas bsgrub bya'i shes pa a thung ngu de yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bteg 
338a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i gtso bo'i thugs dkar thim par bsam ste/ gnas bstab pa'o// gal te brten med par gyur na/ gang yin pa'i rnam smin gyi 
338a5(rgyud 'grel): lus de nyid mngon sum dang 'dra bar bsams la/ bas pa rgyud gong ma bzhin du bya'o// de ltar bdun pa thams cad la bya'o// slob dpon chen po nag po sa mdzad pa 
338a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// // ts+tsha gdab pa'i man ngag la/ dang po 'jim pa byas na sa ma dun du gzhag ste/ rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar ba sams la/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par

338a8(rgyud 'grel): hrIH'am hUM gi 'od zer gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bkug la// he ru ka ya ba yum la bstim par bya// de na sa yab yum snyoms par 
338b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa las 'od du'u ste/ byang chub kyi sems su gnas pa la sa he ru ka'i snying po nyi shu rtsa gcig gis byin gyis brlabs te/ yang de nyid kyis gdab par bya'o// 
338b2(rgyud 'grel): sa tsha re re yang he ru ka re re ra ba sam la/ de re re la sa he ru ka mang po spro ba dang / sdu ba byas pa las/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par bsam mo// de nas rten 'brel 
338b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi sngags kyis 'jug bsdu ba'o// // @#/ sgyu 'phrul chan za'i rdzogs pa'i drim pa bsngags// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mA yA i ti kra ma/ bod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul

338b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ngag dang yid kyi rnam rtog thams cad bsregs nas/ sgyu 'phrul chen po'i bskur gsal bar byas te/ de nas slar 'dus te thig le la thim nas thig le de yang 'od du zhu bas

339a7(rgyud 'grel): pas ni/ kun mnyam pa'i blos zag pa med pa'i lam gyi ye shes dang po skye'o// chu me la thim pas ni sems la dbang thob ste ngu ba dang 'dra bar mthong ngo // me rlung

339b2(rgyud 'grel): lam dang snying rje chen po'i dbang gis 'gro ba'i don du gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis su snang bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du'o// slob dpon chos kyi zhabs kyi zhal snga nas

339b8(rgyud 'grel): kha dag pa la sogs pa bya'o// hUM phaT zhes bya ba sa gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba bya ste/ bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs la/ hU~M yig gis yon cha ba la bzlas 
340a1(rgyud 'grel): shing stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bltas la/ snying kha'i sngags kyi 'od zer las byung ba'i mchod 
340a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yo byad lnga yis yang dag par mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang 
340a3(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa dang / so so'i skye bo rnams kyi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bdag gi dge ba thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang
